original: teṣāṃ madhye punaḥ sā tu narmadā bhramate sarit // RKV_6.14 //

analyzed: tribhiḥ kūṭaiḥ su vistīrṇaiḥ śṛṅgavān iva go vṛṣaḥ

original: paśyāmi liṅgamīśānaṃ mahāliṅgaṃ tameva ca // RKV_8.27 //

śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
sa mātṛbhiḥ bhūta gaṇaḥ ca ghoraiḥ vṛtaḥ samantāt sa nanarta śūlī
gaja indra carma āvaraṇe vasānaḥ saṃhartu kāmaḥ ca jagat samastam
maheśvaraḥ sarva sura īśvarāṇām mantraiḥ
medaḥ vasā rakta vicarcita aṅgaḥ trailokya dāhe praṇanarta śambhuḥ

original: sa kālarātryā sahito mahātmā kāle trilokīṃ sakalāṃ jahāra /
analyzed: sa kālarātryā sahitaḥ mahātmā kāle trilokīm sakalām jahāra

original: saṃvartakākhyaḥ sahabhānubhāvaḥ śambhurmahātmā jagato variṣṭhaḥ // RKV_16.3 //
analyzed: saṃvartaka ākhyaḥ saha bhānu bhāvaḥ śambhuḥ mahātmā jagataḥ variṣṭhaḥ
sa visphuliṅga utkara dhūma miśram mahā ulkā vajra aśani vāta tulyam

original: tato 'ṭṭahāsaṃ pramumoca ghoraṃ vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābham // RKV_16.4 //
analyzed: tatas ṭṭahāsam pramumoca ghoram vivṛtya vaktram vaḍavāmukha ābham
sahasra vajra aśani saṃnibhena tena aṭṭahāsena hara udgatena

original: āpūritāstatra diśo daśaiva saṃkṣobhitāḥ sarvamahārṇavāśca // RKV_16.5 //
analyzed: āpūritāḥ tatra diśaḥ daśa eva saṃkṣobhitāḥ sarva mahā arṇavāḥ ca

original: sa brahmalokaṃ prajagāma śabdo brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍaṃ pracacāla sarvam /
analyzed: sa brahma lokam prajagāma śabdaḥ brahmāṇḍa bhāṇḍam pracacāla sarvam
kim etat iti ākula cetanāḥ te vitrasta rūpāḥ ṛṣayaḥ babhūvuḥ

original: praṇamya sarve sahasaiva bhītā brahmāṇamūcuḥ parameśvareśam /
analyzed: praṇamya sarve sahasā eva bhītāḥ brahmāṇam ūcuḥ parameśvara īśam

original: bhītāśca sarve ṛṣayastataste surāsuraiścaiva mahoragaiśca // RKV_16.7 //
analyzed: bhītāḥ ca sarve ṛṣayaḥ tatas te sura asuraiḥ ca eva mahā uragaiḥ ca
vidyut prabhā bhāsura bhīṣaṇa aṅgaḥ kaḥ eṣa cikrīḍati bhū tala sthaḥ

original: kālānalaṃ gātramidaṃ dadhāno yasyāṭṭahāsena jagadvimūḍham // RKV_16.8 //
analyzed: kāla analam gātram idam dadhānaḥ yasya aṭṭahāsena jagat vimūḍham
vitrasta rūpam prababhau kṣaṇena saṃhartum icchet kim ayam trilokīm

original: sārdhaṃ tvayā saptabhirarṇakaiśca janastapaḥ satyamabhiprayāti // RKV_16.9 //
analyzed: sārdham tvayā saptabhiḥ arṇakaiḥ ca janaḥ tapaḥ satyam abhiprayāti

original: saṃhartukāmo hi ka eṣa deva etatsamastaṃ kathayāprameya /
analyzed: saṃhartu kāmaḥ hi kaḥ eṣa devaḥ etat samastam kathaya aprameya

original: na dṛṣṭametad viṣamaṃ kadāpi jānāsi tattvaṃ paramo mato naḥ // RKV_16.10 //
analyzed: na dṛṣṭam etat viṣamam kadāpi jānāsi tattvam paramaḥ mataḥ naḥ

original: niśamya tadvākyamathābabhāṣe brahmā samāśvāsya surādisaṅghān // RKV_16.11 //
analyzed: niśamya tad vākyam athā ābabhāṣe brahmā samāśvāsya sura ādi saṅghān
śrī brahmā uvāca

original: sa eṣa kālastridivaṃ tvaśeṣaṃ saṃhartukāmo jagadakṣayātmā /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa kālaḥ tridivam tu aśeṣam saṃhartu kāmaḥ jagat akṣaya ātmā

original: pūrṇe ca śete parivatsarāṇāṃ bhaviṣyatīśānavibhurna citram // RKV_16.12 //
analyzed: pūrṇe ca śete parivatsarāṇām bhaviṣyati īśāna vibhuḥ na citram

original: saṃvatsaro 'yaṃ parivatsaraśca udvatsaro vatsara eṣa devaḥ /
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ yam parivatsaraḥ ca udvatsaraḥ vatsaraḥ eṣa devaḥ

original: dṛṣṭo 'pyadṛṣṭaḥ prahutaḥ prakāśī sthūlaśca sūkṣmaḥ paramāṇureṣaḥ // RKV_16.13 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ u pi adṛṣṭaḥ prahutaḥ prakāśī sthūlaḥ ca sūkṣmaḥ paramāṇuḥ eṣaḥ

original: nātaḥ paraṃ kiṃcidihāsti loke parāparo 'yaṃ prabhurātmavādī /
analyzed: na atas param kiṃcid iha asti loke parāparaḥ yam prabhuḥ ātma vādī

original: tuṣyeta me kālasamānarūpa ityevamuktvā bhagavānsureśaḥ // RKV_16.14 //
analyzed: tuṣyeta me kāla samāna rūpaḥ iti evam uktvā bhagavān sureśaḥ

original: sanatkumārapramukhaiḥ sametaḥ saṃtoṣayāmāsa tato yatātmā // RKV_16.15 //
analyzed: sanatkumāra pramukhaiḥ sametaḥ saṃtoṣayāmāsa tatas yata ātmā
brahmā uvāca
namaḥ stu sarvāya hi aghora rūpāya namaḥ namaḥ te

original: sarvātmane sarva namonamaste mahātmane bhūtapate namaste // RKV_16.16 //
analyzed: sarvātmane sarva namaḥ namaḥ te mahātmane bhūtapate namaḥ te
oṅkāra huṅkāra pariṣkṛtāya svadhā vaṣaṭkāra namaḥ namaḥ te

original: guṇatrayeśāya maheśvarāya te trayīmayāya triguṇātmane namaḥ // RKV_16.17 //
analyzed: guṇatraya īśāya maheśvarāya te trayī mayāya triguṇa ātmane namaḥ

original: tvaṃ śaṅkaratvaṃ hi maheśvaro 'si pradhānamagryaṃ tvamasi praviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi si pradhānam agryam tvam asi praviṣṭaḥ

original: tvaṃ viṣṇurīśaḥ prapitāmahaśca tvaṃ saptajihvastvamanantajihvaḥ // RKV_16.18 //
analyzed: tvam viṣṇuḥ īśaḥ prapitāmahaḥ ca tvam saptajihvaḥ tvam ananta jihvaḥ

original: sraṣṭāsi sṛṣṭiśca vibho tvameva viśvasya vedyaṃ ca paraṃ nidhānam /
analyzed: sraṣṭā asi sṛṣṭiḥ ca vibho tvam eva viśvasya vedyam ca param nidhānam

original: āhurdvijā vedavido vareṇyaṃ parātparastvaṃ parataḥ paro 'si // RKV_16.19 //
analyzed: āhuḥ dvijāḥ veda vidaḥ vareṇyam parātparaḥ tvam paratas paraḥ si

original: sūkṣmātisūkṣmaṃ pravadanti yacca vāco nivartanti mano yataśca // RKV_16.20 //
analyzed: sūkṣma ati sūkṣmam pravadanti yat ca vācaḥ nivartanti manaḥ yatas ca
śrī mahādevaḥ uvāca

original: tvayā stuto'haṃ vividhaiśca mantraiḥ puṣṇāmi śāntiṃ tava padmayone /
analyzed: tvayā stutaḥ aham vividhaiḥ ca mantraiḥ puṣṇāmi śāntim tava padmayone

original: īkṣasva māṃ lokamimaṃ jvalantaṃ vaktrairanekaiḥ prasabhaṃ harantam // RKV_16.21 //
analyzed: īkṣasva mām lokam imam jvalantam vaktraiḥ anekaiḥ prasabham harantam

original: evamuktvā sa deveśo devyā saha jagatpatiḥ /
analyzed: evam uktvā sa deveśaḥ devyā saha jagatpatiḥ
pitāmaham samāśvāsya tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: idaṃ mahatpuṇyatamaṃ variṣṭhaṃ stotraṃ niśamyeha gatiṃ labhante /
analyzed: idam mahat puṇyatamam variṣṭham stotram niśamya iha gatim labhante

original: pāpairanekaiḥ pariveṣṭitā ye prayānti rudraṃ vimalairvimānaiḥ // RKV_16.23 //
analyzed: pāpaiḥ anekaiḥ pariveṣṭitāḥ ye prayānti rudram vimalaiḥ vimānaiḥ

original: bhayaṃ ca teṣāṃ na bhavetkadācitpaṭhanti ye tāta idaṃ dvijāgryāḥ /
analyzed: bhayam ca teṣām na bhavet kadācid paṭhanti ye tāta idam dvijāgryāḥ

original: saṅgrāmacaurāgnivane tathābdhau teṣāṃ śivastrāti na saṃśayo 'tra // RKV_16.24 //
analyzed: saṅgrāma caura agni vane tathā abdhau teṣām śivaḥ trāti na

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe narmadāmāhātmye brahmakṛtaśivastutivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe narmadāmāhātmye brahmakṛtaśivastutivarṇanam nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
evam saṃstūyamānaḥ tu brahma ādyaiḥ muni puṃgavaiḥ
brahma loka gataiḥ tatra saṃjahāra jagat prabhuḥ
sa tat bhīmam mahā raudram dakṣiṇam vaktram avyayam
mahā daṃṣṭra utkaṭa ārāvam pātāla tala saṃnibham
mahā jihvam mahā daṃṣṭram mahā sarpa śirodharam
grasat samudra nihita vāta vāri mayam haviḥ
vaḍavāmukha saṅkāśam mahādevasya tat mukham
jihvā agreṇa jagat sarvam lelihānam apaśyata
yojanānām sahasrāṇi sahasrāṇām śatāni ca
diśaḥ daśa mahā ghorāḥ māṃsa medaḥ vasā utkaṭāḥ
tasya daṃṣṭrā vyavardhata sahasraśas
sa asurān sura gandharvān sa yakṣa uraga rākṣasān
tasya daṃṣṭra agra saṃlagnān sa dadarśa pitāmahaḥ
danta yantra anta saṃviṣṭam vicūrṇita śirodharam

original: jagat paśyāmi rājendra viśantaṃ vyādite mukhe /
analyzed: jagat paśyāmi rāja indra viśantam vyādite mukhe
nānā taraṅga bhaṅga aṅgāḥ mahā phena ogha saṃkulāḥ

original: yathā nadyo layaṃ yānti samudraṃ prāpya sasvanāḥ // RKV_17.9 //
analyzed: yathā nadyaḥ layam yānti samudram prāpya sa svanāḥ
tathā tatam viśvam idam samastam aneka jīva arṇava durvigāhyam

original: viveśa rudrasya mukhaṃ viśālaṃ jvalattadugraṃ ghananādaghoram // RKV_17.10 //
analyzed: viveśa rudrasya mukham viśālam jvalat tat ugram ghana nāda ghoram
jvālāḥ tatas tasya mukhāt su ghorāḥ sa visphuliṅgāḥ bahulāḥ sa dhūmāḥ
aneka rūpāḥ jvalana prakāśāḥ pradīpayanti iva diśaḥ khilāḥ ca
tatas ravi jvāla sahasra māli babhūva vaktram cala jihva daṃṣṭram

original: maheśvarasyādbhutarūpiṇas tadā sa dvādaśātmā prababhūva ekaḥ // RKV_17.12 //
analyzed: maheśvarasya adbhuta rūpiṇaḥ tadā sa dvādaśātmā prababhūva ekaḥ
tatas te dvādaśa ādityāḥ rudra vaktrāt vinirgatāḥ
āśritya dakṣiṇām āśām nirdahantaḥ vasuṃdharām
bhaumam yat jīvanam kiṃcid nānā vṛkṣa tṛṇa ālayam
śuṣkam pūrvam anāvṛṣṭyā sakala ākula bhū talam
tat dīpyamānam sahasā sūryaiḥ taiḥ rudra sambhavaiḥ
dhūma ākulam abhūt sarvam praṇaṣṭa graha tārakam
jajvāla sahasā dīptam bhū maṇḍalam aśeṣatas
jvālā mālā ākulam sarvam abhūt etat carācaram

original: saptadvīpasamudreṣu saritsu ca sarassu ca agniratti jagatsarvamājyāhutimivādhvare // RKV_17.17 //
analyzed: sapta dvīpa samudreṣu saritsu ca sarassu ca agniḥ atti jagat sarvam ājya āhutim iva adhvare
viśāla tejasā dīptāḥ mahā jvālā samākulāḥ
dadahuḥ vai jagat sarvam ādityāḥ rudra sambhavāḥ
ādityānām raśmayaḥ ca saṃspṛṣṭāḥ vai parasparam
evam dadāha bhagavān trailokyam sa carācaram
sapta dvīpa pramāṇaḥ tu saḥ agniḥ bhūtvā maheśvaraḥ
sapta dvīpa samudra antām nirdadāha vasuṃdharām
sumeru mandara antām ca vasudhām tadā

original: bhittvā tu saptapātālaṃ nāgalokaṃ tato 'dahat // RKV_17.21 //
analyzed: bhittvā tu sapta pātālam nāga lokam tatas dahat
bhūmi adhas sapta pātālān nirdahan tārakaiḥ saha
cacāra agniḥ samantāt tu nirdahan vai yudhiṣṭhira
dhamyamānaḥ iva aṅgāraiḥ loha rātriḥ iva jvalan
tathā tat prājvalat sarvam saṃvarta agni pradīpitam
nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā bhūmiḥ niḥ nirjhara saraḥ sarit
viśīrṇa śaila śṛṅga oghā kūrma pṛṣṭha upamā abhavat
jvālā mālā ākulam kṛtvā jagat sarvam
mahā rūpa dharaḥ rudraḥ vyatiṣṭhata maheśvaraḥ
sa mātṛ gaṇa bhūyiṣṭhā sa yakṣa uraga rākṣasā

original: tato devī mahādevaṃ viveśa harilocanā // RKV_17.26 //
analyzed: tatas devī mahādevam viveśa hari locanā
nirvāṇam param āpannā śāntā iva śikhinaḥ śikhā

original: jagatsarvaṃ hi nirdagdhaṃ tribhirlokaiḥ sahānagha // RKV_17.27 //
analyzed: jagat sarvam hi nirdagdham tribhiḥ lokaiḥ saha anagha
rudra prasādāt muktvā mām narmadām ca api ayonijām

original: yugānāmayutaṃ devo mayā cādya bubhakṣaṇāt // RKV_17.28 //
analyzed: yugānām ayutam devaḥ mayā ca adya
purā hi ārādhitaḥ śūlī tena aham ajara amaraḥ

original: aghamarṣaṇaghoraṃ ca vāmadevaṃ ca tryambakam // RKV_17.29 //
analyzed: aghamarṣaṇa ghoram ca vāmadevam ca tryambakam

original: ṛṣabhaṃ trisuparṇaṃ ca durgāṃ sāvitrameva ca /
analyzed: ṛṣabham trisuparṇam ca durgām sāvitram eva ca
bṛhadāraṇyakam ca eva bṛhatsāma tathā uttaram
raudrīm parama gāyatrīm śiva upaniṣadam tathā

original: yathā pratirathaṃ sūktaṃ japtvā mṛtyuṃjayaṃ tathā // RKV_17.31 //
analyzed: yathā pratiratham sūktam japtvā mṛtyuṃjayam tathā
sarit sāgara paryantā vasudhā bhasmasātkṛtā
varjayitvā mahābhāgām narmadām amṛta upamām
mahendraḥ malayaḥ sahyaḥ hemakūṭaḥ mālyavān
vindhyaḥ ca pāriyātraḥ ca saptā ete kulaparvatāḥ
dvādaśa āditya nirdagdhāḥ śailāḥ śīrṇa śilāḥ pṛthak

original: bhasmībhūtāstu dṛśyante na naṣṭā narmadā tadā // RKV_17.34 //
analyzed: bhasmībhūtāḥ tu dṛśyante na naṣṭā narmadā tadā
himavān hemakūṭaḥ ca niṣadhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ

original: mālyavāṃśca giriśreṣṭho nīlaḥ śveto 'tha śṛṅgavān // RKV_17.35 //
analyzed: mālyavān ca giri śreṣṭhaḥ nīlaḥ śṛṅgavān
ete deva gandharva sevitāḥ
yugānta agni vinirdagdhāḥ sarve śīrṇa mahā śilāḥ

original: evaṃ mayā purā dṛṣṭo yugānte sarvasaṃkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: evam mayā purā dṛṣṭaḥ yuga ante sarva saṃkṣayaḥ
varjayitvā mahā puṇyām narmadām nṛpa sattama

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śrīnarmadāmāhātmye dvādaśādityarūpeṇa jagatsaṃharaṇavarṇanaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śrī narmadāmāhātmye dvādaśa āditya rūpeṇa jagat saṃharaṇa varṇanam
nāma saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
nirdagdhe smin tatas loke sūryaiḥ īśvara sambhavaiḥ
saptabhiḥ ca arṇavaiḥ śuṣkaiḥ dvīpaiḥ saptabhiḥ eva ca

original: tato mukhāt tasya ghanā maholbaṇā niścerurindrāyudhatulyarūpāḥ /
analyzed: tatas mukhāt tasya ghanāḥ mahā ulbaṇāḥ niśceruḥ indrāyudha tulya rūpāḥ

original: ghorāḥ payodā jagadandhakāraṃ kurvanta īśānavaraprayuktāḥ // RKV_18.2 //
analyzed: ghorāḥ payodāḥ jagat andhakāram kurvantaḥ īśāna vara prayuktāḥ
nīlotpala ābhāḥ kvacid aṃjana ābhāḥ go kṣīra kunda indu nibhāḥ ca kecid
mayūra candra ākṛtayaḥ tathā nye kecid vidhūma anala saprabhāḥ ca
kecid mahā parvata kalpa rūpāḥ kecid mahā mīna kula upamāḥ ca
kecid gaja indra ākṛtayaḥ surūpāḥ kecid mahā kūṭa nibhāḥ payodāḥ
calat taraṅga ūrmi samāna rūpāḥ mahā purodhāna nibhāḥ ca kecid
sa gopura aṭṭālaka saṃnikāśāḥ sa vidyut ulkā aśani maṇḍita antāḥ

original: samāvṛtāṅgaḥ sa babhūva devaḥ saṃvartakonāma gaṇaḥ sa raudraḥ /
analyzed: samāvṛta aṅgaḥ sa babhūva devaḥ saṃvartakaḥ nāma gaṇaḥ sa raudraḥ
pravarṣamāṇaḥ jagat apramāṇam ekārṇavam sarvam idam cakāra
tatas mahā megha vivardhamānam īśānam indra aśanibhiḥ vṛta aṅgam

original: dadarśa nāhaṃ bhayavihvalāṅgo gaṅgājalaughaiśca samāvṛtāṅgaḥ // RKV_18.7 //
analyzed: dadarśa na aham bhaya vihvala aṅgaḥ gaṅgā jala oghaiḥ ca samāvṛta aṅgaḥ

original: gajāḥ punaścaiva punaḥ pibanto jagat samantāt paridahyamānam /
analyzed: gajāḥ punar ca eva punar pibantaḥ jagat samantāt paridahyamānam

original: āpūritaṃ caiva jagat samantāt sarvaiśca tairjagmuradarśanaṃ ca te // RKV_18.8 //
analyzed: āpūritam ca eva jagat samantāt sarvaiḥ ca taiḥ jagmuḥ adarśanam ca te

original: mahārṇavāḥ sapta sarāṃsi dvīpā nadyo 'tha sarvā atha bhūrbhuvaśca /
analyzed: mahā arṇavāḥ sapta sarāṃsi dvīpāḥ nadyaḥ sarvāḥ atha bhūḥ bhuvaḥ ca

original: āpūryamāṇāḥ salilaughajālair ekārṇavaṃ sarvamidaṃ babhūva // RKV_18.9 //
analyzed: āpūryamāṇāḥ salila ogha jālaiḥ ekārṇavam sarvam idam babhūva

original: na dṛśyate kiṃcidaho carācaraṃ niragnicandrārkamaye 'pi loke /
analyzed: na dṛśyate kiṃcid aho carācaram niragni candra arka maye loke
praṇaṣṭa nakṣatra tamaḥ ndhakāre praśānta vāta astamita eka nīḍeḥ

original: mahājalaughe 'sya viśuddhasattvā stutirmayā bhūpa kṛtā tadānīm /
analyzed: mahā jala oghe viśuddha sattvā stutiḥ mayā bhūpa kṛtā tadānīm

original: tato'hamityeva vicintayānaḥ śaraṇyam ekaṃ kva nu yāmi śāntam // RKV_18.11 //
analyzed: tatas ham iti eva vicintayānaḥ śaraṇyam ekam kva nu yāmi śāntam

original: smarāmi devaṃ hṛdi cintayitvā prabhuṃ śaraṇyaṃ jalasaṃniviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: smarāmi devam hṛdi cintayitvā prabhum śaraṇyam jala saṃniviṣṭaḥ

original: namāmi devaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye dhyānaṃ ca tasyeti kṛtaṃ mayā ca // RKV_18.12 //

analyzed: gaccha tvam pṛcchatām tām kva āgatā kva ca gamiṣyasi
preṣitaḥ tvaritaḥ dūtaḥ gataḥ nārī samīpataḥ
vṛkṣa sthām dadṛśaḥ bālām uvāca nṛpa sattama

original: mannāthaḥ pṛcchati tvāṃ tu kāsi tvaṃ kva gamiṣyasi // RKV_85.49 //
analyzed: mad nāthaḥ pṛcchati tvām tu kā asi tvam kva gamiṣyasi
kanyā uvāca
guruḥ ātmavatām śāstā rājā śāstā durātmanām

original: iha pracchan na pāpānāṃ śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ // RKV_85.50 //
analyzed: iha pracchan na pāpānām śāstā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ
brahmahatyā ca saṃjātā mṛga rūpa dhara dvijāt

original: mayā yukto 'pi te rājā muktastīrthaprabhāvataḥ // RKV_85.51 //
analyzed: mayā yuktaḥ pi te rājā muktaḥ tīrtha prabhāvataḥ
ardha krośa antarāt madhye brahmahatyā na saṃviśet
somanātha prabhāvaḥ yam vārāṇasyāḥ samaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: gaccha tvaṃ preṣyatāṃ rājā śīghram atra na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: gaccha tvam preṣyatām rājā śīghram atra na saṃśayaḥ

original: gato bhṛtyastataḥ śīghraṃ vepamānaḥ suvihvalaḥ // RKV_85.53 //
analyzed: gataḥ bhṛtyaḥ tatas śīghram vepamānaḥ su vihvalaḥ
samastam kathayāmāsa yat vṛttam hi purātanam

original: tasya vākyādasau rājā patito dharaṇītale // RKV_85.54 //
analyzed: tasya vākyāt asau rājā patitaḥ dharaṇī tale
bhṛtyaḥ uvāca

original: kasmāt tvaṃ śocase nātha pūrvopāttaṃ śubhāśubham /
analyzed: kasmāt tvam śocase nātha pūrva upāttam śubha aśubham

original: ityākarṇya vacastasya rājā vacanam abravīt // RKV_85.55 //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya vacaḥ tasya rājā vacanam abravīt
prāṇatyāgam kariṣyāmi somanātha samīpataḥ
śīghram ānīyatām vahniḥ indhanāni bahūni ca
ānītam tad kṣaṇāt sarvam bhṛtyaiḥ tad vaśa vartibhiḥ

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā śubhe toye saṅgame pāpanāśane // RKV_85.57 //
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā śubhe toye saṅgame pāpa nāśane
arcitaḥ parayā bhaktyā soma nāthaḥ mahībhṛtā
tris pradakṣiṇatas kṛtvā jvalantam jātavedasam
praviṣṭaḥ kaṇva rājā asau hṛdi dhyātvā janārdanam
pīta ambara dharam devam jaṭā mukuṭa dhāriṇam
śriyā yuktam suparṇa stham śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: surārisūdanaṃ dadhyau sugatir me bhavatviti // RKV_85.60 //
analyzed: surāri sūdanam dadhyau su gatiḥ me bhavatu iti
papāta puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ tu sādhu sādhu nṛpa ātmaja

original: āścaryamatulaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirīkṣya ca parasparam // RKV_85.61 //
analyzed: āścaryam atulam dṛṣṭvā nirīkṣya ca parasparam

original: mṛtaṃ taiḥ pāvake bhṛtyairhṛdi dhyātvā gadādharam /
analyzed: mṛtam taiḥ pāvake bhṛtyaiḥ hṛdi dhyātvā gadādharam

original: vimānasthās tataḥ sarve saṃjātāḥ pāṇḍunandana // RKV_85.62 //
analyzed: vimāna sthāḥ tatas sarve saṃjātāḥ pāṇḍu nandana

original: brāhmaṇe saṅgame tatra dhyāyamāne vṛṣadhvajam // RKV_85.63 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇe saṅgame tatra dhyāyamāne vṛṣadhvajam
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
somanātha prabhāvaḥ yam śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ vidhim

original: aṣṭamyāṃ vā caturdaśyāṃ sarvakālaṃ raverdine // RKV_85.64 //
analyzed: aṣṭamyām vā caturdaśyām sarvakālam raveḥ dine
viśeṣāt śuklapakṣe ced sūryavāreṇa saptamī

original: upoṣya yo naro bhaktyā rātrau kurvīta jāgaram // RKV_85.65 //
analyzed: upoṣya yaḥ naraḥ bhaktyā rātrau kurvīta jāgaram

original: śrīkhaṇḍena tato guṇṭhya puṣpadhūpādikaṃ dadet // RKV_85.66 //
analyzed: śrīkhaṇḍena tatas guṇṭhya puṣpa dhūpa ādikam dadet

original: ghṛtena bodhayed dīpaṃ nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ ca kārayet /
analyzed: ghṛtena bodhayet dīpam nṛtyam gītam ca kārayet

original: somavāre tathāṣṭamyāṃ prabhāte pūjayed dvijān // RKV_85.67 //
analyzed: somavāre tathā aṣṭamyām prabhāte pūjayet dvijān
jita krodhān ātmavataḥ para nindā vivarjitān
sarva aṅga rucirān śastān sva dāra paripālakān
gāyatrī pāṭha mātrān ca vikarma viratān sadā
punarbhū vṛṣalī śūdrī careyuḥ yasya mandire
dūratas sau dvijaḥ tyājyaḥ ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ icchatā

original: hīnāṅgān atiriktāṅgān yeṣāṃ pūrvāparaṃ na hi // RKV_85.70 //
analyzed: hīna aṅgān atirikta aṅgān yeṣām pūrva aparam na hi

original: vrate śrāddhe tathā dāne dūratastān vivarjayet /
analyzed: vrate śrāddhe tathā dāne dūratas tān vivarjayet

original: āyasī taruṇī tulyā dvijāḥ svādhyāyavarjitāḥ // RKV_85.71 //
analyzed: āyasī taruṇī tulyā dvijāḥ svādhyāya varjitāḥ

original: ātmānaṃ saha yājyena pātayanti na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam saha yājyena pātayanti na saṃśayaḥ

original: dātāraṃ ca tathātmānaṃ tārayanti taranti ca /
analyzed: dātāram ca tathā ātmānam tārayanti taranti ca

original: śrāddhaṃ someśvare pārtha yaḥ kuryādgatamatsaraḥ // RKV_85.73 //
analyzed: śrāddham someśvare pārtha yaḥ kuryāt gata matsaraḥ
pretāḥ tasya hi su prītāḥ yāvat ābhūtasamplavam

original: annaṃ vastraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca yo dadyād agrajanmane // RKV_85.74 //
analyzed: annam vastram hiraṇyam ca yaḥ dadyāt agrajanmane

original: sa yāti śāṅkare loka iti me satyabhāṣitam /
analyzed: sa yāti śāṅkare loke iti me satya bhāṣitam

original: hayaṃ yo yacchate tatra sampūrṇaṃ taruṇaṃ sitam // RKV_85.75 //
analyzed: hayam yaḥ yacchate tatra sampūrṇam taruṇam sitam
raktam vā pīta varṇam vā sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
kuṅkumena vilipta aṅgau agrajanma hayau api
sraj dāma bhūṣitau kāryau sita vastra avaguṇṭhitau

original: aṅghriḥ pradīyatāṃ skandhe madīye hayamāruha // RKV_85.77 //
analyzed: aṅghriḥ pradīyatām skandhe madīye hayam āruha
ārūḍhe brāhmaṇe brūyāt bhāskaraḥ prīyatām iti

original: sa yāti śāṃkaraṃ lokaṃ sarvapāpavivarjitaḥ // RKV_85.78 //
analyzed: sa yāti śāṃkaram lokam sarva pāpa vivarjitaḥ

original: uparāge tu somasya tīrthaṃ gatvā jitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: uparāge tu somasya tīrtham gatvā jita indriyaḥ

original: satyalokāc cyutaścāpi rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // RKV_85.79 //
analyzed: satya lokāt cyutaḥ ca api rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ

original: śabalāṃ pītavarṇāṃ ca dhūmrāṃ vā nīlakarburām // RKV_85.82 //
analyzed: śabalām pīta varṇām ca dhūmrām vā nīla karburām

original: śabalā pītavarṇā ca duḥkhaghnyau saṃprakīrtite // RKV_85.84 //
analyzed: śabalā pīta varṇā ca duḥkha ghnyau saṃprakīrtite

original: dinakṣaye gajacchāyāṃ grahaṇe bhāskarasya ca // RKV_85.86 //
analyzed: dinakṣaye gajacchāyām grahaṇe bhāskarasya ca
ye vrajanti mahātmānaḥ saṅgame sura durlabhe

original: mṛdāvaguṇṭhayitvā tu cātmānaṃ saṅgame viśet // RKV_85.87 //

analyzed: te pi pāpaiḥ pramucyante iti evam śaṅkaraḥ bravīt

analyzed: bhrūṇa hā svarṇa hartā ca mucyante na atra saṃśayaḥ

analyzed: nā ekā api nṛpa loke smin bhrūṇahatyā su dustyajā

analyzed: tatas siddhim parām prāpya prabhāse tu tṛtīyakam

original: mucyate sarvapāpebhyas tīrthaṃ kṛtvā paraṃ nṛpa // RKV_85.98 //
analyzed: mucyate sarva pāpebhyaḥ tīrtham kṛtvā param nṛpa

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe somanāthatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe somanāthatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma pañcāśītitamaḥ

rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet mahā rāja piṅgalāvartam uttamam
saṅgamasya samīpa stham revāyāḥ uttare taṭe
havyavāhena rāja indra sthāpitaḥ piṅgaleśvaraḥ

original: etadākhyāhi me sarvaṃ prasādād vaktum arhasi // RKV_86.2 //
analyzed: etat ākhyāhi me sarvam prasādāt vaktum arhasi
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
śambhunā retasā rājan tarpitaḥ havyavāhanaḥ
prāpta saukhyena raudreṇa gaurī ākrīḍana cetasā
havyavāha mukhe kṣiptam rudreṇa amita tejasā
rudrasya retasā dagdhaḥ tīrtha yātrā kṛta ādaraḥ

original: cacāra parayā bhaktyā dhyānamugraṃ hutāśanaḥ // RKV_86.5 //
analyzed: cacāra parayā bhaktyā dhyānam ugram hutāśanaḥ
vāyubhakṣaḥ śatam sāgram yāvat tepe hutāśanaḥ

original: saṃnidhau samupetyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // RKV_86.6 //
analyzed: saṃnidhau samupetya atha vacanam ca idam abravīt
īśvaraḥ uvāca

original: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva havyāśa yaste manasi vartate // RKV_86.7 //
analyzed: varam vṛṇīṣva havyāśa yaḥ te manasi vartate
vahniḥ uvāca
namaḥ te sarva lokeśaḥ ugra mūrte namaḥ stu te

original: retasā tava saṃdagdhaḥ kuṣṭhī jāto maheśvara /
analyzed: retasā tava saṃdagdhaḥ kuṣṭhī jātaḥ maheśvara

original: kṛpāṃ kuru mahādeva mama rogaṃ vināśaya // RKV_86.8 //
analyzed: kṛpām kuru mahādeva mama rogam vināśaya
īśvaraḥ uvāca
havyavāha bhava arogaḥ mad prasādāt ca satvaram

original: atra tīrthe kṛtasnānaḥ svarūpaṃ pratipatsyase // RKV_86.9 //
analyzed: atra tīrthe kṛta snānaḥ sva rūpam pratipatsyase
iti uktvā ca mahādevaḥ tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: anantaraṃ havyavāhaḥ sasnau revājale tvaran // RKV_86.10 //
analyzed: anantaram havyavāhaḥ sasnau revā jale tvaran

original: sthāpayāmāsa deveśaṃ sa vahniḥ piṅgaleśvaram // RKV_86.11 //
analyzed: sthāpayāmāsa deveśam sa vahniḥ piṅgaleśvaram

original: tato jagāma deśaṃ svaṃ devānāṃ havyavāhanaḥ // RKV_86.12 //
analyzed: tatas jagāma deśam svam devānām havyavāhanaḥ
havyavāhena bhūpa evam sthāpitaḥ piṅgaleśvaraḥ

original: jitakrodho hi yastatra upavāsaṃ samācaret // RKV_86.13 //
analyzed: jita krodhaḥ hi yaḥ tatra upavāsam samācaret

original: guṇānvitāya viprāya kapilāṃ tatra bhārata // RKV_86.14 //
analyzed: guṇa anvitāya viprāya kapilām tatra bhārata

original: yaḥ prayacchati rājendra sa gacchetparamāṃ gatim // RKV_86.15 //
analyzed: yaḥ prayacchati rāja indra sa gacchet paramām gatim

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe piṅgaleśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe piṅgaleśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ṣaḍaśītitamaḥ

sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kartā ca svayam sākṣāt maheśvaraḥ
ṛṣi madhya gataḥ devi tapaḥ tapati duṣkaram
saḥ u pi rudra tvam āyāti samprāpte bhūta viplave
indraḥ pi śaptaḥ tena eva durvāsasā varānane

original: dvitīyasya tu putrasya sambhavaḥ kathito mayā // RKV_103.106 //
analyzed: dvitīyasya tu putrasya sambhavaḥ kathitaḥ mayā
dattātreya sva rūpeṇa bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
jagat vyāpī jagannāthaḥ svayam sākṣāt janārdanaḥ
ete devāḥ trayaḥ putrāḥ anasūyāyāḥ maheśvari

original: varadānena te devā hyavatīrṇā mahītale // RKV_103.108 //
analyzed: vara dānena te devāḥ hi avatīrṇāḥ mahī tale
putraprāptikaram tīrtham revāyāḥ ca uttare taṭe
anasūyā kṛtam pārtha sarva pāpa kṣayam param
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
āścarya bhūtam loke smin narmadāyām purātanam

original: bhrūṇahatyā gatā tatra brāhmaṇasya narādhipa // RKV_103.110 //
analyzed: bhrūṇahatyā gatā tatra brāhmaṇasya narādhipa
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca
itihāsam dvijaśreṣṭha kathayasva mama anagha

original: sarvapāpaharaṃ loke duḥkhārtasya ca kathyatām // RKV_103.111 //
analyzed: sarva pāpa haram loke duḥkha ārtasya ca kathyatām
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
suvarṇaśilake grāme gautama anvaya sambhavaḥ
kṛṣīvalaḥ mahādevi bhāryā putra samanvitaḥ

original: vasate tatra govindaḥ saṃjāto vipule kule /
analyzed: vasate tatra govindaḥ saṃjātaḥ vipule kule
putra dāra samopetaḥ gṛha kṣetra rataḥ sadā
śakaṭam pūrayitvā tu kāṣṭhānām agamat guham

original: prakṣiptāni ca kāṣṭhāni hyekākī kṣudhayānvitaḥ // RKV_103.114 //
analyzed: prakṣiptāni ca kāṣṭhāni hi ekākī kṣudhayā anvitaḥ
riṅgamāṇaḥ tadā putraḥ pituḥ śabdāt samāgataḥ

original: na dṛṣṭastena vai putraḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ saṃchādito 'vaśaḥ // RKV_103.115 //
analyzed: na dṛṣṭaḥ tena vai putraḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ saṃchāditaḥ vaśaḥ
āgataḥ tvaritaḥ gehe pipāsā ārtaḥ narādhipa

original: śakaṭaṃ mocya taddvāri savṛṣaṃ rajjusaṃyutam // RKV_103.116 //
analyzed: śakaṭam mocya tad dvāri sa vṛṣam rajju saṃyutam

original: bhāryā tasyaiva yā dṛṣṭā cittajñā vaśavartinī /
analyzed: bhāryā tasya eva yā dṛṣṭā citta jñā vaśa vartinī
dṛṣṭvā nipātitam putram kāṣṭhaiḥ nirbhinna mastakam
a jalpamāna a karuṇam nikṣiptam śiśum

original: śuśrūṣaṇe ratā sādhvī priyasya ca narādhipa // RKV_103.118 //
analyzed: śuśrūṣaṇe ratā sādhvī priyasya ca narādhipa
tatas snāna ādikam kṛtvā bhojanāt śayanam śubham

original: putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭhā hyutthāpayati śāsanaiḥ // RKV_103.119 //
analyzed: putram putravatām śreṣṭhā hi utthāpayati śāsanaiḥ

original: yadā ca notthitaḥ suptaḥ putraḥ pañcatvamāgataḥ /
analyzed: yadā ca na utthitaḥ suptaḥ putraḥ pañcatvam āgataḥ

original: tadā sā dīnavadanā ruroda ca mumoha ca // RKV_103.120 //
analyzed: tadā sā dīna vadanā ruroda ca mumoha ca
tat śrutvā ruditam śabdam govindaḥ trasta mānasaḥ

original: kimetaditi coktvā tu patito dharaṇītale // RKV_103.121 //
analyzed: kim etat iti ca uktvā tu patitaḥ dharaṇī tale

original: dvāvetau muktakeśau tu bhūmau nipatitau nṛpa /
analyzed: dvau etau mukta keśau tu bhūmau nipatitau nṛpa

original: vilepāte ca rājendra niḥśvāsocchvāsitena ca // RKV_103.122 //
analyzed: vilepāte ca rāja indra niḥśvāsa ucchvāsi tena ca

original: kaṃ paśye prāṅgaṇe putraṃ dṛṣṭvā krīḍantamāturam /
analyzed: kam paśye prāṅgaṇe putram dṛṣṭvā krīḍantam āturam

original: saṃdhārayiṣye hṛdayaṃ sphuṭitaṃ tava kāraṇe // RKV_103.123 //
analyzed: saṃdhārayiṣye hṛdayam sphuṭitam tava kāraṇe
tvad janma antam yaśaḥ nityam akṣayām kula santatim

original: dṛṣṭvā kim anṛṇībhūto yāsyāmi paramāṃ gatim // RKV_103.124 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kim anṛṇībhūtaḥ yāsyāmi paramām gatim

original: mama vṛddhasya dīnasya gatistvaṃ kila putraka /
analyzed: mama vṛddhasya dīnasya gatiḥ tvam kila putraka

original: ete manorathāḥ sarve cintitā viphalā gatāḥ // RKV_103.125 //
analyzed: ete manorathāḥ sarve cintitāḥ viphalāḥ gatāḥ

original: imāṃ tu vikalāṃ dīnāṃ vihīnāṃ sutabāndhavaiḥ /
analyzed: imām tu vikalām dīnām vihīnām suta bāndhavaiḥ

original: rudantīṃ patitāṃ pāhi mātaraṃ dharaṇītale // RKV_103.126 //
analyzed: rudantīm patitām pāhi mātaram dharaṇī tale
punnāmnaḥ narakāt yasmāt pitaram trāyate sutaḥ

original: tena putra iti proktaḥ svayameva svayambhuvā // RKV_103.127 //
analyzed: tena putraḥ iti proktaḥ svayam eva svayambhuvā

original: aputrasya gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ diśaḥ śūnyā hyabāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: aputrasya gṛham śūnyam diśaḥ śūnyāḥ hi abāndhavāḥ

original: mūrkhasya hṛdayaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaśūnyaṃ daridratā // RKV_103.128 //
analyzed: mūrkhasya hṛdayam śūnyam sarva śūnyam daridra tā
mṛṣā ayam vadate lokaḥ candanam kila śītalam
putra gātra pariṣvaṅgaḥ candanāt api śītalaḥ
śmaśru grahaṇa krīḍantam dhūli dhūsarita ānanam
puṇya hīnāḥ na paśyanti nija utsaṅga samāsthitam
digambaram gata vrīḍam jaṭilam dhūli dhūsaram
puṇya hīnāḥ na paśyanti gaṅgādharam iva ātmajam
vīṇā vādya svaraḥ loke su svaraḥ śrūyate kila
ruditam bālakasya eva tasmāt āhlāda kārakam
mṛga pakṣiṣu kākeṣu paśūnām svara yoniṣu

original: putraṃ teṣu samasteṣu vallabhaṃ bruvate budhāḥ // RKV_103.133 //
analyzed: putram teṣu samasteṣu vallabham bruvate budhāḥ
matsya aśva prakarāḥ ca eva kūrma grāha ādayaḥ vā

original: putrotpattau ca hṛṣyanti vipattau yānti duḥkhitām // RKV_103.134 //
analyzed: putra utpattau ca hṛṣyanti vipattau yānti duḥkhi tām
deva gandharva yakṣāḥ ca hṛṣyante putra janmani

original: pañcatve te 'pi śocanti mandabhāgyo 'smi putraka // RKV_103.135 //
analyzed: pañcatve te pi śocanti mandabhāgyaḥ smi putraka
ṛṣi melāpakam cakre putra arthe rāghavaḥ nṛpa

original: indrasthāne sthitastasya prokṣate hyāsanaṃ yataḥ // RKV_103.136 //
analyzed: indra sthāne sthitaḥ tasya prokṣate hi āsanam yatas

original: svargavāsaṃ sutādbāhyaṃ vidyate na tu pāṇḍava /
analyzed: svarga vāsam sutāt bāhyam vidyate na tu pāṇḍava

original: cakre daśarathas tasmāt putrārthaṃ yajñamuttamam // RKV_103.137 //
analyzed: cakre daśarathaḥ tasmāt putra artham yajñam uttamam
rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇa śatrughnau bharataḥ tatra sambhavāt
kārtavīryaḥ jitaḥ yena rāmeṇa amita tejasā
sa rāmaḥ rāmacandreṇa aṣṭa varṣeṇa nirjitaḥ

original: ekākinā hato vālī plavagaḥ śatrudurjayaḥ // RKV_103.139 //
analyzed: ekākinā hataḥ vālī plavagaḥ śatru durjayaḥ
rāvaṇaḥ brahma putraḥ yaḥ trailokyam yasya śaṅkate

original: hataḥ sa rāmacandreṇa saputraḥ sahabāndhavaḥ // RKV_103.140 //
analyzed: hataḥ sa rāmacandreṇa sa putraḥ saha bāndhavaḥ

original: evaṃ putraṃ vinā saukhyaṃ martyaloke na vidyate /
analyzed: evam putram vinā saukhyam martya loke na vidyate

original: vaṃśārthe maithunaṃ yasya svargārthe yasya bhāratī // RKV_103.141 //
analyzed: vaṃśa arthe maithunam yasya svarga arthe yasya bhāratī

original: mṛṣṭānnaṃ brāhmaṇasyārthe svarge vāsaṃ tu yānti te /
analyzed: mṛṣṭa annam brāhmaṇasya arthe svarge vāsam tu yānti te
brahmahatyā aśvamedhābhyām na param pāpa puṇyayoḥ
putra utpatti vipattibhyām na param sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: kiṃ bravīmīti bho vatsa na tu saukhyaṃ sutaṃ vinā // RKV_103.143 //
analyzed: kim bravīmi iti bho vatsa na tu saukhyam sutam vinā
evam bahuvidham duḥkham pralapitvā punar punar

original: janaiścāśvāsito vipro bālaṃ gṛhya bahirgataḥ // RKV_103.144 //
analyzed: janaiḥ ca āśvāsitaḥ vipraḥ bālam gṛhya bahis gataḥ

original: tataḥ saṃskṛtya taṃ bālaṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā /
analyzed: tatas saṃskṛtya tam bālam vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: samavetau tu duḥkhārtāvāgatau svagṛhaṃ punaḥ // RKV_103.145 //
analyzed: samavetau tu duḥkha ārtau āgatau sva gṛham punar
evam gṛha āgate vipre rātriḥ jātā yudhiṣṭhira

original: bhūmau prasupto govindaḥ putraśokena pīḍitaḥ // RKV_103.146 //
analyzed: bhūmau prasuptaḥ govindaḥ putra śokena pīḍitaḥ
yāvat nirīkṣate bhāryā bhartāram duḥkha pīḍitam
kṛmi rāśi gatam sarvam govindam samapaśyata
duḥkhāt duḥkhatare magnā dṛṣṭvā tam pātaka anvitam

original: evaṃ duḥkhanimagnāyāḥ śarvarī vigatā tadā // RKV_103.148 //
analyzed: evam duḥkha nimagnāyāḥ śarvarī vigatā tadā
paśupālaḥ tu mahiṣīm uktvā araṇye gamat gṛhāt

original: araṇye mahiṣīḥ sarvā rakṣayitvā gṛhāgataḥ // RKV_103.149 //
analyzed: araṇye mahiṣīḥ sarvāḥ rakṣayitvā gṛha āgataḥ
vijñaptaḥ paśupālena govindaḥ brāhmaṇa uttamaḥ
yāvat bhokṣyāmi aham svāmin mahiṣīḥ tvam ca rakṣase

original: tataḥ sa tvarito vipro jagāma mahiṣīḥ prati /
analyzed: tatas sa tvaritaḥ vipraḥ jagāma mahiṣīḥ prati

original: na tatra mahiṣīḥ paśyet paścāt kṣetrābhisammukham // RKV_103.151 //
analyzed: na tatra mahiṣīḥ paśyet paścāt kṣetra abhisammukham
dhāvamānaḥ ca vipraḥ tu eraṇḍīsaṅgame gataḥ

original: tataḥ praviṣṭastu jale revairaṇḍyostu saṅgame // RKV_103.152 //
analyzed: tatas praviṣṭaḥ tu jale revā eraṇḍyoḥ tu saṅgame
tat jalam pīta mātram tu tvarayā ca atitarṣitaḥ

original: akāmāt salilaṃ pītvā prakṣālya nayane śubhe // RKV_103.153 //
analyzed: akāmāt salilam pītvā prakṣālya nayane śubhe
ājagāma tatas paścāt bhavanam divasakṣaye

original: bhuktvā duḥkhānvito rātrau govindaḥ śayanaṃ yayau // RKV_103.154 //
analyzed: bhuktvā duḥkha anvitaḥ rātrau govindaḥ śayanam yayau
nidrā abhibhūtaḥ śokena śrameṇa eva tu kheditaḥ

original: punastaccārdharātre tu tasya bhāryā yudhiṣṭhira // RKV_103.155 //
analyzed: punar tat ca ardharātre tu tasya bhāryā yudhiṣṭhira
kṛmibhiḥ veṣṭitam kvacid

original: punaḥ sā vismayāviṣṭā tasya bhāryā guṇānvitā /
analyzed: punar sā vismaya āviṣṭā tasya bhāryā guṇa anvitā
uvāca duṣkṛtam tasya sādhvasa āviṣṭa cetasā
bhāryā uvāca

original: atīte pañcame cāhni tvindhanaṃ kṣipatastu te /
analyzed: atīte pañcame ca ahni tu indhanam kṣipataḥ tu te
gṛha paścāt gataḥ bālaḥ hi ajñānāt ghātitaḥ tvayā

original: mayā tatpātakaṃ ghoraṃ rahasyaṃ na prakāśitam /
analyzed: mayā tat pātakam ghoram rahasyam na prakāśitam
tena pracchanna pāpena dahyamānā divāniśam

original: na sukhaṃ tava gātrasya paśyāmi na hi cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: na sukham tava gātrasya paśyāmi na hi ca ātmanaḥ

original: nidrā mama śamaṃ yātā ratiścaiva tvayā saha // RKV_103.159 //
analyzed: nidrā mama śamam yātā ratiḥ ca eva tvayā saha

original: śrūyate mānave śāstre śloko gīto maharṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: śrūyate mānave śāstre ślokaḥ gītaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: smṛtvā smṛtvā tu taṃ citte paritāpo na śāmyati // RKV_103.160 //
analyzed: smṛtvā smṛtvā tu tam citte paritāpaḥ na śāmyati
kīrtanāt naśyate dharmaḥ vardhate sau nigūhanāt

original: iha loke pare caiva pāpasyāpyevameva ca // RKV_103.161 //
analyzed: iha loke pare ca eva pāpasya api evam eva ca
evam sthitā rātrau bhaya āturā

original: kṛmirāśigataṃ tvāṃ hi kasyāhaṃ kathayāmi kim // RKV_103.162 //
analyzed: kṛmi rāśi gatam tvām hi kasya aham kathayāmi kim
punar tvam ca adya me dṛṣṭaḥ bhrūṇahatyā kṛmi śritaḥ

original: kvacidbhindanti te gātraṃ kvacinnaṣṭāḥ samantataḥ // RKV_103.163 //
analyzed: kvacid bhindanti te gātram kvacid naṣṭāḥ samantataḥ
etat saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya vimṛśāmi punar punar

original: na jāne kāraṇaṃ kiṃcitpṛcchantyāḥ kathayasva me // RKV_103.164 //
analyzed: na jāne kāraṇam kiṃcid pṛcchantyāḥ kathayasva me

original: taḍāgaṃ vā saridvāpi tīrthaṃ vā devatārcanam /
analyzed: taḍāgam vā sarit vā api tīrtham vā devatā arcanam

original: yaṃ gato 'si prabhāvo 'yaṃ tasya nānyasya me sthitam // RKV_103.165 //
analyzed: yam gataḥ si prabhāvaḥ yam tasya na anyasya me sthitam
evam uktaḥ tu vipraḥ sau kathayāmāsa bhārata

original: bhāryāyā yaddivā vṛttaṃ śaṅkamāno nṛpottama // RKV_103.166 //
analyzed: bhāryāyāḥ yat divā vṛttam śaṅkamānaḥ nṛpa uttama
adya aham mahiṣī sārtham eraṇḍīsaṅgamam gataḥ

original: nābhimātre jale gatvā pītavānsalilaṃ bahu // RKV_103.167 //
analyzed: nābhi mātre jale gatvā pītavān salilam bahu

original: nānyattīrthaṃ vijānāmi saritaṃ sara eva vā /
analyzed: na anyat tīrtham vijānāmi saritam saraḥ eva vā

original: satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ kathitaṃ tava bhāmini // RKV_103.168 //
analyzed: satyam satyam punar satyam kathitam tava bhāmini
evam jñātvā tu sā sarvam upavāsa kṛtakṣaṇā
sa patnīkaḥ gataḥ tatra saṅgame varavarṇini

original: snātvā tatra jale ramye natvā devaṃ tu bhāskaram /
analyzed: snātvā tatra jale ramye natvā devam tu bhāskaram

original: snāpayāmāsa deveśaṃ śaṅkaraṃ comayā saha // RKV_103.170 //
analyzed: snāpayāmāsa deveśam śaṅkaram ca umayā saha
pañcagavya ghṛta kṣīraiḥ dadhi kṣaudra ghṛtaiḥ jalaiḥ
gandha mālya ādi dhūpaiḥ ca naivedyaiḥ ca su śobhanaiḥ

original: pūjya trayīmayaṃ liṅgaṃ devīṃ kātyāyanīṃ śubhām /
analyzed: pūjya trayī mayam liṅgam devīm kātyāyanīm śubhām

original: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā patyāsi pativratā // RKV_103.172 //
analyzed: rātrau jāgaraṇam kṛtvā patyā asi pativratā
tatas prabhāte vimale dvijān sampūjya yatnatas
go dānena hiraṇyena vastreṇa annena bhārata
govindaḥ pūjayāmāsa sva śaktyā brāhmaṇān śubhān
mukta pāpaḥ gṛha āyātaḥ sva bhāryā sahitaḥ nṛpa
evam yaḥ śṛṇute bhaktyā govinda ākhyānam uttamam

original: paṭhate parayā bhaktyā bhrūṇahatyā praṇaśyati // RKV_103.175 //
analyzed: paṭhate parayā bhaktyā bhrūṇahatyā praṇaśyati
krīḍate śāṃkare loke yāvat ābhūtasamplavam

original: yaścaivāśvayuje māsi caitre vā nṛpasattama // RKV_103.176 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca eva āśvayuje māsi caitre vā nṛpa sattama

original: saptamyāṃ ca site pakṣe sopavāso jitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: saptamyām ca site pakṣe sa upavāsaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: sāttvikīṃ vāsanāṃ kṛtvā yo vasecchivamandire // RKV_103.177 //
analyzed: sāttvikīm vāsanām kṛtvā yaḥ vaset śiva mandire
dhyāyamānaḥ virūpākṣam triśūla kara saṃsthitam
kaṃsa asura nihantāram śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
pakṣirāja samārūḍham trailokya vara dāyakam
pitāmaham tatas dhyāyet haṃsa stham caturānanam
sarga pradam samastasya kamala ākara śobhitam

original: yo hyevaṃ vasate tatra triyame sthāna uttame // RKV_103.180 //
analyzed: yaḥ hi evam vasate tatra tri yame sthāne uttame

original: tataḥ prabhāte vimale hyaṣṭamyāṃ ca narādhipa /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte vimale hi aṣṭamyām ca narādhipa
brāhmaṇān pūjayet bhaktyā sarva doṣa vivarjitān
sarva avayava sampūrṇān sarva śāstra viśāradān
veda abhyāsa ratān nityam sva dāra niratān sadā

original: śrāddhe dāne vrate yogyān brāhmaṇān pāṇḍunandana /
analyzed: śrāddhe dāne vrate yogyān brāhmaṇān pāṇḍu nandana

original: pretānāṃ pūjanaṃ tatra devapūrvaṃ samārabhet // RKV_103.183 //
analyzed: pretānām pūjanam tatra deva pūrvam samārabhet
preta tvāt mucyate śīghram eraṇḍyām piṇḍa tarpaṇaiḥ

original: dānāni tatra deyāni hyannamukhyāni sarvadā // RKV_103.184 //
analyzed: dānāni tatra deyāni hi anna mukhyāni sarvadā
hiraṇya bhūmi kanyāḥ ca dhūrvāhau śubha lakṣaṇau

original: sīreṇa sahitau pārtha dhānyaṃ droṇakasaṃkhyayā // RKV_103.185 //
analyzed: sīreṇa sahitau pārtha dhānyam droṇaka saṃkhyayā

original: alaṃkṛtāṃ savatsāṃ ca kṣīriṇīṃ taruṇīṃ sitām /
analyzed: alaṃkṛtām sa vatsām ca kṣīriṇīm taruṇīm sitām

original: raktāṃ vā kṛṣṇavarṇāṃ vā pāṭalāṃ kapilāṃ tathā // RKV_103.186 //
analyzed: raktām vā kṛṣṇa varṇām vā pāṭalām kapilām tathā
kāṃsya dohana saṃyuktām rukma khura vibhūṣaṇām

original: saṃsārarakṣaṇī devī surabhī māṃ samuddharet // RKV_103.188 //

original: putrārthaṃ yāḥ striyaḥ pārtha hyeraṇḍīsaṅgame nṛpa /

snāpyante rudrasūktaiḥ ca catur veda udbhavaiḥ tathā

ekena sārdra kumbhena dāmpatyam abhiṣecayet
daivajñena eva ca ekena athavā sāmagena vā
pañcaratna samāyuktam kumbhe tatra eva kārayet
gandha toya samāyuktam sarva oṣadhi vimiśritam

guṇṭhitam sita vastreṇa sita candana carcitam
sita puṣpaiḥ tu saṃchannam siddhārtha kṛta madhyamam

original: aṅgalagnaṃ tu yadvastraṃ kaṭakābharaṇaṃ tathā // RKV_103.194 //

original: yathā nadīnadāḥ sarve sāgare yānti saṃkṣayam // RKV_103.198 //

original: prāṇatyāgaṃ ca yo bhaktyā jātavedasi kārayet // RKV_103.200 //

tatas tuṣṭaḥ mahādevaḥ dattvā varam anuttamam
jagāma adarśanam bhūyas reme ca umāpatiḥ ciram

original: ahalyā tu gate deve sthāpayitvā jagadgurum // RKV_136.20 //
analyzed: ahalyā tu gate deve sthāpayitvā jagadgurum
ahalyeśvara nāmānam sva gṛhe ca agamat punar

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayet parameśvaram // RKV_136.21 //
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayet parameśvaram

original: sa mṛtaḥ svargamāpnoti yatra devo maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: sa mṛtaḥ svargam āpnoti yatra devaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: krīḍayitvā yathākāmaṃ tatra loke mahātapāḥ // RKV_136.22 //
analyzed: krīḍayitvā yathākāmam tatra loke mahā tapāḥ
gate varṣa sahasra ante mānuṣyam labhate punar
dhana dhānya caya upetaḥ putra pautra samanvitaḥ
veda vidyā āśrayaḥ dhīmān jāyate vimale kule
rūpa saubhāgya sampannaḥ sarva vyādhi vivarjitaḥ
jīvet varṣa śatam sāgram ahalyātīrtha sevanāt

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe ahalyātīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe ahalyātīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ṣaṭtriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
dharmaputra tatas gacchet karkaṭeśvaram uttamam
uttare narmadā kūle sarva pāpa kṣayaṃkaram

original: tatra snātvā vidhānena yastu pūjayate śivam /
analyzed: tatra snātvā vidhānena yaḥ tu pūjayate śivam
anivartikā gatiḥ tasya rudra lokāt asaṃśayam

original: tasya tīrthasya māhātmyaṃ purāṇe yacchrutaṃ mayā /
analyzed: tasya tīrthasya māhātmyam purāṇe yat śrutam mayā

original: na tadvarṇayituṃ śakyaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vadāmyataḥ // RKV_137.3 //
analyzed: na tat varṇayitum śakyam saṃkṣepeṇa vadāmi atas

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ kuryātkiṃcitkarma śubhāśubham /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ kuryāt kiṃcid karma śubha aśubham

original: harṣān madān mahārāja tatsarvaṃ jāyate 'kṣayam // RKV_137.4 //
analyzed: harṣāt madāt mahā rāja tat sarvam jāyate kṣayam
tatra tīrthe tapaḥ taptvā vālakhilyāḥ marīcayaḥ
ramante lokeṣu svecchayā kuru nandana
tatrasthāḥ tat na jānanti nara ajñāna bahiṣkṛtāḥ

original: tatra tīrthe nṛpaśreṣṭha devī nārāyaṇī purā /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe nṛpa śreṣṭha devī nārāyaṇī purā

original: adyāpi tapate ghoraṃ tapo yāvatkilārbudam // RKV_137.7 //
analyzed: adyā api tapate ghoram tapaḥ yāvat kila arbudam

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā tarpayet pitṛdevatāḥ /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā tarpayet pitṛ devatāḥ

original: tasya te dvādaśābdāni tṛptiṃ yānti pitāmahāḥ // RKV_137.8 //
analyzed: tasya te dvādaśa abdāni tṛptim yānti pitāmahāḥ

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe karkaṭeśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma saptatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe karkaṭeśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma saptatriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ

śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: yatra siddho mahābhāgo devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ // RKV_138.1 //
analyzed: yatra siddhaḥ mahābhāgaḥ devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ

original: gautamena purā śaptaṃ jñātvā devāḥ sureśvaram /
analyzed: gautamena purā śaptam jñātvā devāḥ sureśvaram

original: brahmādyā devatāḥ sarva ṛṣayaśca tapodhanāḥ // RKV_138.2 //
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ ca tapodhanāḥ

original: gatarājyaṃ gataśrīkaṃ śakraṃ prati munīśvara // RKV_138.3 //
analyzed: gata rājyam gata śrīkam śakram prati muni īśvara

original: indrena rahitaṃ rājyaṃ na kaścit kāmayed dvija /
analyzed: indrena rahitam rājyam na kaścid kāmayet dvija

original: devo vā mānavo vāpi etatte viditaṃ prabho // RKV_138.4 //
analyzed: devaḥ vā mānavaḥ vā api etat te viditam prabho

original: tasya tvaṃ bhagayuktasya dayāṃ kuru dvijottama /
analyzed: tasya tvam bhaga yuktasya dayām kuru dvijottama

original: gataścādarśanaṃ śakro dūṣitaḥ svena pāpmanā // RKV_138.5 //
analyzed: gataḥ ca adarśanam śakraḥ dūṣitaḥ svena pāpmanā

original: tatheti kṛtvā śakrasya varaṃ dātuṃ pracakrame // RKV_138.6 //
analyzed: tathā iti kṛtvā śakrasya varam dātum pracakrame
etat bhaga sahasram tu purā jātam śatakrato
tat locana sahasram tu mad prasādāt bhaviṣyati
evam uktaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ praṇamya muni sattamam

original: brāhmaṇāṃs tān mahābhāgān narmadāṃ pratyagāt tataḥ // RKV_138.8 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān tān mahābhāgān narmadām pratyagāt tatas

original: snātvā sa vimale toye saṃsthāpya tripurāntakam /
analyzed: snātvā sa vimale toye saṃsthāpya tripurāntakam

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayet parameśvaram /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayet parameśvaram

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śakratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāmāṣṭatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śakratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma aṣṭatriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ

śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet mahā rāja somatīrtham anuttamam

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snāyādācamya vidhipūrvakam /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snāyāt ācamya vidhi pūrvakam

analyzed: kṛta jāpyaḥ ravim dhyāyet tasya puṇya phalam śṛṇu

original: japato yatphalaṃ proktaṃ gāyatryā cātra tatphalam // RKV_139.3 //
analyzed: japataḥ yat phalam proktam gāyatryā ca atra tat phalam

original: tatra tīrthe tu yo bhaktyā brāhmaṇān bhojayecchuciḥ /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ bhaktyā brāhmaṇān bhojayet śuciḥ
tena samyak vidhānena koṭiḥ bhavati bhojitā

original: yo datte vipramukhyāya tasya tatkoṭisaṃmitam // RKV_139.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ datte vipra mukhyāya tasya tat koṭi saṃmitam
sahasram tu sahasrāṇām anṛcām yaḥ tu bhojayet

original: ekasya mantrayuktasya kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // RKV_139.6 //
analyzed: ekasya mantra yuktasya kalām na arhati ṣoḍaśīm

original: evaṃ tu bhojayet tatra bahvṛcaṃ vedapāragam /
analyzed: evam tu bhojayet tatra bahu ṛcam vedapāragam

original: śākhāntargam athādhvaryuṃ chandogaṃ vā samāptigam // RKV_139.7 //
analyzed: śākhā antar gam atha adhvaryum chandogam vā samāpti gam
agnihotra sahasrasya yat phalam prāpyate budhaiḥ

original: samaṃ tadvedaviduṣā tīrthe somasya tatphalam // RKV_139.8 //
analyzed: samam tat veda viduṣā tīrthe somasya tat phalam

original: bhojayedyaḥ śataṃ teṣāṃ sahasraṃ labhate naraḥ /
analyzed: bhojayet yaḥ śatam teṣām sahasram labhate naraḥ

original: ekasya yogayuktasya tatphalaṃ kavayo viduḥ // RKV_139.9 //
analyzed: ekasya yoga yuktasya tat phalam kavayaḥ viduḥ

original: tatratatra kurukṣetraṃ naimiṣaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca // RKV_139.10 //
analyzed: tatra tatra kurukṣetram naimiṣam puṣkarāṇi ca

analyzed: saṃkrāntau ca vyatīpāte yogī bhojyaḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yastu tatra tīrthe yudhiṣṭhira /
analyzed: saṃnyāsam kurute yaḥ tu tatra tīrthe yudhiṣṭhira

original: vimānena mahābhāgāḥ sa yāti tridivaṃ naraḥ // RKV_139.12 //
analyzed: vimānena mahābhāgāḥ sa yāti tridivam naraḥ

original: somasyānucaro bhūtvā tenaiva saha modate // RKV_139.13 //
analyzed: somasya anucaraḥ bhūtvā tena eva saha modate

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe somatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe somatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ekonacatvāriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ

analyzed: yasmāt snātā viśāla akṣī tena nandāhradaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā nandāṃ devīṃ prapūjayet /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā nandām devīm prapūjayet
kim tasya himavat madhya gamanena prayojanam

original: teṣāṃ samāgame pārtha śrama eva hi kevalam // RKV_140.10 //
analyzed: teṣām samāgame pārtha śramaḥ eva hi kevalam
pṛthivyām sāgara antāyām snāna dānena yat phalam

original: tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti snātvā nandāhrade nṛpa // RKV_140.11 //
analyzed: tat phalam samavāpnoti snātvā nandāhrade nṛpa

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe nandāhradatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe nandāhradatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma catvāriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ

analyzed: jale prakṣipya gātrāṇi hi antarikṣam gatā tu sā

original: vyādho vismitacittastu tāṃ mṛgīmavalokya ca // RKV_141.2 //
analyzed: vyādhaḥ vismita cittaḥ tu tām mṛgīm avalokya ca

original: vimucya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ prārebhe tapa uttamam /
analyzed: vimucya sa śaram cāpam prārebhe tapaḥ uttamam

original: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu vyādhenācaritaṃ tapaḥ // RKV_141.3 //

analyzed: atīte tu tatas kāle parituṣṭaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: varaṃ brūhi mahāvyādha yatte manasi rocate // RKV_141.4 //
analyzed: varam brūhi mahā vyādha yat te manasi rocate
vyādhaḥ uvāca

original: yadi tuṣṭo 'si deveśa yadi deyo varo mama /
analyzed: yadi tuṣṭaḥ si deveśa yadi deyaḥ varaḥ mama

original: tava pārśve mahādeva vāso me pratidīyatām // RKV_141.5 //

analyzed: evam bhavatu te vyādha yaḥ tvayā kāṅkṣitaḥ varaḥ

original: gate cādarśanaṃ deve sthāpayitvā maheśvaram // RKV_141.6 //
analyzed: gate ca adarśanam deve sthāpayitvā maheśvaram

original: tadāprabhṛti tattīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam // RKV_141.7 //
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti tat tīrtham triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā sampūjayati śaṅkaram // RKV_141.8 //
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā sampūjayati śaṅkaram
śiva lokam avāpnoti mām uvāca maheśvaraḥ

original: ye snātā narmadātoye tīrthe tāpeśvare narāḥ // RKV_141.9 //
analyzed: ye snātāḥ narmadā toye tīrthe tāpeśvare narāḥ

original: aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ // RKV_141.10 //
analyzed: aṣṭamyām ca caturdaśyām tṛtīyāyām viśeṣataḥ
snānam samācaret nityam sarva pātaka śāntaye

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe tāpeśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe tāpeśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ekacatvāriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet mahā rāja rukmiṇītīrtham uttamam
yatra eva snāna mātreṇa rūpavān subhagaḥ bhavet
aṣṭamyām ca caturdaśyām tṛtīyāyām viśeṣataḥ

original: snānaṃ samācaret tatra na ceha jāyate punaḥ // RKV_142.2 //
analyzed: snānam samācaret tatra na ca iha jāyate punar

original: yaḥ snātvā rukmiṇītīrthe dānaṃ dadyāttu kāṃcanam /
analyzed: yaḥ snātvā rukmiṇītīrthe dānam dadyāt tu kāṃcanam

original: tattīrthasya prabhāvena śokaṃ nāpnoti mānavaḥ // RKV_142.3 //
analyzed: tad tīrthasya prabhāvena śokam nā āpnoti mānavaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: rūpasaubhāgyadaṃ yena tīrtham etad bravīhi me // RKV_142.4 //
analyzed: rūpa saubhāgya dam yena tīrtham etat bravīhi me
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: kathitaṃ pūrvato vṛddhaiḥ pāramparyeṇa bhārata // RKV_142.5 //
analyzed: kathitam pūrvatas vṛddhaiḥ pāramparyeṇa bhārata
tam te ham sampravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva ekāgra mānasaḥ

original: nagaraṃ kuṇḍinaṃ nāma bhīṣmakaḥ paripāti hi // RKV_142.6 //
analyzed: nagaram kuṇḍinam nāma bhīṣmakaḥ paripāti hi
hasti aśva ratha sampannaḥ pratāpavān
strī sahasrasya madhya sthaḥ kurute rājyam uttamam
tasya bhāryā mahādevī prāṇebhyaḥ pi garīyasī
tasyām utpādayāmāsa putram ekam ca rukmakam

original: dvitīyā tanayā jajñe rukmiṇī nāma nāmataḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyā tanayā jajñe rukmiṇī nāma nāmataḥ

original: tadāśarīriṇī vācā rājānaṃ tamuvāca ha // RKV_142.9 //
analyzed: tadā aśarīriṇī vācā rājānam tam uvāca ha
caturbhujāya dātavyā kanyā iyam bhuvi bhīṣmaka

original: evaṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā jaharṣa priyayā saha // RKV_142.10 //
analyzed: evam tad vacanam śrutvā jaharṣa priyayā saha
brāhmaṇaiḥ saha vidvadbhiḥ praviṣṭaḥ sūtikāgṛham
svastikam vācayitvā asyāḥ cakre nāma iti rukmiṇī
yatas suvarṇa tilakaḥ janmanā saha bhārata

original: tataḥ sā rukmiṇīnāma brāhmaṇaiḥ kīrtitā tadā // RKV_142.12 //
analyzed: tatas sā rukmiṇī nāma brāhmaṇaiḥ kīrtitā tadā
tatas sā kāla paryāyāt aṣṭa varṣā vyajāyata
pūrva uktam ca eva tad vākyam aśarīriṇī udīritam
smṛtvā smṛtvā atha nṛpatiḥ cintayāmāsa bhūpatiḥ

original: kasmai deyā mayā bālā bhavitā kaścaturbhujaḥ // RKV_142.14 //
analyzed: kasmai deyā mayā bālā bhavitā kaḥ caturbhujaḥ
etasmin antare tāvat raivatāt parvata uttamāt
mukhyaḥ cedi patiḥ tatra damaghoṣaḥ samāgataḥ

original: praviṣṭo rājasadanaṃ yatra rājā sa bhīṣmakaḥ /
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ rāja sadanam yatra rājā sa bhīṣmakaḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā cāgataṃ gehe pūjayāmāsa bhūpatiḥ // RKV_142.16 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā ca āgatam gehe pūjayāmāsa bhūpatiḥ

original: āsanaṃ vipulaṃ dattvā sabhāṃ gatvā niveśitaḥ /
analyzed: āsanam vipulam dattvā sabhām gatvā niveśitaḥ

original: kuśalaṃ tava rājendra damaghoṣa śriyāyuta // RKV_142.17 //
analyzed: kuśalam tava rāja indra damaghoṣa śriyāyuta
puṇya aham adya saṃjātam aham tvad darśana utsukaḥ

original: kanyā madīyā rājendra hyaṣṭavarṣā vyajāyata // RKV_142.18 //
analyzed: kanyā madīyā rāja indra hi aṣṭa varṣā vyajāyata
caturbhujāya dātavyā vāc uvāca aśarīriṇī

original: bhīṣmakasya vacaḥ śrutvā damaghoṣo 'bravīd idam // RKV_142.19 //
analyzed: bhīṣmakasya vacaḥ śrutvā damaghoṣaḥ bravīt idam
caturbhujaḥ mama sutaḥ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ

original: tasyeyaṃ dīyatāṃ kanyā śiśupālasya bhīṣmaka // RKV_142.20 //
analyzed: tasya iyam dīyatām kanyā śiśupālasya bhīṣmaka
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā damaghoṣasya bhūmipa

original: bhīṣmakena tato dattā śiśupālāya rukmiṇī // RKV_142.21 //
analyzed: bhīṣmakena tatas dattā śiśupālāya rukmiṇī
prārabdham maṅgalam tatra bhīṣmakeṇa yudhiṣṭhira

original: dikṣu deśāntareṣveva ye vasanti svagotrajāḥ // RKV_142.22 //
analyzed: dikṣu deśa antareṣu eva ye vasanti sva gotra jāḥ
nimantritāḥ tu te sarve samājagmuḥ yathākramam
tatas yādava vaṃśasya tilakau bala keśavau
nimantritau samāyātau kuṇḍinam bhīṣmakasya tu

original: bhīṣmakeṇa yathānyāyaṃ pūjitau tau yadūttamau // RKV_142.24 //
analyzed: bhīṣmakeṇa yathānyāyam pūjitau tau yadu uttamau
tatas pradoṣa samaye rukmiṇī kāma mohinī
sakhībhiḥ sahitā yātā pūr bahis ca ambikā arcane
sā apaśyat tatra deveśam gopa veṣa dharam harim

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mohamāpannā kāmena kaluṣīkṛtā // RKV_142.26 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā moham āpannā kāmena kaluṣīkṛtā

original: keśavo 'pi ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃkarṣaṇam uvāca ha /
analyzed: keśavaḥ pi ca tām dṛṣṭvā saṃkarṣaṇam uvāca ha

original: strīratnapravaraṃ tāta hartavyamiti me matiḥ // RKV_142.27 //
analyzed: strī ratna pravaram tāta hartavyam iti me matiḥ

original: keśavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃkarṣaṇa uvāca ha /
analyzed: keśavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃkarṣaṇaḥ uvāca ha

original: gaccha kṛṣṇa mahābāho strīratnaṃ cāśu gṛhyatām // RKV_142.28 //
analyzed: gaccha kṛṣṇa mahā bāho strī ratnam ca āśu gṛhyatām

original: ahaṃ ca tava mārgeṇa hyāgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: aham ca tava mārgeṇa hi āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhatas

original: dānavānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kurvaṃśca kadanaṃ mahat // RKV_142.29 //
analyzed: dānavānām ca sarveṣām kurvan ca kadanam mahat
saṃkarṣaṇa matam prāpya keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ

original: yayau kanyāṃ gṛhītvā tu rathamāropya satvaram // RKV_142.30 //
analyzed: yayau kanyām gṛhītvā tu ratham āropya sa tvaram
nirgataḥ sahasā rājan vegena eva anilaḥ yathā

original: hāhākāras tadā jāto bhīṣmakasya pure mahān // RKV_142.31 //
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ tadā jātaḥ bhīṣmakasya pure mahān

original: nirgatā dānavāḥ kruddhā velā iva mahodadheḥ /
analyzed: nirgatāḥ dānavāḥ kruddhāḥ velā iva mahā udadheḥ

original: garjantaḥ sāyudhāḥ sarve dhāvanto rathavartmani // RKV_142.32 //
analyzed: garjantaḥ sa āyudhāḥ sarve dhāvantaḥ ratha vartmani
baladevam tatas prāptāḥ ratha mārga anugāminam
teṣām yuddham balasya āsīt sarva loka kṣayaṃkaram
yathā tārā maye pūrvam saṅgrāme loka viśrute
gadā hastaḥ mahā bāhuḥ trailokye pratimaḥ balaḥ
halena ākṛṣya sahasā gadā pātaiḥ apātayat
aśakyaḥ dānavaiḥ hantum balabhadraḥ mahā balaḥ
babhañja dānavān sarvān tasthau giriḥ iva acalaḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca balaṃ kruddhaṃ durdharṣaṃ tridaśairapi // RKV_142.36 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā ca balam kruddham durdharṣam tridaśaiḥ api
bhīṣma putraḥ mahā tejāḥ rukmīnām maha yaśāḥ
narāṇām ati śūrāṇām akṣauhiṇyā samanvitaḥ
balabhadram atikramya tatas yuddhe nirākarot

original: tadyuddhaṃ vañcayitvā tu rathamārgeṇa satvaram // RKV_142.38 //
analyzed: tat yuddham vañcayitvā tu ratha mārgeṇa sa tvaram

original: keśavo 'pi tadā devo rukmiṇyā sahito yayau /
analyzed: keśavaḥ pi tadā devaḥ rukmiṇyā sahitaḥ yayau
vindhyam tu laṅghayitvā agre trailokya guruḥ avyayaḥ
narmadā taṭam āpede yatra siddhaḥ purā punar
ajeyaḥ yena saṃjātaḥ tīrthasya asya prabhāvataḥ
etasmāt kāraṇāt tāta yodhanīpuram ucyate
rukmaḥ pi dānava indraḥ sau prāptaḥ

original: pratyuvācācyutaṃ kruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti mā vraja /
analyzed: pratyuvāca acyutam kruddhaḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti mā vraja
adya tvām niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ neṣyāmi yama sādanam
evam parasparam vīrau jagarjatuḥ ubhau api
tayoḥ yuddham abhūt ghoram tāraka agnija sannibham
cikṣepa śara jālāni keśavam prati dānavaḥ

original: nānucintya śarāṃs tasya keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ // RKV_142.44 //
analyzed: na anucintya śarān tasya keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ

original: tato viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ kruddhaścakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam /
analyzed: tatas viṣṇuḥ svayam kruddhaḥ cakram gṛhya sudarśanam
sampraharati amum yāvat rukmiṇyā atra nivāritaḥ

original: tvāṃ na jānāti deveśaṃ caturbāhuṃ janārdanam /
analyzed: tvām na jānāti deveśam caturbāhum janārdanam

original: darśayasva svakaṃ rūpaṃ dayāṃ kṛtvā mamopari // RKV_142.46 //
analyzed: darśayasva svakam rūpam dayām kṛtvā mama upari
evam uktaḥ tu rukmiṇyā darśayāmāsa bhārata
devāḥ dṛṣṭvā api tad rūpam stuvanti ākāśa saṃsthitāḥ

original: divyaṃ cakṣus tadā devo dadau rukmasya bhārata // RKV_142.47 //
analyzed: divyam cakṣuḥ tadā devaḥ dadau rukmasya bhārata
rukmaḥ uvāca
yat mayā pāpa niṣṭhena mandabhāgyena keśava
sāyakaiḥ āhatam vakṣaḥ tat sarvam kṣantum arhasi

original: pūrvaṃ dattā svayaṃ deva jānakī janakena vai /
analyzed: pūrvam dattā svayam deva jānakī janakena vai

original: mayā pradattā deveśa rukmiṇī tava keśava // RKV_142.49 //
analyzed: mayā pradattā deveśa rukmiṇī tava keśava
udvāhaya yathānyāyam vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: rukmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tatastuṣṭo jagadguruḥ // RKV_142.50 //
analyzed: rukmasya vacanam śrutvā tatas tuṣṭaḥ jagadguruḥ
babhāṣe devadeveśaḥ rukmiṇam bhīṣmaka ātmajam

original: gaccha svakaṃ puraṃ mā bhaiḥ kuru rājyamakaṇṭakam // RKV_142.51 //
analyzed: gaccha svakam puram mā bhaiḥ kuru rājyam akaṇṭakam

original: taṃ praṇamya jagannāthaṃ jagāma bhavanaṃ pituḥ // RKV_142.52 //
analyzed: tam praṇamya jagannātham jagāma bhavanam pituḥ

original: gate rukme tadā kṛṣṇaḥ samāmantrya dvijottamān /
analyzed: gate rukme tadā kṛṣṇaḥ samāmantrya dvijottamān
marīcim atri aṅgirasam pulastyam pulaham kratum
vasiṣṭham ca mahābhāgam iti ete sapta mānasāḥ

original: ityete brāhmaṇāḥ sapta purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ // RKV_142.54 //
analyzed: iti ete brāhmaṇāḥ sapta purāṇe niścayam gatāḥ
kṣamāvantaḥ prajāvantaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ alaṃkṛtāḥ
iti evam brahma putrāḥ ca satyavantaḥ mahāmate
narmadā taṭam āśritya nivasanti jita indriyāḥ
tapaḥ svādhyāya niratāḥ japa homa parāyaṇāḥ
nimantritāḥ tu rāja indra keśavena mahātmanā

original: śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ brahmoktavidhinā tataḥ // RKV_142.57 //
analyzed: śrāddham kṛtvā yathānyāyam brahma ukta vidhinā tatas
hariḥ tān pūjayāmāsa sapta brahmarṣi puṃgavān
pradadau dvādaśa grāmān tebhyaḥ tatra janārdanaḥ
yāvat candraḥ ca sūryaḥ ca yāvat tiṣṭhati medinī

original: tāvaddānaṃ mayā dattaṃ paripanthī na kaścana // RKV_142.59 //
analyzed: tāvat dānam mayā dattam paripanthī na kaścana
mad dattam pālayiṣyante ye nṛpāḥ gata kalmaṣāḥ

original: tebhyaḥ svasti kariṣyāmi dāsyāmi paramāṃ gatim // RKV_142.60 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ svasti kariṣyāmi dāsyāmi paramām gatim

original: yāvaddhi yānti lokeṣu mahābhūtāni pañca ca /
analyzed: yāvat hi yānti lokeṣu mahābhūtāni pañca ca
tāvat te divi modante mad datta paripālakāḥ

original: yastu lopayate mūḍho dattaṃ vaḥ pṛthivītale /
analyzed: yaḥ tu lopayate mūḍhaḥ dattam vaḥ pṛthivī tale

original: narake tasya vāsaḥ syād yāvadābhūtasamplavam // RKV_142.62 //
analyzed: narake tasya vāsaḥ syāt yāvat ābhūtasamplavam
sva dattā para dattā vā pālanīyā vasuṃdharā

original: yasya yasya yadā bhūmis tasya tasya tadā phalam // RKV_142.63 //
analyzed: yasya yasya yadā bhūmiḥ tasya tasya tadā phalam

original: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo hareta vasuṃdharām /
analyzed: sva dattām para dattām vā yaḥ hareta vasuṃdharām

original: sa viṣṭhāyāṃ kṛmirbhūtvā pitṛbhiḥ saha majjati // RKV_142.64 //
analyzed: sa viṣṭhāyām kṛmiḥ bhūtvā pitṛbhiḥ saha majjati

original: hartā hārayitā caiva viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ // RKV_142.65 //
analyzed: hartā hārayitā ca eva viṣṭhāyām jāyate kṛmiḥ

original: ācchettā cānumantā ca tānyeva narake vaset // RKV_142.66 //
analyzed: ācchettā ca anumantā ca tāni eva narake vaset

original: yānīha dattāni purā narendrair dānāni dharmārthayaśaskarāṇi /
analyzed: yāni iha dattāni purā narendraiḥ dānāni dharma artha yaśaskarāṇi

original: nirmālyarūpapratimāni tāni ko nāma sādhuḥ punarādadāti // RKV_142.67 //
analyzed: nirmālya rūpa pratimāni tāni kaḥ nāma sādhuḥ punar ādadāti

original: evaṃ tānpūjayitvā tu samyaṅ nyāyena pāṇḍava /
analyzed: evam tān pūjayitvā tu samyak nyāyena pāṇḍava
rukmiṇyāḥ vidhivat pāṇim jagrāha madhusūdanaḥ
muśalī ca tatas sarvān jitvā dānava puṃgavān

original: svasthānam agamat tatra kṛtvā kāryaṃ suśobhanam // RKV_142.69 //
analyzed: sva sthānam agamat tatra kṛtvā kāryam su śobhanam

original: gacchamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā keśavaṃ kleśanāśanam // RKV_142.70 //
analyzed: gacchamānam tu tam dṛṣṭvā keśavam kleśa nāśanam

original: āgacchamānāṃs tau vīkṣya rathamārgeṇa brāhmaṇān // RKV_142.71 //
analyzed: āgacchamānān tau vīkṣya ratha mārgeṇa brāhmaṇān

original: muhūrtaṃ tatra viśramya keśavo vākyam abravīt /
analyzed: muhūrtam tatra viśramya keśavaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: kimāgamanakāryaṃ vo brūta sarvaṃ dvijottamāḥ // RKV_142.72 //
analyzed: kim āgamana kāryam vaḥ brūta sarvam dvijottamāḥ

original: kurvāṇāḥ svīyakarmāṇi mama kṛtyaṃ tu tiṣṭhate /
analyzed: kurvāṇāḥ svīya karmāṇi mama kṛtyam tu tiṣṭhate

original: devasya vacanaṃ śrutvā munayo vākyam abruvan // RKV_142.73 //
analyzed: devasya vacanam śrutvā munayaḥ vākyam abruvan

original: duṣprāpyo 'si manuṣyāṇāṃ prāptaḥ kiṃ tyajase hi naḥ // RKV_142.74 //
analyzed: duṣprāpyaḥ si manuṣyāṇām prāptaḥ kim tyajase hi naḥ

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān idam abravīt /
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān idam abravīt

original: mathurāyāṃ dvāravatyāṃ yodhanīpura eva ca // RKV_142.75 //
analyzed: mathurāyām dvāravatyām yodhanīpure eva ca
tri kālam āgamiṣyāmi satyam satyam punar punar

original: evaṃ te brāhmaṇāḥ śrutvā yodhanīpuramāgatāḥ // RKV_142.76 //
analyzed: evam te brāhmaṇāḥ śrutvā yodhanīpuram āgatāḥ
avatīrṇaḥ tri bhāgena prādurbhāve tu māthure
etat te kathitam sarvam tīrthasya utpatti kāraṇam

original: yaṃ śrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // RKV_142.78 //
analyzed: yam śrutvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayed balakeśavau /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayet bala keśavau
tena devaḥ jagaddhātā pūjitaḥ triguṇa ātmavān

original: upavāsī naro bhūtvā yastu kuryāt pradakṣiṇam /
analyzed: upavāsī naraḥ bhūtvā yaḥ tu kuryāt pradakṣiṇam

original: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // RKV_142.80 //
analyzed: mucyate sarva pāpebhyaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tatra tīrthe tu ye vṛkṣāstānpaśyantyapi ye narāḥ /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu ye vṛkṣāḥ tān paśyanti api ye narāḥ

original: te 'pi pāpaiḥ pramucyante bhrūṇahatyāsamair api // RKV_142.81 //
analyzed: te pi pāpaiḥ pramucyante bhrūṇahatyā samaiḥ api

original: tena te sadṛśāḥ syur vai devadevena cakriṇā // RKV_142.82 //
analyzed: tena te sadṛśāḥ syuḥ vai devadevena cakriṇā

original: te pūjyāste namaskāryās teṣāṃ janma sujīvitam /
analyzed: te pūjyāḥ te namaskāryāḥ teṣām janma su jīvitam

original: ye namanti jagannāthaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim // RKV_142.83 //
analyzed: ye namanti jagannātham devam nārāyaṇam harim

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaddānaṃ snānaṃ devārcanaṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yat dānam snānam deva arcanam nṛpa
tat sarvam akṣayam tasya iti evam śaṅkaraḥ bravīt
praviśya agnau mṛtānām ca yat phalam samudāhṛtam
tat śṛṇuṣva nṛpa śreṣṭha procyamānam aśeṣatas

original: āgneye bhavate tatra modate kālamīpsitam // RKV_142.86 //
analyzed: āgneye bhavate tatra modate kālam īpsitam
jale ca evāḥ mṛtānām tu yodhanīpura madhyatas
vasanti vāruṇe loke yāvat ābhūtasamplavam

original: anāśake mṛtānāṃ tu tatra tīrthe narādhipa /
analyzed: anāśake mṛtānām tu tatra tīrthe narādhipa

original: anivartikā gatir nṛṇāṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // RKV_142.88 //
analyzed: anivartikā gatiḥ nṛṇām na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tatra tīrthe tu yo dadyāt kapilādānamuttamam /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ dadyāt kapilā dānam uttamam

original: vidhānena tu saṃyuktaṃ śṛṇu tasyāpi yatphalam // RKV_142.89 //
analyzed: vidhānena tu saṃyuktam śṛṇu tasya api yat phalam

original: tāvanti divi modante sarvakāmaiḥ supūjitāḥ // RKV_142.90 //
analyzed: tāvanti divi modante sarva kāmaiḥ su pūjitāḥ

original: yāvanti romāṇi bhavanti dhenvāstāvanti varṣāṇi mahīyate saḥ /
analyzed: yāvanti romāṇi bhavanti dhenvāḥ tāvanti varṣāṇi mahīyate saḥ

original: svargāc cyutaścāpi tatastrilokyāṃ kule samutpatsyati gomatāṃ saḥ // RKV_142.91 //
analyzed: svargāt cyutaḥ ca api tatas trilokyām kule samutpatsyati gomatām saḥ

original: tatra tīrthe tu yo dadyād rūpyaṃ kāñcanameva vā /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ dadyāt rūpyam kāñcanam eva vā

original: tasmiṃstīrthe tu yo dadyāt pāduke vastram eva ca /
analyzed: tasmin tīrthe tu yaḥ dadyāt pāduke vastram eva ca
dānasya asya prabhāvena labhate svargam īpsitam
ṛk yajuḥ sāma vedānām paṭhanāt yat phalam bhavet

original: tatra tīrthe tu rājendra gāyatryā tatphalaṃ labhet // RKV_142.94 //
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu rāja indra gāyatryā tat phalam labhet
prayāge yat bhavet puṇyam gayāyām ca tripuṣkare

original: kurukṣetre tu rājendra rāhugraste divākare // RKV_142.95 //
analyzed: kurukṣetre tu rāja indra rāhu graste divākare

original: someśvare ca yatpuṇyaṃ somasya grahaṇe tathā /
analyzed: someśvare ca yat puṇyam somasya grahaṇe tathā

original: tatphalaṃ labhate tatra snānamātrān na saṃśayaḥ // RKV_142.96 //
analyzed: tat phalam labhate tatra snāna mātrāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: dvādaśyāṃ tu naraḥ snātvā namaskṛtya janārdanam /
analyzed: dvādaśyām tu naraḥ snātvā namaskṛtya janārdanam

original: uddhṛtāḥ pitarastena avāptaṃ janmanaḥ phalam // RKV_142.97 //
analyzed: uddhṛtāḥ pitaraḥ tena avāptam janmanaḥ phalam

original: saṃkrāntau ca vyatīpāte dvādaśyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: saṃkrāntau ca vyatīpāte dvādaśyām ca viśeṣataḥ

original: brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayed ekaṃ koṭirbhavati bhojitā // RKV_142.98 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇam bhojayet ekam koṭiḥ bhavati bhojitā
pṛthivyām yāni tīrthāni hi āsamudrāṇi pāṇḍava

original: tāni sarvāṇi tatraiva dvādaśyāṃ pāṇḍunandana // RKV_142.99 //
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi tatra eva dvādaśyām pāṇḍu nandana
kṣayam yānti ca dānāni yajña homa bali kriyāḥ

original: na kṣīyate mahārāja tatra tīrthe tu yatkṛtam // RKV_142.100 //
analyzed: na kṣīyate mahā rāja tatra tīrthe tu yat kṛtam
yat bhūtam yat bhaviṣyat ca tīrtha māhātmyam uttamam

original: kathitaṃ te mayā sarvaṃ pṛthagbhāvena bhārata // RKV_142.101 //
analyzed: kathitam te mayā sarvam pṛthagbhāvena bhārata

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe rukmiṇītīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe rukmiṇītīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma dvicatvāriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet mahā rāja yojaneśvaram uttamam

original: yatra siddhau purā kalpe naranārāyaṇāvṛṣī // RKV_143.1 //
analyzed: yatra siddhau purā kalpe nara nārāyaṇau ṛṣī
tatra tīrthe tapaḥ taptvā saṅgrāme deva dānavaiḥ
jayam prāptau mahātmānau nara nārāyaṇau ubhau
punar tretā yuge prāpte tau devau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: tatra tīrthe punaḥ snātvā rāvaṇo durjayo hataḥ // RKV_143.3 //
analyzed: tatra tīrthe punar snātvā rāvaṇaḥ durjayaḥ hataḥ

original: punaḥ pārtha kalau prāpte tau devau balakeśavau /
analyzed: punar pārtha kalau prāpte tau devau bala keśavau

original: vasudevakule jātau duṣkaraṃ karma cakratuḥ // RKV_143.4 //
analyzed: vasudeva kule jātau duṣkaram karma cakratuḥ
narakam kālanemim ca kaṃsam cāṇūra muṣṭikau
śiśupālam jarāsaṃdham jaghnatuḥ bala keśavau
tatas tatra ripūn saṃkhye bhīṣma droṇa puraḥsarān
karṇa duryodhana ādīn ca nihaniṣyati sa prabhuḥ

original: dharmakṣetre kurukṣetre tatra yudhyanti te kṣaṇam /
analyzed: dharma kṣetre kurukṣetre tatra yudhyanti te kṣaṇam
bhīma arjuna nimittena śiṣyau kṛtvā parasparam

original: tatra tīrthe punargatvā tapaḥ kṛtvā suduṣkaram /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe punar gatvā tapaḥ kṛtvā su duṣkaram

original: pūjayitvā dvijānbhaktyā yāsyete dvārakāṃ punaḥ // RKV_143.8 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā dvijān bhaktyā yāsyete dvārakām punar

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayed balakeśavau /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayet bala keśavau
tena devaḥ jagaddhātā pūjitaḥ triguṇa ātmavān

original: upavāsī naro bhūtvā yastu kuryāt prajāgaram /
analyzed: upavāsī naraḥ bhūtvā yaḥ tu kuryāt prajāgaram

original: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo gāyaṃstasya śubhāṃ kathām // RKV_143.10 //
analyzed: mucyate sarva pāpebhyaḥ gāyan tasya śubhām kathām

original: yāvatastatra tīrthe tu vṛkṣān paśyanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: yāvataḥ tatra tīrthe tu vṛkṣān paśyanti mānavāḥ

original: brahmahatyādikaṃ pāpaṃ tāvad eṣāṃ praṇaśyati // RKV_143.11 //
analyzed: brahmahatyā ādikam pāpam tāvat eṣām praṇaśyati
prātar utthāya ye kecid paśyanti bala keśavau

original: tenaiva sadṛśāḥ sarve devadevena cakriṇā // RKV_143.12 //
analyzed: tena eva sadṛśāḥ sarve devadevena cakriṇā
te pūjyāḥ te namaskāryāḥ teṣām janma su jīvitam

original: ye namanti jagatpūjyaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim // RKV_143.13 //
analyzed: ye namanti jagat pūjyam devam nārāyaṇam harim

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaddānaṃ snānaṃ devārcanaṃ nṛpa /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yat dānam snānam deva arcanam nṛpa
kriyate tat phalam sarvam akṣayāya upakalpate

original: agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūrvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ /
analyzed: agneḥ apatyam prathamam suvarṇam bhūḥ vaiṣṇavī sūrya sutāḥ ca gāvaḥ

original: lokāstrayastena bhavanti dattā yaḥ kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca bhuvaṃ ca dadyāt // RKV_143.15 //
analyzed: lokāḥ trayaḥ tena bhavanti dattāḥ yaḥ kāñcanam gām ca bhuvam ca dadyāt
etat te kathitam sarvam tīrtha māhātmyam uttamam

original: atītaṃ ca bhaviṣyacca vartamānaṃ mahābalam // RKV_143.16 //
analyzed: atītam ca bhaviṣyat ca vartamānam mahā balam
śrutvā vā api paṭhitvā idam dhārmikān

original: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // RKV_143.17 //
analyzed: mucyate sarva pāpebhyaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe yojaneśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe yojaneśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma tricatvāriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ

analyzed: na kṣīyate tu rāja indra cakratīrthe tu yat kṛtam

original: kathitaṃ tanmayā sarvaṃ pṛthagbhāvena bhārata // RKV_144.3 //
analyzed: kathitam tat mayā sarvam pṛthagbhāvena bhārata

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe dvādaśītīrthamahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe dvādaśītīrthamahātmyavarṇanam nāma catuścatvāriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ

original: śivatīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā jitakrodho jitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: śivatīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā jita krodhaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: tatra tīrthe tu yo bhaktyā sopavāso 'rcayecchivam /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ bhaktyā sa upavāsaḥ rcayet śivam
anivartikā gatiḥ tasya rudra lokāt asaṃśayam

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śivatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śivatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma pañcacatvāriṃśat adhika śatatamaḥ

asmāhakam tatas gacchet pitṛtīrtham anuttamam

original: snānadānena yatpuṇyaṃ tathā piṇḍodakena ca // RKV_146.2 //
analyzed: snāna dānena yat puṇyam tathā piṇḍa udakena ca
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
purā kalpe nṛpa śreṣṭhaḥ ṛṣi deva samāgame

original: praśnaḥ pṛṣṭo mayā tāta yathā tvamanupṛcchasi // RKV_146.3 //
analyzed: praśnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ mayā tāta yathā tvam anupṛcchasi
ekatra sāgarāḥ sapta sa prayāgāḥ sa puṣkarāḥ

original: nāsya sāmyaṃ labhante te nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // RKV_146.4 //
analyzed: na asya sāmyam labhante te na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tatra somagrahe puṇyaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ labhate naraḥ // RKV_146.5 //
analyzed: tatra soma grahe puṇyam tat puṇyam labhate naraḥ

original: māsānte pitaro nṛṇāṃ vīkṣante santatiṃ svakām /
analyzed: māsa ante pitaraḥ nṛṇām vīkṣante santatim svakām
kaścid asmad kule smākam piṇḍam atra pradāsyati
prapitāmahāḥ tathā ādityāḥ śrutiḥ eṣā sanātanī

original: evaṃ bruvanti devāśca ṛṣayaḥ satapodhanāḥ // RKV_146.7 //
analyzed: evam bruvanti devāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ sa tapodhanāḥ

original: dvādaśābdāni rājendra yogaṃ bhuktvā suśobhanam // RKV_146.8 //
analyzed: dvādaśa abdāni rāja indra yogam bhuktvā su śobhanam
yuge yuge mahārāja asmāhake pitāmahāḥ
sarvadā āgacchantam sva gotra jam
bhaviṣyati kim asmākam

original: snānaṃ dānaṃ ca ye kuryuḥ pitḥṇāṃ tilatarpaṇam // RKV_146.10 //
analyzed: snānam dānam ca ye kuryuḥ pitḥṇām tila tarpaṇam
te sarva pāpa nirmuktāḥ sarvān kāmān labhati vai

original: jalamadhye 'tra bhūpāla agnitīrthaṃ ca tiṣṭhati // RKV_146.11 //
analyzed: jala madhye bhūpāla agnitīrtham ca tiṣṭhati
darśanāt tasya tīrthasya pāpa rāśiḥ vilīyate
snāna mātreṇa rāja indra brahmahatyām vyapohati

original: ekakālaṃ tu bhuñjāno māsaṃ tīrthasya sannidhau // RKV_146.13 //
analyzed: eka kālam tu bhuñjānaḥ māsam tīrthasya sannidhau

phalam āpnoti sampūrṇam pitṛ loke mahīyate
pṛthivyām āsamudrāyām mahā bhogapatiḥ bhavet
dhana dhānya samāyuktaḥ dātā bhavati dhārmikaḥ
upavāsī śuciḥ bhūtvā brahma lokam avāpnuyāt

original: asmāhakaṃ samāsādya yastu prāṇān parityajet // RKV_146.16 //
analyzed: asmāhakam samāsādya yaḥ tu prāṇān parityajet

original: tataḥ svargāt paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣīṇakarmā divaścyutaḥ // RKV_146.17 //
analyzed: tatas svargāt paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣīṇa karmā divaḥ cyutaḥ
suvarṇa maṇi muktā āḍhye kule jāyeta rūpavān
kṛtvā abhiṣeka vidhinā hayamedha phalam labhet
dhana āḍhyaḥ rūpavān dakṣaḥ dātā bhavati dhārmikaḥ
catur vedeṣu yat puṇyam satya vādiṣu yat phalam
tat phalam labhate nūnam tatra tīrthe bhiṣecanāt

original: tīrthānāṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ nirmitaṃ śambhunā purā // RKV_146.20 //
analyzed: tīrthānām paramam tīrtham nirmitam śambhunā purā
hṛdaya īśaḥ svayam viṣṇuḥ japet devam maheśvaram
gandharva apsarasaḥ ca eva marutaḥ mārutāḥ tathā
viśvedevāḥ ca pitaraḥ sa candrāḥ sa divākarāḥ
marīciḥ atri aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
pracetāḥ ca vasiṣṭhaḥ ca bhṛguḥ nāradaḥ eva ca
cyavanaḥ gālavaḥ ca eva vāmadevaḥ mahā muniḥ
vālakhilyāḥ ca gandhārāḥ tṛṇabinduḥ ca jājaliḥ
uddālakaḥ ca ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca sanandanaḥ
śukraḥ ca eva bharadvājaḥ vātsyaḥ vātsyāyanaḥ tathā
agastiḥ mitrāvaruṇau viśvāmitraḥ muni īśvaraḥ
gautamaḥ ca pulastyaḥ ca paulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
sanātanaḥ tu kapilaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ tathā
anye bahavaḥ tatra munayaḥ śaṃsita vratāḥ

original: krīḍanti devatāḥ sarva ṛṣayaḥ satapodhanāḥ // RKV_146.27 //
analyzed: krīḍanti devatāḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ sa tapodhanāḥ
manuṣyāḥ ca eva yogi indrāḥ pitaraḥ sa pitāmahāḥ

original: asmāhake 'tra tiṣṭhanti sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ // RKV_146.28 //
analyzed: asmāhake tra tiṣṭhanti sarve eva na saṃśayaḥ
pitaraḥ pitāmahāḥ ca eva tathā eva prapitāmahāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ dattamupasthāyi sukṛtaṃ vāpi duṣkṛtam // RKV_146.29 //
analyzed: yeṣām dattam upasthāyi sukṛtam vā api duṣkṛtam
akṣayam tatra tat sarvam yat kṛtam yodhanīpure
mātaram pitaram tyaktvā sarva bandhu suhṛd janān

original: dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ priyānputrāṃs tathā dehaṃ nṛpottama /
analyzed: dhanam dhānyam priyān putrān tathā deham nṛpa uttama
gacchate vāyu bhūtaḥ tu śubha aśubha samanvitaḥ
adṛśyaḥ sarva bhūtānām paramātmā mahattaraḥ

original: śubhāśubhagatiṃ prāptaḥ karmaṇā svena pārthiva // RKV_146.32 //
analyzed: śubha aśubha gatim prāptaḥ karmaṇā svena pārthiva
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: śubhāśubhaṃ na bandhūnāṃ jāyate kena hetunā /
analyzed: śubha aśubham na bandhūnām jāyate kena hetunā

original: ekaḥ prasūyate jantureka eva pralīyate // RKV_146.33 //
analyzed: ekaḥ prasūyate jantuḥ ekaḥ eva pralīyate

original: eko hi bhuṅkte sukṛtameka eva hi duṣkṛtam // RKV_146.34 //
analyzed: ekaḥ hi bhuṅkte sukṛtam ekaḥ eva hi duṣkṛtam
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: eṣa tvayokto nṛpate mahāpraśnaḥ smṛto mayā // RKV_146.35 //
analyzed: eṣa tvayā uktaḥ nṛpate mahā praśnaḥ smṛtaḥ mayā
pitāmaha mukha udgītam śrutam te kathayāmi aham
yat me pitāmahāt pūrvam vijñātam ṛṣi saṃsadi

original: na mātā na pitā bandhuḥ kasyacinna suhṛtkvacit /
analyzed: na mātā na pitā bandhuḥ kasyacid na suhṛd kvacid

original: kasya na jñāyate rūpaṃ vāyubhūtasya dehinaḥ // RKV_146.37 //
analyzed: kasya na jñāyate rūpam vāyu bhūtasya dehinaḥ

original: yadyevaṃ na bhavettāta lokasya tu nareśvara /
analyzed: yadi evam na bhavet tāta lokasya tu nareśvara
amaryādam bhavet nūnam vinaśyati carācaram
evam jñātvā pūrāḥ rājan samastaiḥ loka kartṛbhiḥ

original: maryādā sthāpitā loke yathā dharmo na naśyati // RKV_146.39 //
analyzed: maryādā sthāpitā loke yathā dharmaḥ na naśyati
dharme naṣṭe manuṣyāṇām adharmaḥ bhibhavet punar
tatas svadharma calanāt narake gamanam dhruvam
lokaḥ niraṅkuśaḥ sarvaḥ maryādā laṅghane rataḥ

original: maryādā sthāpitā tena śāstraṃ vīkṣya maharṣibhiḥ // RKV_146.41 //
analyzed: maryādā sthāpitā tena śāstram vīkṣya mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ svādhyāyo devatārcanam /
analyzed: snānam dānam japaḥ homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ devatā arcanam
piṇḍa udaka pradānam ca tathā eva atithi pūjanam
pitaraḥ pitāmahāḥ ca eva tathā eva prapitāmahāḥ
trayaḥ devāḥ smṛtāḥ tāta brahma viṣṇu maheśvarāḥ
pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve tathā mātāmahāḥ trayaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena śruti smṛti artha noditān
dharmam samācaran nityam pāpa aṃśena na lipyate

original: śrutismṛtyuditaṃ dharmaṃ manasāpi na laṅghayet // RKV_146.45 //
analyzed: śruti smṛti uditam dharmam manasā api na laṅghayet

original: iha loke pare caiva yadīcchecchreya ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iha loke pare ca eva yadi icchet śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ
pitāputrau sadā api ekau bimbāt bimbam iva uddhṛtau
vibhaktau vā avibhaktau vā śruti smṛti arthataḥ tathā
uddharet ātmanā ātmānam ātmānam avasādayet
piṇḍa udaka pradānābhyām ṛte pārtha na saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ jñātvā prayatnena piṇḍodakaprado bhavet // RKV_146.48 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā prayatnena piṇḍa udaka pradaḥ bhavet
āyuḥ dharmaḥ yaśaḥ tejaḥ santatiḥ ca eva vardhate

original: pṛthivyāṃ sāgarāntāyāṃ pitṛkṣetrāṇi yāni ca // RKV_146.49 //
analyzed: pṛthivyām sāgara antāyām pitṛ kṣetrāṇi yāni ca

original: tāni te sampravakṣyāmi yeṣu dattaṃ mahāphalam /
