mṛga pakṣi vihaṅgānām ghātakāḥ māṃsa bhakṣakāḥ
peṣaṇam narakam yānti śoṣaṇam jīva bandhanāt

original: tatratyāṃ yātanāṃ ghorāṃ sahitvā śāstracoditām // RKV_155.82 //
analyzed: tatratyām yātanām ghorām sahitvā śāstra coditām
iha mānuṣya tām prāpya paṅgu andha badhirāḥ narāḥ

original: gavārthe brāhmaṇārthe ca hyanṛtaṃ vadatāmiha // RKV_155.83 //
analyzed: gavā arthe brāhmaṇa arthe ca hi anṛtam vadatām iha
patanam jāyate puṃsām narake kālasūtrake

original: tatratyā yātanā ghorā vihitā śāstrakartṛbhiḥ // RKV_155.84 //
analyzed: tatratyā yātanā ghorā vihitā śāstra kartṛbhiḥ

original: bhuktvā samāgatā hyatra te yāsyantyantyajāṃ gatim /
analyzed: bhuktvā samāgatāḥ hi atra te yāsyanti antyajām gatim
bandhayanti ca ye jīvān tyaktvā ātma kula santatim
patanti na atra sandehaḥ narake te sthibhañjane

original: tatra varṣaśatasyānta iha mānuṣyatāṃ gatāḥ // RKV_155.86 //
analyzed: tatra varṣa śatasya ante iha mānuṣya tām gatāḥ
kubjāḥ vāmanakāḥ pāpāḥ jāyante duḥkha bhāginaḥ

original: ye tyajanti svakāṃ bhāryāṃ mūḍhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // RKV_155.87 //
analyzed: ye tyajanti svakām bhāryām mūḍhāḥ paṇḍita māninaḥ

original: te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ tāmisraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: te yānti narakam ghoram tāmisram na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tatra varṣaśatasyānte iha mānuṣyatāṃ gatāḥ // RKV_155.88 //
analyzed: tatra varṣa śatasya ante iha mānuṣya tām gatāḥ

original: duścarmāṇo durbhagāśca jāyante mānavā hi te /
analyzed: duścarmāṇaḥ durbhagāḥ ca jāyante mānavāḥ hi te

original: mānakūṭaṃ tulākūṭaṃ kūṭakaṃ tu vadanti ye // RKV_155.89 //
analyzed: māna kūṭam tulā kūṭam kūṭakam tu vadanti ye
narake te ndhatāmisre prapacyante nara adhamāḥ

original: śatasāhasrikaṃ kālamuṣitvā tatra te narāḥ // RKV_155.90 //
analyzed: śata sāhasrikam kālam uṣitvā tatra te narāḥ
iha śatru gṛhe tu andhāḥ bhramante dīna mūrtayaḥ
pitṛ deva dvijebhyaḥ nnam a dattvā ye bhuñjate
narake kṛmibhakṣye te patanti sva ātma poṣakāḥ

original: tataḥ prasūtikāle hi kṛmibhuktaśca savraṇaḥ // RKV_155.92 //
analyzed: tatas prasūti kāle hi kṛmi bhuktaḥ ca sa vraṇaḥ
jāyate para bhāgya upajīvakaḥ
sva karma vicyutāḥ pāpāḥ varṇa āśrama vivarjitāḥ
narake pūya sampūrṇe kliśyante hi ayutam samāḥ

original: pūrṇe tatra tataḥ kāle prāpya mānuṣyakaṃ bhavam // RKV_155.94 //
analyzed: pūrṇe tatra tatas kāle prāpya mānuṣyakam bhavam
udvejanīyāḥ bhūtānām jāyante vyādhibhiḥ vṛtāḥ
agnidaḥ garadaḥ ca eva lobha moha anvitaḥ naraḥ
narake viṣa sampūrṇe nimajjati durātmavān
tatra varṣa śatāt kālāt unmajjanam avasthitaḥ

original: bhuvi mānuṣatāṃ prāpya kṛpaṇo jāyate punaḥ /
analyzed: bhuvi mānuṣa tām prāpya kṛpaṇaḥ jāyate punar

original: pādukopānahau chatraṃ śayyāṃ prāvaraṇāni ca // RKV_155.97 //
analyzed: pādukā upānahau chatram śayyām prāvaraṇāni ca
a dattvā daṃśa maśakaiḥ bhakṣyante janya saptatim
pituḥ dravya apahartāraḥ tāḍana krośane ratāḥ

original: pīḍanaṃ kriyate teṣāṃ yatra tau yugmaparvatau /
analyzed: pīḍanam kriyate teṣām yatra tau yugma parvatau

original: yā sā vaitaraṇī ghorā nadī raktapravāhinī // RKV_155.99 //
analyzed: yā sā vaitaraṇī ghorā nadī rakta pravāhinī
pibanti rudhiram tatra ye bhiyānti rajasvalām
asipatravane ghore pīḍyante pāpa kāriṇaḥ
para pīḍā karāḥ nityam ye naraḥ ntyaja gāminaḥ
guru dāra ratānām tu mahāpātakinām api
śilā avagūhanam teṣām jāyate janma saptatim
jvalantīm āyasīm ghorām bahu kaṇṭaka saṃvṛtām
śālmalīm te vagūhanti para dāra ratāḥ hi ye

original: parasya yoṣitaṃ hṛtvā brahmasvamapahṛtya ca // RKV_155.103 //
analyzed: parasya yoṣitam hṛtvā brahma svam apahṛtya ca
araṇye nirjale deśe sa bhavet krūra rākṣasaḥ

original: devasvaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca lobhenaivāharecca yaḥ // RKV_155.104 //
analyzed: deva svam brāhmaṇa svam ca lobhena eva āharet ca yaḥ

original: sa pāpātmā pare loke gṛdhrocchiṣṭena jīvati /
analyzed: sa pāpa ātmā pare loke gṛdhra ucchiṣṭena jīvati
evamādīni pāpāni bhuñjante yama śāsanāt
yeṣām tu darśanāt eva śravaṇāt jāyate bhayam

original: tathā dānaphalaṃ cānye bhuñjānā yamamandire // RKV_155.106 //
analyzed: tathā dāna phalam ca anye bhuñjānāḥ yama mandire

original: dṛṣṭāḥ śrutaṃ kathayatāṃ dūtānāṃ ca yamājñayā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ śrutam kathayatām dūtānām ca yama ājñayā
rathaiḥ anye gajaiḥ anye kecid vājibhiḥ āvṛtāḥ
dṛṣṭāḥ tatra mahābhāga tapaḥ saṃcaya saṃsthitāḥ

original: godātā svarṇadātā ca bhūmiratnapradā narāḥ // RKV_155.108 //
analyzed: go dātā svarṇa dātā ca bhūmi ratna pradāḥ narāḥ
śayyā aśana gṛha ādīnām sa lokaḥ kāma daḥ nṛṇām

original: annaṃ pānīyasahitaṃ dadate ye 'tra mānavāḥ // RKV_155.109 //
analyzed: annam pānīya sahitam dadate ye tra mānavāḥ
tatra tṛptāḥ su saṃtuṣṭāḥ krīḍante yama sādane
atra yat dīyate dānam api vālāgra mātrakam
tat akṣaya phalam sarvam śuklatīrthe nṛpa uttama

original: etatte kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yaddṛṣṭaṃ yacca vai śrutam // RKV_155.111 //
analyzed: etat te kathitam sarvam yat dṛṣṭam yat ca vai śrutam
kuruṣva yat abhipretam yadi śaknoṣi mucyatām
tayoḥ tat vacanam śrutvā cāṇakyaḥ hṛṣṭa mānasaḥ
visarjayāmāsa khagau abhinandya punar punar

original: tābhyāṃ gatābhyāṃ sarvasvaṃ dattvā vipreṣu bhārata // RKV_155.113 //
analyzed: tābhyām gatābhyām sarva svam dattvā vipreṣu bhārata
kāma krodhau parityajya jagāma amaraparvatam
tatra baddhvā uḍupam gāḍham kṛṣṇa rajjvā avalambitam
plavamānaḥ u śu dhyāyan devam janārdanam
ārogyam bhāskarāt icchet dhanam vai jātavedasaḥ
prāpnoti jñānam īśānāt mokṣam prāpnoti keśavāt

original: nīlaṃ raktaṃ tadabhavanmecakaṃ yaddhi sūtrakam // RKV_155.116 //
analyzed: nīlam raktam tat abhavat mecakam yat hi sūtrakam
śuddha sphaṭika saṅkāśam dṛṣṭvā rajjum mahāmatiḥ

original: āplutya vimale toye gato 'sau vaiṣṇavaṃ padam // RKV_155.117 //
analyzed: āplutya vimale toye gataḥ sau vaiṣṇavam padam
gāyanti yat veda vidaḥ purāṇam nārāyaṇam śāśvatam acyuta āhvayam

original: prāptaḥ sa taṃ rājasuto mahātmā nikṣipya dehaṃ śubhaśuklatīrthe // RKV_155.118 //
analyzed: prāptaḥ sa tam rāja sutaḥ mahātmā nikṣipya deham śubha śuklatīrthe
eṣā te kathitā rājan siddhiḥ cāṇakya bhūbhṛtaḥ
tathā anyat tava vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva ekāgra mānasaḥ

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe cāṇakyasiddhiprāptivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe cāṇakyasiddhiprāptivarṇanam nāma pañcapañcāśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
na asti lokeṣu tat tīrtham pṛthivyām yat nareśvara
śuklatīrthena sadṛśam upamānena gīyate
śuklatīrtham mahā tīrtham narmadāyām vyavasthitam
prāc udak pravaṇe deśe muni saṅgha niṣevitam

original: vaiśākhe ca tathā māsi kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśī /
analyzed: vaiśākhe ca tathā māsi kṛṣṇa pakṣe caturdaśī
kailāsāt umayā sārddham svayam āyāti śaṅkaraḥ
madhyāhna samaye snātvā paśyati ātmānam ātmanā
brahma viṣṇu indra sahitaḥ śuklatīrthe samāhitaḥ

original: kārttikyāṃ tu viśeṣeṇa vaiśākhyāṃ ca narottama /
analyzed: kārttikyām tu viśeṣeṇa vaiśākhyām ca narottama
brahma viṣṇu mahādevān snātvā paśyati tad dine
devarājaḥ suraiḥ sārddham vāyu mārga vyavasthitaḥ

original: kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśyāṃ snātvā paśyati śaṅkaram // RKV_156.6 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa pakṣe caturdaśyām snātvā paśyati śaṅkaram
gandharva apsarasaḥ yakṣāḥ siddha vidyādhara uragāḥ

original: taddine te 'pi deveśaṃ dṛṣṭvā muñcanti kilbiṣam // RKV_156.7 //
analyzed: tad dine te deveśam dṛṣṭvā muñcanti kilbiṣam
ardha yojana vistāram tad arddhena eva ca āyatam
śuklatīrtham mahā puṇyam mahāpātaka nāśanam
yatra sthitaiḥ pradṛśyante vṛkṣa agrāṇi nara uttamaiḥ

original: tatra sthitā mahāpāpair mucyante pūrvasaṃcitaiḥ // RKV_156.9 //
analyzed: tatra sthitāḥ mahā pāpaiḥ mucyante pūrva saṃcitaiḥ
pāpa upapātakaiḥ yuktaḥ naraḥ snātvā pramucyate
upārjitā vinaśyeta bhrūṇahatyā api dustyajā
yasmāt tatra eva deveśaḥ umayā saha tiṣṭhati

original: vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa kailāsādeti śaṅkaraḥ // RKV_156.11 //
analyzed: vaiśākhyām ca viśeṣeṇa kailāsāt eti śaṅkaraḥ
tena tīrtham mahā puṇyam sarva pātaka nāśanam

original: kathitaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvaṃ mayā tava tathā nṛpa // RKV_156.12 //
analyzed: kathitam brahmaṇā pūrvam mayā tava tathā nṛpa

original: rajakena yathā dhautaṃ vastraṃ bhavati nirmalam /
analyzed: rajakena yathā dhautam vastram bhavati nirmalam

original: tathā tatra vapuḥsnānaṃ puruṣasya bhavecchuci // RKV_156.13 //
analyzed: tathā tatra vapuḥ snānam puruṣasya bhavet śuci

original: pūrve vayasi pāpāni kṛtvā puṣṭāni mānavaḥ /
analyzed: pūrve vayasi pāpāni kṛtvā puṣṭāni mānavaḥ
ahar rātra uṣitaḥ bhūtvā śuklatīrthe vyapohati
śuklatīrthe mahā rāja rākām revā jala añjalim

original: kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi dattvā syuḥ pitaraḥ śivāḥ // RKV_156.15 //
analyzed: kalpa koṭi sahasrāṇi dattvā syuḥ pitaraḥ śivāḥ

original: na mātā na pitā bandhuḥ patanaṃ narakārṇave /
analyzed: na mātā na pitā bandhuḥ patanam naraka arṇave

original: uddharanti yathā puṇyaṃ śuklatīrthe nareśvara // RKV_156.16 //
analyzed: uddharanti yathā puṇyam śuklatīrthe nareśvara

original: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa na tāṃ gacchanti sadgatim /
analyzed: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa na tām gacchanti sat gatim

original: śuklatīrthe mṛto janturdehatyāgena yāṃ labhet // RKV_156.17 //
analyzed: śuklatīrthe mṛtaḥ jantuḥ dehatyāgena yām labhet
kārttikasya tu māsasya kṛṣṇa pakṣe caturdaśīm

original: ghṛtena snāpayed devamupoṣya prayato naraḥ // RKV_156.18 //
analyzed: ghṛtena snāpayet devam upoṣya prayataḥ naraḥ
snātvā prabhāte revāyām dadyāt sa ghṛtakambalam
sa hiraṇyam yathāśakti devam uddiśya śaṅkaram
devasya pūraṇam kuryāt ghṛtena ghṛtakambalam

original: sa gacchati mahātejāḥ śivalokaṃ mṛto naraḥ // RKV_156.20 //
analyzed: sa gacchati mahā tejāḥ śiva lokam mṛtaḥ naraḥ
ekaviṃśa kula upetaḥ yāvat ābhūtasamplavam

original: śuklatīrthe naraḥ snātvā hyumāṃ rudraṃ ca yo 'rcayet // RKV_156.21 //
analyzed: śuklatīrthe naraḥ snātvā hi umām rudram ca yaḥ rcayet
gandha puṣpa ādi dhūpaiḥ ca saḥ śvamedha phalam labhet

original: māsopavāsaṃ yaḥ kuryāt tatra tīrthe nareśvara // RKV_156.22 //
analyzed: māsopavāsam yaḥ kuryāt tatra tīrthe nareśvara
mucyate sa mahat pāpaiḥ sapta janma su saṃcitaiḥ
uṣṭrī kṣīram avi kṣīram navaśrāddhe ca bhojanam
vṛṣalī gamanam ca eva tathā abhakṣyasya bhakṣaṇam
a vikraye pāpam māhiṣe yājya yājake
vārddhuṣye paṅkti gara de deva brāhmaṇa dūṣake
evamādīni pāpāni tathā anyāni api bhārata
cāndrāyaṇena naśyanti śuklatīrthe na saṃśayaḥ

original: śuklatīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā tarpayet pitṛdevatāḥ // RKV_156.26 //
analyzed: śuklatīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā tarpayet pitṛ devatāḥ

original: tasya te dvādaśābdāni tṛptiṃ yānti sutarpitāḥ /
analyzed: tasya te dvādaśa abdāni tṛptim yānti su tarpitāḥ

original: pādukopānahau chatraṃ śayyāmāsanam eva ca // RKV_156.27 //
analyzed: pādukā upānahau chatram śayyām āsanam eva ca

original: suvarṇaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ ca śrāddhaṃ yuktahalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: suvarṇam dhana dhānyam ca śrāddham yukta halam tathā

original: annaṃ pānīyasaṃhitaṃ tasmiṃstīrthe dadanti ye // RKV_156.28 //
analyzed: annam pānīya saṃhitam tasmin tīrthe dadanti ye

original: hṛṣṭāḥ puṣṭā mṛtā yānti śivalokaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: hṛṣṭāḥ puṣṭāḥ mṛtāḥ yānti śiva lokam na saṃśayaḥ

original: tatra tīrthe tu yo bhaktyā śivamuddiśya bhārata // RKV_156.29 //
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ bhaktyā śivam uddiśya bhārata

original: bhikṣāmātraṃ tathānnaṃ ye te 'pi svaryānti vai narāḥ /
analyzed: bhikṣā mātram tathā annam ye te svar yānti vai narāḥ

original: yajvināṃ vratināṃ caiva tatra tīrthanivāsinām // RKV_156.30 //
analyzed: yajvinām vratinām ca eva tatra tīrtha nivāsinām

original: api vālāgramātraṃ hi dattaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /
analyzed: api vāla agra mātram hi dattam bhavati ca akṣayam
agnipraveśam yaḥ kuryāt śuklatīrthe samāhitaḥ
rāga dveṣa vinirmuktaḥ hṛdi dhyātvā janārdanam

original: sarvakāmasusampūrṇaḥ sa gacched vāruṇaṃ puram // RKV_156.32 //
analyzed: sarva kāma su sampūrṇaḥ sa gacchet vāruṇam puram

original: na rogo na jarā tatra yatra devo 'ṃbhasāṃ patiḥ /
analyzed: na rogaḥ na jarā tatra yatra devaḥ ṃbhasām patiḥ

original: anāśakaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt tasmiṃstīrthe yudhiṣṭhira // RKV_156.33 //
analyzed: anāśakam tu yaḥ kuryāt tasmin tīrthe yudhiṣṭhira
anivartikā gatiḥ tasya rudra lokāt asaṃśayam
avaśaḥ svavaśaḥ vā api jantuḥ tad kṣetra maṇḍale

original: mṛtaḥ sa tu na sandeho rudrasyānucaro bhavet /
analyzed: mṛtaḥ sa tu na sandehaḥ rudrasya anucaraḥ bhavet

original: śuklatīrthe tu yaḥ kanyāṃ śaktyā dadyād alaṃkṛtām // RKV_156.35 //
analyzed: śuklatīrthe tu yaḥ kanyām śaktyā dadyāt alaṃkṛtām
vidhinā yaḥ nṛpa śreṣṭha kurute vṛṣa mokṣaṇam

original: tasya yat phalam uddiṣṭaṃ purāṇe rudrabhāṣitam // RKV_156.36 //
analyzed: tasya yat phalam uddiṣṭam purāṇe rudra bhāṣitam
tat aham sampravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ nṛpa

original: yāvanto romakūpāḥ syuḥ sarvāṅgeṣu pṛthakpṛthak // RKV_156.37 //
analyzed: yāvantaḥ romakūpāḥ syuḥ sarva aṅgeṣu pṛthak pṛthak
tāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi rudra loke mahīyate

original: śuklatīrthe tu yad dattaṃ grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // RKV_156.38 //
analyzed: śuklatīrthe tu yat dattam grahaṇe candra sūryayoḥ

original: vardhate tadguṇaṃ tāvaddināni daśa pañca ca /
analyzed: vardhate tad guṇam tāvat dināni daśa pañca ca

original: śuklatīrthe śucirbhūtvā yaḥ karoti pradakṣiṇam // RKV_156.39 //
analyzed: śuklatīrthe śuciḥ bhūtvā yaḥ karoti pradakṣiṇam

original: pṛthvī pradakṣiṇā tena kṛtā yattasya tatphalam /
analyzed: pṛthvī pradakṣiṇā tena kṛtā yat tasya tat phalam

original: śobhanaṃ mithunaṃ yastu rudram uddiśya pūjayet // RKV_156.40 //
analyzed: śobhanam mithunam yaḥ tu rudram uddiśya pūjayet

original: sapta janmāni tasyaiva viyogo na ca vai kvacit /
analyzed: sapta janmāni tasya eva viyogaḥ na ca vai kvacid

original: etatte kathitaṃ rājan saṃkṣepeṇa phalaṃ mahat // RKV_156.41 //
analyzed: etat te kathitam rājan saṃkṣepeṇa phalam mahat
śuklatīrthasya yat puṇyam yathā devāt śrutam mayā

original: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyādbhaktyā purāṇe vihitaṃ phalam // RKV_156.42 //
analyzed: yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt bhaktyā purāṇe vihitam phalam

original: sa labhennātra sandehaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: sa labhet na atra sandehaḥ satyam satyam punar punar

original: putrārthī labhate putraṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam // RKV_156.43 //
analyzed: putra arthī labhate putram dhana arthī labhate dhanam

original: mokṣārthī labhate mokṣaṃ snānadānaphalaṃ mahat // RKV_156.44 //
analyzed: mokṣa arthī labhate mokṣam snāna dāna phalam mahat

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śuklatīrthamahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śuklatīrthamahātmyavarṇanam nāma ṣaṭpañcāśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tasya eva anantaram rājan śuklatīrtha samīpatas

original: vāsudevasya tīrthaṃ tu sarvalokeṣu pūjitam // RKV_157.1 //
analyzed: vāsudevasya tīrtham tu sarva lokeṣu pūjitam
tat hi puṇyam su vikhyātam narmadāyām purātanam

original: yatra huṅkāramātreṇa revā krośaṃ jagāma sā // RKV_157.2 //
analyzed: yatra huṅkāra mātreṇa revā krośam jagāma sā

original: yadā prabhṛti rājendra huṅkāreṇa gatā sarit /
analyzed: yadā prabhṛti rāja indra huṅkāreṇa gatā sarit

original: tadāprabhṛti sa svāmī huṅkāraḥ śabdito budhaiḥ // RKV_157.3 //
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti sa svāmī huṅkāraḥ śabditaḥ budhaiḥ
huṅkāratīrthe yaḥ snātvā paśyati avyayam acyutam

original: sa mucyate naraḥ pāpaiḥ saptajanma kṛtairapi // RKV_157.4 //
analyzed: sa mucyate naraḥ pāpaiḥ sapta janma kṛtaiḥ api
saṃsāra arṇava magnānām narāṇām pāpa karmiṇām

original: naivoddhartā jagannāthaṃ vinā nārāyaṇaṃ paraḥ // RKV_157.5 //
analyzed: na eva uddhartā jagannātham vinā nārāyaṇam paraḥ

original: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam /
analyzed: sā jihvā yā harim stauti tat cittam yat tad arpitam

original: tāveva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau // RKV_157.6 //
analyzed: tau eva kevalau ślāghyau yau tad pūjā karau karau
sarvadā sarva kāryeṣu na asti teṣām amaṅgalam
yeṣām hṛdisthaḥ bhagavān maṅgala āyatanaḥ hariḥ

original: yad anyad devatārcāyāḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ /
analyzed: yat anyat devatā arcāyāḥ phalam prāpnoti mānavaḥ
sa aṣṭāṅga praṇipātena tat phalam labhate hareḥ
reṇu guṇṭhita gātrasya yāvantaḥ sya rajaḥ kaṇāḥ
tāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi viṣṇu loke mahīyate
sammārjana abhyukṣaṇa lepanena tad ālaye naśyati sarva pāpam

original: nārī narāṇāṃ parayā tu bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā tu revāṃ narasattamasya // RKV_157.10 //
analyzed: nārī narāṇām parayā tu bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā tu revām nara sattamasya

original: yenārcito bhagavānvāsudevo janmārjitaṃ naśyati tasya pāpam /
analyzed: yena arcitaḥ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ janma arjitam naśyati tasya pāpam

original: sa yāti lokaṃ garuḍadhvajasya vidhūtapāpaḥ surasaṅghapūjyatām // RKV_157.11 //
analyzed: sa yāti lokam garuḍadhvajasya vidhūta pāpaḥ sura saṅgha pūjya tām
śāṭhyena api namaskāram prayuñjan cakrapāṇinaḥ

original: saptajanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ gacchatyāśu na saṃśayaḥ // RKV_157.12 //
analyzed: sapta janma arjitam pāpam gacchati āśu na saṃśayaḥ
pūjāyām prīyate rudraḥ japa homaiḥ divākaraḥ
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇiḥ praṇipātena tuṣyati
bhava jaladhi gatānām dvandva vāta āhatānām suta duhitṛ kalatra trāṇa bhāra arditānām

original: viṣamaviṣayatoye majjatāmaplavānāṃ bhavati śaraṇameko viṣṇupoto narāṇām // RKV_157.14 //
analyzed: viṣama viṣaya toye majjatām aplavānām bhavati śaraṇam ekaḥ viṣṇu potaḥ narāṇām

original: huṅkāratīrthe rājendra śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
analyzed: huṅkāratīrthe rāja indra śubham vā yadi vā aśubham

original: yatkṛtaṃ puruṣavyāghra tannaśyati na karhicit // RKV_157.15 //
analyzed: yat kṛtam puruṣa vyāghra tat naśyati na karhicit

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe huṅkārasvāmitīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma saptapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe huṅkārasvāmitīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma saptapañcāśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet param tīrtham saṅgameśvaram uttamam
narmadā dakṣiṇe kūle sarva pāpa bhaya apaham
dhanadaḥ tatra viśrāntaḥ muhūrtam nṛpa sattama
pitṛ lokāt samāyātaḥ kailāsam dharaṇīdharam
pratyaya artham nṛpa śreṣṭha hi adyā api dharaṇī tale

original: kṛṣṇavarṇā hi pāṣāṇā dṛśyante sphaṭikojjvalāḥ // RKV_158.3 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa varṇāḥ hi pāṣāṇāḥ dṛśyante sphaṭika ujjvalāḥ
vindhya nirjhara niṣkrāntā puṇya toyā sarit varā
praviṣṭāḥ narmadā toye sarva pāpa praṇāśane

original: saṅgame tatra yaḥ snātvā pūjayet saṅgameśvaram /
analyzed: saṅgame tatra yaḥ snātvā pūjayet saṅgameśvaram

original: aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // RKV_158.5 //
analyzed: aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalam prāpnoti asaṃśayam
yaḥ dadet saṅgameśvare
haṃsa yukta vimāna sthaḥ divya strī śata saṃvṛtaḥ
sa rudra padam āpnoti rudrasya anucaraḥ bhavet

original: dadhi bhakte na devasya yaḥ kuryālliṅgapūraṇam // RKV_158.7 //
analyzed: dadhi bhakte na devasya yaḥ kuryāt liṅga pūraṇam

original: sikthasaṃkhyaṃ śive loke sa vaset kālam īpsitam /
analyzed: siktha saṃkhyam śive loke sa vaset kālam īpsitam

original: śrīphalaiḥ pūrayelliṅgaṃ niḥsvo bhūtvā bhavasya tu // RKV_158.8 //
analyzed: śrīphalaiḥ pūrayet liṅgam niḥsvaḥ bhūtvā bhavasya tu
saḥ pi tat phalam āpnoti gataḥ svarge nareśvara
akṣayā santatiḥ tasya jāyate sapta janmasu
snapanam devadevasya dadhnā madhu ghṛtena vā

original: yaḥ karoti vidhānena tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu // RKV_158.10 //
analyzed: yaḥ karoti vidhānena tasya puṇya phalam śṛṇu
dhṛta kṣīra vahāḥ nadyaḥ yatra vṛkṣāḥ madhu sravāḥ

original: tatra te mānavā yānti suprasanne maheśvare // RKV_158.11 //
analyzed: tatra te mānavāḥ yānti su prasanne maheśvare

original: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yastu dadyānmaheśvare /
analyzed: patram puṣpam phalam toyam yaḥ tu dadyāt maheśvare

original: tatsarvaṃ saptajanmāni hyakṣayaṃ phalam aśnute // RKV_158.12 //
analyzed: tat sarvam sapta janmāni hi akṣayam phalam aśnute
sarveṣām eva pātrāṇām mahā pātram maheśvaraḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pūjanīyaḥ maheśvaraḥ
brahmacarya sthitaḥ nityam yaḥ tu pūjayate śivam

original: iha jīvansa deveśo mṛto gacched anāmayam // RKV_158.14 //
analyzed: iha jīvan sa deveśaḥ mṛtaḥ gacchet anāmayam

original: śive tu pūjite pārtha yatphalaṃ prāpyate budhaiḥ /
analyzed: śive tu pūjite pārtha yat phalam prāpyate budhaiḥ

original: yogīndre caiva tatpārtha pūjite labhate phalam // RKV_158.15 //
analyzed: yogi indre ca eva tat pārtha pūjite labhate phalam

original: te dhanyāste mahātmānas teṣāṃ janma sujīvitam /
analyzed: te dhanyāḥ te mahātmānaḥ teṣām janma su jīvitam

original: yeṣāṃ gṛheṣu bhuñjanti śivabhaktiratā narāḥ // RKV_158.16 //
analyzed: yeṣām gṛheṣu bhuñjanti śiva bhakti ratāḥ narāḥ
saṃnirudhya indriya grāmam yatra yatra vaset muniḥ

original: tatra tatra kurukṣetraṃ naimiṣaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca // RKV_158.17 //
analyzed: tatra tatra kurukṣetram naimiṣam puṣkarāṇi ca
yat phalam veda viduṣi bhojite śata saṃkhyayā

original: tatphalaṃ jāyate pārtha hyekena śivayoginā // RKV_158.18 //
analyzed: tat phalam jāyate pārtha hi ekena śiva yoginā

original: yatra bhuñjati bhasmāṅgī mūrkho vā yadi paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: yatra bhuñjati bhasma aṅgī mūrkhaḥ vā yadi paṇḍitaḥ

original: tatra bhuñjati deveśaḥ sapatnīko vṛṣadhvajaḥ // RKV_158.19 //
analyzed: tatra bhuñjati deveśaḥ sa patnīkaḥ vṛṣadhvajaḥ
viprāṇām veda viduṣām koṭim saṃbhojya yat phalam
bhikṣā mātra pradānena tat phalam śiva yoginām
saṅgameśvaram āsādya prāṇatyāgam karoti yaḥ

original: na tasya punarāvṛttiḥ śivalokāt kadācana // RKV_158.21 //
analyzed: na tasya punarāvṛttiḥ śiva lokāt kadācana

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe saṅgameśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe saṅgameśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma aṣṭapañcāśat adhika śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet mahā rāja tīrtham parama pāvanam
narmadāyām suduṣprāpam siddham hi anarakeśvaram
tasmin tīrthe naraḥ snātvā pāpa karmā api bhārata
na paśyati mahā ghoram naraka dvāra saṃjñikam
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca
śubha aśubha phalaiḥ tāta bhukta bhogāḥ narāḥ tu iha

original: jāyante lakṣaṇairyaistu tāni me vada sattama // RKV_159.3 //
analyzed: jāyante lakṣaṇaiḥ yaiḥ tu tāni me vada sattama

original: yathā nirgacchate jīvastyaktvā dehaṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: yathā nirgacchate jīvaḥ tyaktvā deham na paśyati
tathā gacchan punar deham pañcabhūta samanvitaḥ
tvak asthi māṃsa medaḥ usṛj keśa snāyu śataiḥ saha

original: viṇmūtraretaḥsaṅghāte kā saṃjñā jāyate nṛṇām // RKV_159.5 //
analyzed: viṣ mūtra retaḥ saṅghāte kā saṃjñā jāyate nṛṇām
evam uktaḥ sa mārkaṇḍaḥ kathayāmāsa yoga vid

original: dhyātvā sanātanaṃ sarvaṃ devadevaṃ maheśvaram // RKV_159.6 //
analyzed: dhyātvā sanātanam sarvam devadevam maheśvaram
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
śṛṇu pārtha mahā praśnam kathayāmi yathāśrutam
sakāśāt brahmaṇaḥ pūrvam ṛṣi deva samāgame
guruḥ ātmavatām śāstā rājā śāstā durātmanām

original: iha pracchannapāpānāṃ śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ // RKV_159.8 //
analyzed: iha pracchanna pāpānām śāstā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ
a cīrṇa prāyaścittānām yama loke hi anekadhā
yātanābhiḥ viyuktānām anekām jīva santatim

original: gatvā manuṣyabhāve tu pāpacihnā bhavanti te /
analyzed: gatvā manuṣya bhāve tu pāpa cihnāḥ bhavanti te
tat te ham sampravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ nṛpa
sahitvā yātanām sarvām gatvā vaivasvata kṣayam

original: vistīrṇayātanā ye tu lokamāyānti cihnitāḥ // RKV_159.11 //
analyzed: vistīrṇa yātanāḥ ye tu lokam āyānti cihnitāḥ
gadgadaḥ nṛta vādī syāt mūkaḥ ca eva gavānṛte

original: brahmahā jāyate kuṣṭhī śyāvadantastu madyapaḥ // RKV_159.12 //
analyzed: brahma hā jāyate kuṣṭhī śyāva dantaḥ tu madyapaḥ
kunakhī svarṇa haraṇāt duḥścarmā guru talpa gaḥ
saṃyogī hīna yoniḥ syāt daridraḥ datta dānataḥ
grāma śūkara tām yāti hi a yājya yājakaḥ nṛpa
kharaḥ vai bahu yājī syāt śvā a nimantrita bhojanāt
aparīkṣita bhojī syāt vānaraḥ vijane vane
mārjāraḥ khadyotaḥ kakṣa dāhataḥ

original: avidyāṃ yaḥ prayaccheta balīvardo bhaveddhi saḥ /
analyzed: avidyām yaḥ prayaccheta balīvardaḥ bhavet hi saḥ

original: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre dadānaḥ klībatāṃ vrajet // RKV_159.16 //
analyzed: annam paryuṣitam vipre dadānaḥ klība tām vrajet
mātsaryāt atha jātyandhaḥ janmāndhaḥ pustakam haran
phalāni āharataḥ mriyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
mṛtaḥ vānara tām yāti
a dattvā bhakṣayan tāni hi anapatyaḥ bhavet naraḥ
haran vastram bhavet godhā garadaḥ pavanāśanaḥ

original: pravrājī gamanād rājan bhaven marupiśācakaḥ // RKV_159.19 //
analyzed: pravrājī gamanāt rājan bhavet maru piśācakaḥ

original: vātako jalahartā ca dhānyahartā ca mūṣakaḥ /
analyzed: vātakaḥ jala hartā ca dhānya hartā ca mūṣakaḥ

original: aprāptayauvanāṃ gacchan bhavet sarpa iti śrutiḥ // RKV_159.20 //
analyzed: aprāpta yauvanām gacchan bhavet sarpaḥ iti śrutiḥ
guru dāra abhilāṣī ca kṛkalāsaḥ bhavet ciram
jala prasravaṇam yaḥ tu bhindyāt matsyaḥ bhavet naraḥ
avikreyān vikrayan vai vikaṭa akṣaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: ayonigo vṛko hi syād ulūkaḥ krayavañcanāt // RKV_159.22 //
analyzed: a yoni gaḥ vṛkaḥ hi syāt ulūkaḥ kraya vañcanāt
mṛtasya ekādaśa ahe tu bhuñjānaḥ śvā upajāyate

original: pratiśrutya dvijāyārtham adadan madhuko bhavet // RKV_159.23 //
analyzed: pratiśrutya dvijāya artham a dadan madhukaḥ bhavet
rājñī gamāt bhavet duṣṭa taskaraḥ viḍvarāhakaḥ

original: parivādī dvijātīnāṃ labhate kācchapīṃ tanum // RKV_159.24 //
analyzed: parivādī dvijātīnām labhate kācchapīm tanum
vrajet devalakaḥ rājan yonim cāṇḍāla saṃjñitām
durbhagaḥ phala vikretā vṛścikaḥ vṛṣalī patiḥ
mārjāraḥ gnim padā spṛṣṭvā rogavān para māṃsa bhuj
sodarya āgamanāt ṣaṇḍhaḥ durgandhaḥ ca sugandha hṛt
bhavet

original: kupaṇḍitaḥ syānmārjāro bhaṣaṇo vyāsa eva ca // RKV_159.27 //
analyzed: kupaṇḍitaḥ syāt mārjāraḥ bhaṣaṇaḥ vyāsaḥ eva ca
saḥ eva dṛśyate rājan prakāśāt para marmaṇām

original: yadvā tadvāpi pārakyaṃ svalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu // RKV_159.28 //
analyzed: yat vā tat vā api pārakyam su alpam vā yadi vā bahu

original: kṛtvā vai yonimāpnoti tairaścīṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā vai yonim āpnoti tairaścīm na atra saṃśayaḥ
evamādīni ca anyāni cihnāni nṛpa sattama
sva karma vihitāni eva dṛśyante yaiḥ tu mānavāḥ

original: tato janma tato mṛtyuḥ sarvajantuṣu bhārata // RKV_159.30 //
analyzed: tatas janma tatas mṛtyuḥ sarva jantuṣu bhārata
jāyate na atra sandehaḥ samībhūte śubha aśubhe
strī puṃsoḥ samprayogeṇa śukra śoṇite
pañcabhūta samopetaḥ sa ṣaṣṭhaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇā jñānamāyuḥ sukhaṃ dhṛtiḥ // RKV_159.32 //
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇāḥ jñānam āyuḥ sukham dhṛtiḥ
dhāraṇam preraṇam duḥkham icchā ahaṅkāraḥ eva ca
prayatnaḥ ākṛtiḥ varṇaḥ svara dveṣau bhava abhavau
tasya idam ātmanaḥ sarvam anādeḥ ādim icchataḥ

original: prathame māsi sa kledabhūto dhātuvimūrchitaḥ // RKV_159.34 //
analyzed: prathame māsi sa kleda bhūtaḥ dhātu vimūrchitaḥ
māsi arbudam dvitīye tu tṛtīye ca indriyaiḥ yutaḥ
ākāśāt lāghavam saukṣmyam śabdam śrotra bala ādikam

original: vāyostu sparśanaṃ ceṣṭāṃ dahanaṃ raukṣyameva ca // RKV_159.35 //
analyzed: vāyoḥ tu sparśanam ceṣṭām dahanam raukṣyam eva ca
pittāt tu darśanam paktim auṣṇyam rūpam prakāśanam

original: salilādrasanāṃ śaityaṃ snehaṃ kledaṃ samārdavam // RKV_159.36 //
analyzed: salilāt rasanām śaityam sneham kledam sa mārdavam

original: bhūmergandhaṃ tathā ghrāṇaṃ gauravaṃ mūrtimeva ca /
analyzed: bhūmeḥ gandham tathā ghrāṇam gauravam mūrtim eva ca

original: ātmā gṛhṇātyajaḥ pūrvaṃ tṛtīye spandate ca saḥ // RKV_159.37 //
analyzed: ātmā gṛhṇāti ajaḥ pūrvam tṛtīye spandate ca saḥ
daurhṛdasya apradānena garbhaḥ doṣam avāpnuyāt

original: vairūpyaṃ maraṇaṃ vāpi tasmātkāryaṃ priyaṃ striyāḥ // RKV_159.38 //
analyzed: vairūpyam maraṇam vā api tasmāt kāryam priyam striyāḥ
sthairyam caturthe tu aṅgānām pañcame śoṇita udbhavaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhe balaṃ ca varṇaśca nakharomṇāṃ ca sambhavaḥ // RKV_159.39 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe balam ca varṇaḥ ca nakha romṇām ca sambhavaḥ
manasā cetanā yuktaḥ nakha roma śata āvṛtaḥ

original: saptame cāṣṭame caiva tvacāvān smṛtivān api // RKV_159.40 //
analyzed: saptame ca aṣṭame ca eva tvacāvān smṛtivān api
punar garbham punar dhātrīm enaḥ tasya pradhāvati

original: aṣṭame māsyato garbho jātaḥ prāṇairviyujyate // RKV_159.41 //
analyzed: aṣṭame māsi atas garbhaḥ jātaḥ prāṇaiḥ viyujyate
navame daśame vā api prabalaiḥ sūtimārutaiḥ

original: nirgacchate bāṇa iva yantracchidreṇa sajvaraḥ // RKV_159.42 //
analyzed: nirgacchate bāṇaḥ iva yantra chidreṇa sa jvaraḥ
śarīra avayavaiḥ yuktaḥ hi aṅga pratyaṅga saṃyutaḥ

original: aṣṭottaraṃ marmaśataṃ tatrāsthā tu śatatrayam // RKV_159.43 //
analyzed: aṣṭa uttaram marma śatam tu śata trayam
sapta śiraḥ kapālāni vihitāni svayambhuvā

original: tisraḥ koṭyo 'rdhakoṭī ca romṇāmaṅgeṣu bhārata // RKV_159.44 //
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ ṛdha koṭī ca romṇām aṅgeṣu bhārata
dvāsaptati sahasrāṇi hṛdayāt abhinisṛtāḥ

original: hitānāma hi tā nāḍyas tāsāṃ madhye śaśiprabhā // RKV_159.45 //
analyzed: hitā nāma hi tāḥ nāḍyaḥ tāsām madhye śaśiprabhā
evam pravartate cakram bhūta grāme caturvidhe
utpattiḥ ca vināśaḥ ca bhavataḥ sarva dehinām
gatiḥ ūrdhvā ca dharmeṇa hi adharmeṇa tu adhogatiḥ
jāyate sarva varṇānām svadharma calanāt nṛpa
deva tve mānava tve ca dāna bhoga ādikāḥ kriyāḥ

original: dṛśyante yā mahārāja tatsarvaṃ karmajaṃ phalam // RKV_159.48 //
analyzed: dṛśyante yāḥ mahā rāja tat sarvam karma jam phalam
sva karma vihite ghore śubhe

original: nimajjennarake ghore yasyottāro na vidyate // RKV_159.49 //
analyzed: nimajjet narake ghore yasya uttāraḥ na vidyate
uttāraṇāya jantūnām narmadā taṭa saṃsthitam
evam etat mahā tīrtham narakeśvaram uttamam
naraka apaham mahā puṇyam mahāpātaka nāśanam
tat tīrtham sarva tīrthānām uttamam bhuvi durlabham

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayeta maheśvaram /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayeta maheśvaram
narakam na eva paśyati

original: tatra tīrthe tu yo dadyād dhenuṃ vaitaraṇīṃ śubhām /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ dadyāt dhenum vaitaraṇīm śubhām

original: sa mucyate sukhenaiva vaitaraṇyāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // RKV_159.53 //
analyzed: sa mucyate sukhena eva vaitaraṇyām na saṃśayaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: yamadvāre mahāghore yā sā vaitaraṇī nadī /
analyzed: yama dvāre mahā ghore yā sā vaitaraṇī nadī

original: kiṃrūpā kiṃpramāṇā sā kathaṃ sā vahati dvija // RKV_159.54 //
analyzed: kiṃrūpā kiṃpramāṇā sā katham sā vahati dvija

original: kathaṃ tasyāḥ pramucyante keṣāṃ vāsastu saṃtatam /
analyzed: katham tasyāḥ pramucyante keṣām vāsaḥ tu saṃtatam

original: keṣāṃ tu sānukūlā sā hyetadvistarato vada // RKV_159.55 //
analyzed: keṣām tu sā anukūlā sā hi etat vistarataḥ vada
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
dharmaputra mahā bāho śṛṇu sarvam mayā uditam

original: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma yamadvāre mahāsarit // RKV_159.56 //
analyzed: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma yama dvāre mahā sarit
agādhā pāra rahitā dṛṣṭa mātrā bhaya āvahā
pūya śoṇita toyā sā māṃsa kardama nirmitā

original: tattoyaṃ bhramate tūrṇaṃ tāpīmadhye ghṛtaṃ yathā /
analyzed: tat toyam bhramate tūrṇam tāpī madhye ghṛtam yathā
kṛmibhiḥ saṅkulam pūyam vajratuṇḍaiḥ ayomukhaiḥ
śiśumāraiḥ ca makaraiḥ vajra kartari saṃyutaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca jala jīvaiḥ sā su hiṃsraiḥ marma bhedibhiḥ
tapanti dvādaśa ādityāḥ pralaya ante iva ulbaṇāḥ

original: patanti tatra vai martyāḥ krandanto bhṛśadāruṇam // RKV_159.60 //
analyzed: patanti tatra vai martyāḥ krandantaḥ bhṛśa dāruṇam

original: hā bhrātaḥ putra hā mātaḥ pralapanti muhurmuhuḥ /
analyzed: hā bhrātar putra hā mātar pralapanti muhur muhur
asipattravane ghore patantam yaḥ abhirakṣati
prataranti nimajjanti glānim gacchanti jantavaḥ
caturvidhaiḥ prāṇi gaṇaiḥ draṣṭavyā sā mahā nadī

original: taranti tasyāṃ saddānairanyathā tu patanti te /
analyzed: taranti tasyām sat dānaiḥ anyathā tu patanti te

original: mātaraṃ ye na manyante hyācāryaṃ gurumeva ca // RKV_159.63 //
analyzed: mātaram ye na manyante hi ācāryam gurum eva ca

original: avajānanti mūḍhā ye teṣāṃ vāsastu saṃtatam /
analyzed: avajānanti mūḍhāḥ ye teṣām vāsaḥ tu saṃtatam
pativratām sādhu śīlām ūḍhām dharmeṣu niścalām

original: parityajanti ye pāpāḥ saṃtataṃ tu vasanti te /
analyzed: parityajanti ye pāpāḥ saṃtatam tu vasanti te
viśvāsa pratipannānām svāmi mitra tapasvinām
strī bāla vṛddha dīnānām chidram anveṣayanti ye

original: pacyante tatra madhye vai krandamānāḥ supāpinaḥ // RKV_159.66 //
analyzed: pacyante tatra madhye vai krandamānāḥ su pāpinaḥ

original: śrāntaṃ bubhukṣitaṃ vipraṃ yo vighnayati durmatiḥ /
analyzed: śrāntam bubhukṣitam vipram yaḥ vighnayati durmatiḥ
kṛmibhiḥ bhakṣyate tatra yāvat kalpa śata trayam

original: brāhmaṇāya pratiśrutya yo dānaṃ na prayacchati /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāya pratiśrutya yaḥ dānam na prayacchati

original: āhūya nāsti yo brūte tasya vāsastu saṃtatam // RKV_159.68 //
analyzed: āhūya na asti yaḥ brūte tasya vāsaḥ tu saṃtatam
agnidaḥ gara daḥ ca eva rāja gāmī ca paiśunī
kathā bhaṅga karaḥ ca eva kūṭa sākṣī ca madyapaḥ
vajra vidhvaṃsakaḥ ca eva svayaṃdatta apahārakaḥ
su kṣetra setu bhedī ca para dāra pradharṣakaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ rasa vikretā vṛṣalī patiḥ eva ca

original: gokulasya tṛṣārtasya pālībhedaṃ karoti yaḥ // RKV_159.71 //
analyzed: go kulasya tṛṣā ārtasya pālī bhedam karoti yaḥ
kanyā abhidūṣakaḥ ca eva dānam dattvā tu tāpakaḥ
śūdraḥ tu kapilāpānī brāhmaṇaḥ māṃsa bhojanī

original: ete vasanti satataṃ mā vicāraṃ kṛthā nṛpa /
analyzed: ete vasanti satatam mā vicāram kṛthāḥ nṛpa

original: sānukūlā bhavedyena tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa // RKV_159.73 //
analyzed: sā anukūlā bhavet yena tat śṛṇuṣva narādhipa
ayane viṣuve ca eva vyatīpāte dinakṣaye
anyeṣu puṇya kāleṣu dīyate dānam uttamam

original: kṛṣṇāṃ vā pāṭalāṃ vāpi kuryādvaitaraṇīṃ śubhām /
analyzed: kṛṣṇām vā pāṭalām vā api kuryāt vaitaraṇīm śubhām
svarṇa śṛṅgīm rūpya khurām kāṃsya pātrasya dohinīm
kṛṣṇa vastra yuga ācchannām saptadhānya samanvitām
kuryāt sa droṇa śikhare āsīnām tāmra bhājane
yamam haimam prakurvīta loha daṇḍa samanvitam
ikṣu daṇḍa mayam baddhvā hi uḍupam paṭṭabandhanaiḥ
uḍupa upari tām dhenum sūrya deha samudbhavām
kṛtvā prakalpayet chattra upānah yuga anvitām
aṅgulīyaka vāsāṃsi brāhmaṇāya nivedayet
imam uccārayet mantram saṃgṛhya asyāḥ ca pucchakam

original: oṃ yamadvāre mahāghore yā sā vaitaraṇī nadī /
analyzed: om yama dvāre mahā ghore yā sā vaitaraṇī nadī
tartu kāmaḥ dadāmi enām tubhyam vaitaraṇi namaḥ
iti adhivāsana mantraḥ

original: gāvo me cāgrataḥ santu gāvo me santu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: gāvaḥ me ca agratas santu gāvaḥ me santu pṛṣṭhatas

original: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // RKV_159.81 //
analyzed: gāvaḥ me hṛdaye santu gavām madhye vasāmi aham
om viṣṇu rūpa dvijaśreṣṭha bhūdeva paṅkti pāvana

original: sadakṣiṇā mayā dattā tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇi namaḥ /
analyzed: sa dakṣiṇā mayā dattā tubhyam vaitaraṇi namaḥ
iti dāna mantraḥ

original: brāhmaṇaṃ dharmarājaṃ ca dhenuṃ vaitaraṇīṃ śivām /
analyzed: brāhmaṇam dharmarājam ca dhenum vaitaraṇīm śivām
sarvam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya brāhmaṇāya nivedayet

original: pucchaṃ saṃgṛhya surabheragre kṛtvā dvijaṃ tataḥ // RKV_159.84 //
analyzed: puccham saṃgṛhya surabheḥ agre kṛtvā dvijam tatas
dhenuke tvam pratīkṣasva yama dvāre mahā bhaye
uttitīrṣuḥ aham dheno vaitaraṇyai namaḥ stu te
iti anuvraja mantraḥ

original: anuvrajeta gacchantaṃ sarvaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ nayet /
analyzed: anuvrajeta gacchantam sarvam tasya gṛham nayet
evam kṛte mahīpāla sarit syāt sukha vāhinī
tārayate tayā dhenvā sā sarit jala vāhinī

original: sarvānkāmānavāpnoti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ // RKV_159.87 //
analyzed: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti ye divyāḥ ye ca mānuṣāḥ
rogī rogāt vimuktaḥ syāt śāmyanti parama āpadaḥ
svasthe sahasra guṇitam āture śata saṃmitam

original: mṛtasyaiva tu yaddānaṃ parokṣe tatsamaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: mṛtasya eva tu yat dānam parokṣe tad samam smṛtam

original: svahastena tato deyaṃ mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyati /
analyzed: sva hastena tatas deyam mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyati

original: iti matvā mahārāja svadattaṃ syānmahāphalam // RKV_159.89 //
analyzed: iti matvā mahā rāja sva dattam syāt mahā phalam

original: ityevamuktaṃ tava dharmasūno dānaṃ mayā vaitaraṇīsamuttham /
analyzed: iti evam uktam tava dharmasūno dānam mayā vaitaraṇī samuttham

original: śṛṇoti bhaktyā paṭhatīha samyaksa yāti viṣṇoḥ padamaprameyam // RKV_159.90 //
analyzed: śṛṇoti bhaktyā paṭhati iha samyak sa yāti viṣṇoḥ padam aprameyam

prāpte ca āśvayuje māsi tasmin kṛṣṇā caturdaśī

original: snātvā kṛtvā tataḥ śrāddhaṃ sampūjya ca maheśvaram // RKV_159.91 //
analyzed: snātvā kṛtvā tatas śrāddham sampūjya ca maheśvaram
pitṛbhyaḥ dīyate dānam bhakti śraddhā samanvitaiḥ

tatas prabhāta samaye snātvā vai narmadā jale
tarpaṇam vidhivat kṛtvā pitḥṇām deva pūrvakam

original: paścāt saṃbhojayed viprān svayaṃ caiva vimatsaraḥ // RKV_159.94 //
analyzed: paścāt saṃbhojayet viprān svayam ca eva vimatsaraḥ

original: evaṃ kṛte naraśreṣṭha na janturnarakaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: evam kṛte nara śreṣṭha na jantuḥ narakam vrajet
avaśyam eva manujaiḥ draṣṭavyā nārakī sthitiḥ

original: tatra tīrthe mṛtānāṃ tu narāṇāṃ vidhinā nṛpa // RKV_159.96 //
analyzed: tatra tīrthe mṛtānām tu narāṇām vidhinā nṛpa

original: manvantaraṃ śive loke vāso bhavati durlabhe /
analyzed: manvantaram śive loke vāsaḥ bhavati durlabhe
vimānena arka varṇena kiṃkiṇī śata śobhinā
sa gacchati mahābhāga sevyamānaḥ psaraḥ gaṇaiḥ
bhunakti vividhān bhogān ukta kālam na saṃśayaḥ

original: pūrṇe caiva tataḥ kāla iha mānuṣyatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: pūrṇe ca eva tatas kāle iha mānuṣya tām gataḥ
sarva vyādhi vinirmuktaḥ jīvet ca śaradām śatam
prāpya ca āśvayuje māsi kṛṣṇa pakṣe caturdaśīm
ahar rātra uṣitaḥ bhūtvā pūjayitvā maheśvaram
mahāpātaka yuktaḥ upi mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
aṣṭāviṃśati koṭyaḥ vai narakāṇām yudhiṣṭhira

original: vimuktā narakairduḥkhaiḥ śivalokaṃ vrajanti te // RKV_159.101 //
analyzed: vimuktāḥ narakaiḥ duḥkhaiḥ śiva lokam vrajanti te

original: labhante mānuṣaṃ janma durlabhaṃ bhuvi mānavāḥ // RKV_159.102 //
analyzed: labhante mānuṣam janma durlabham bhuvi mānavāḥ

original: // iti śrīskande mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe 'narakeśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skande mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe narakeśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ekonaṣaṣṭi uttara śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet pāṇḍu putra mokṣatīrtham anuttamam
sevitam deva gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ ca tapodhanaiḥ

original: yatra siddhā mahābhāgā ṛṣayaḥ satapodhanāḥ // RKV_160.2 //
analyzed: yatra siddhāḥ mahābhāgāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sa tapodhanāḥ
pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ vidvān kratuḥ ca eva mahāmatiḥ

original: prācetaso vasiṣṭhaśca dakṣo nārada eva ca // RKV_160.3 //
analyzed: prācetasaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca dakṣaḥ nāradaḥ eva ca
ete ca anye mahābhāgāḥ sapta sāhasra saṃjñitāḥ

original: mokṣaṃ gatāḥ saha sutaistattīrthaṃ tena mokṣadam // RKV_160.4 //
analyzed: mokṣam gatāḥ saha sutaiḥ tat tīrtham tena mokṣa dam

original: tatra pravāhamadhye tu patitā tamahā nadī /
analyzed: tatra pravāha madhye tu patitā nadī
tatra tat saṅgamam tīrtham sarva pāpa kṣayaṃkaram
ṛk yajuḥ sāma saṃjñānām abhyastānām tu yat phalam

original: samyagjaptvā tu vidhinā gāyatrīṃ tatra tallabhet // RKV_160.6 //
analyzed: samyak japtvā tu vidhinā gāyatrīm tatra tat labhet

original: tatra dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ tīrthasevārjitaṃ phalam /
analyzed: tatra dattam hutam japtam tīrtha sevā arjitam phalam
sarvam akṣaya tām yāti mokṣa sādhanam uttamam

original: tatra tīrthe mṛtānāṃ tu saṃnyāsena dvijanmanām /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe mṛtānām tu saṃnyāsena dvijanmanām
anivartikā gatiḥ teṣām mokṣatīrtha prabhāvataḥ
eṣa te vidhiḥ uddiṣṭaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa mayā anagha
vyuṣṭiḥ tīrthasya mahatī purāṇe yā abhidhīyate

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe mokṣatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe mokṣatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ṣaṣṭi uttara śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas gacchet mahā rāja sarpatīrtham anuttamam
yatra siddhāḥ mahā sarpāḥ tapaḥ taptvā yudhiṣṭhira
vāsukiḥ takṣakaḥ ghoraḥ sārpa airāvataḥ tathā
kāliyaḥ ca mahābhāgaḥ karkoṭaka dhanaṃjayau
śaṅkhacūḍaḥ mahā tejāḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ vṛkodaraḥ

original: kuliko vāmanaścaiva teṣāṃ ye putrapautriṇaḥ // RKV_161.3 //
analyzed: kulikaḥ vāmanaḥ ca eva teṣām ye putra pautriṇaḥ

bhuñjanti vividhān bhogān krīḍanti ca yathāsukham

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā tarpayet pitṛdevatāḥ /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā tarpayet pitṛ devatāḥ

original: vājapeyaphalaṃ tasya purā provāca śaṅkaraḥ // RKV_161.5 //
analyzed: vājapeya phalam tasya purā provāca śaṅkaraḥ

original: snātānāṃ sarpatīrthe tu narāṇāṃ bhuvi bhārata /
analyzed: snātānām sarpatīrthe tu narāṇām bhuvi bhārata

original: sarpavṛścikajātibhyo na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // RKV_161.6 //
analyzed: sarpa vṛścika jātibhyaḥ na bhayam vidyate kvacid
mṛtaḥ bhogavatīm gatvā pūjyamānaḥ mahā uragaiḥ
nāga kanyā parivṛtaḥ mahā bhogapatiḥ bhavet
mārgaśīrṣasya māsasya kṛṣṇa pakṣe ca yā aṣṭamī
sa upavāsaḥ śuciḥ bhūtvā liṅgam sampūrayet tilaiḥ
yathā vibhava sāreṇa gandha puṣpaiḥ samarcayet
evam vidhāya vidhivat praṇipatya kṣamāpayet
tasya yat phalam uddiṣṭam tat śṛṇuṣva nareśvara
tilāḥ tatra ca yad saṃkhyāḥ patra puṣpa phalāni ca
tāvat svargapure rājan modate kālam īpsitam
tatas svargāt paribhraṣṭaḥ jāyate vimale kule
surūpaḥ subhagaḥ ca eva dhana koṭi patiḥ bhavet

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe sarpatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmaikaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe sarpatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ekaṣaṣṭi uttara śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
gopeśvaram tatas gacchet sarpa kṣetrāt anantaram

original: yatra snānena caikena mucyante pātakairnarāḥ // RKV_162.1 //
analyzed: yatra snānena ca ekena mucyante pātakaiḥ narāḥ

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā kurute prāṇasaṃkṣayam /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā kurute prāṇa saṃkṣayam

original: sa gacchedyadi yukto 'pi pāpena śivamandiram // RKV_162.2 //
analyzed: sa gacchet yadi pāpena śiva mandiram

original: tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā pūjayeddevamīśvaram /

analyzed: mucyate sarva pāpaiḥ ca rudra lokam sa gacchati

original: iha mānuṣyatāṃ prāpya rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // RKV_162.4 //
analyzed: iha mānuṣya tām prāpya rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ

original: pātālaṃ bhūtalaṃ tyaktvā viśravaṃ cakame patim // RKV_168.15 //

original: tataḥ sa yauvanaṃ prāpya jñātvā rakṣaḥ pitāmaham /
analyzed: tatas sa yauvanam prāpya jñātvā rakṣaḥ pitāmaham
param nirvedam āpannaḥ cacāra su mahat tapaḥ

original: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te tava dāsyāmi suvrata // RKV_168.22 //

original: jagāma bhavanaṃ rakṣo yatra rājā vibhīṣaṇaḥ // RKV_168.30 //

etat te kathitam rājan aṅkūreśvara sambhavam

analyzed: kālāgni rudra nāmāni sa gacchet paramām gatim

original: atra tīrthe kṛtaṃ sarvam acirāt sidhyate nṛpa // RKV_187.9 //
analyzed: atra tīrthe kṛtam sarvam acirāt sidhyate nṛpa

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe kālāgnirudratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma saptāśītyuttaraśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe kālāgnirudratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma saptāśīti uttara śatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas param mahā rāja catvāriṃśat krama antare
śālagrāmam tatas gacchet sarva daivata pūjitam

original: svayaṃ tiṣṭhati lokātmā sarveṣāṃ hitakāmyayā // RKV_188.2 //
analyzed: svayam tiṣṭhati loka ātmā sarveṣām hita kāmyayā

analyzed: siddhikṣetram bhṛgukṣetram jñātvā revā taṭe svayam

sādhūnām ca upakārāya vāsudevaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
yoginām upakārāya yogi dhyeyaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: snātvā revājale puṇye taddinaṃ samupoṣayet // RKV_188.6 //
analyzed: snātvā revā jale puṇye tad dinam

analyzed: rātrau jāgaraṇam kuryāt sampūjya ca janārdanam

original: snātvā saṃtarpya devāṃśca pitḥnmātḥs tathaiva ca /
analyzed: snātvā saṃtarpya devān ca pitṝn mātṝḥ tathā eva ca

original: śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścāt pitṛbhyo vidhipūrvakam // RKV_188.8 //
analyzed: śrāddham kṛtvā tatas paścāt pitṛbhyaḥ vidhi pūrvakam
śaktitas brāhmaṇān pūjya svarṇa vastra anna dānataḥ

original: evaṃ kṛte mahārāja yatpuṇyaṃ ca bhavennḥṇām /
analyzed: evam kṛte mahā rāja yat puṇyam ca bhavet nḥṇām
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā tat puṇyam nṛpa sattama

original: na śokaduḥkhe pratipatsyatīha jīvanmṛto yāti murārisāmyam /
analyzed: na śoka duḥkhe pratipatsyati iha jīvanmṛtaḥ yāti murāri sāmyam

original: mahānti pāpāni visṛjya dugdhaṃ punarna mātuḥ pibate stanodyat // RKV_188.11 //
analyzed: mahānti pāpāni visṛjya dugdham punar na mātuḥ pibate stana udyat

original: śālagrāmaṃ paśyate yo hi nityaṃ snātvā jale nārmade 'ghaughahāre /
analyzed: śālagrāmam paśyate yaḥ hi nityam snātvā jale nārmade ghaughahāre

original: vasanti ye saṃnyasitvā ca tatra nigṛhya duḥkhāni vimuktasaṅghāḥ /
analyzed: vasanti ye saṃnyasitvā ca tatra nigṛhya duḥkhāni vimukta saṅghāḥ

original: dhyāyanto vai sāṃkhyavṛttyā turīyaṃ padaṃ murāreste 'pi tatraiva yānti // RKV_188.13 //
analyzed: dhyāyantaḥ vai sāṃkhya vṛttyā turīyam padam murāreḥ te tatra eva yānti

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śālagrāmatīrthamahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāśītyuttaraśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śālagrāmatīrthamahātmyavarṇanam nāma aṣṭāśīti uttara śatatamaḥ

original: sa eva pañcamaḥ prokto vārāho muktidāyakaḥ // RKV_189.2 //
analyzed: saḥ eva pañcamaḥ proktaḥ vārāhaḥ mukti dāyakaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca
katham udīrṇa rūpaḥ bhūt vārāhaḥ dharaṇīdharaḥ

original: vārāhatvaṃ gataḥ kena pañcamaḥ kena saṃjñitaḥ // RKV_189.3 //
analyzed: vārāha tvam gataḥ kena pañcamaḥ kena saṃjñitaḥ
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
ādi kalpe purā rājan kṣīrode bhagavān hariḥ
śete sa bhogi śayane yoga nidrā vimohitaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā devāḥ samudvignā gatā yatra janārdanaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā devāḥ samudvignāḥ gatāḥ yatra janārdanaḥ
tuṣṭuvuḥ vāgbhiḥ iṣṭābhiḥ keśavam jagatpatim
devāḥ ūcuḥ
namaḥ namaḥ te deveśa sura ārti hara sarvaga
viśvamūrte namaḥ tubhyam trāhi sarvān mahat bhayāt
iti uktaḥ daivataiḥ devaḥ hi uvāca kim upasthitam

original: kāryaṃ vadadhvaṃ me devā yatkṛtyaṃ mā ciraṃ kṛthāḥ // RKV_189.8 //
analyzed: kāryam vadadhvam me devāḥ yat kṛtyam mā ciram kṛthāḥ
devāḥ ūcuḥ
dharā dharitrī bhūtānām bhāra udvignā nimajjati
tām uddhara hṛṣīkeśa lokān saṃsthāpaya sthitau
evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ keśavaḥ parameśvaraḥ

daṃṣṭrā karālam piṅga akṣam samākuñcita mūrdhajam

original: uddhṛtya bhagavān viṣṇur udīrṇaḥ samajāyata // RKV_189.12 //

jayakṣetra abhidhāne tu jaya iti parikīrtitam
asurān mohayat liṅgaḥ tṛtīyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
pāvanāya jagat hetoḥ sthitaḥ yasmāt śaśi prabhaḥ
atas tu nṛpa śārdūla śvetaḥ ityā abhidhīyate

original: tataḥ pañcama udīrṇo varāha iti saṃjñitaḥ // RKV_189.16 //
analyzed: tatas pañcamaḥ udīrṇaḥ varāhaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ

original: namasyāmo naraṃ devaṃ tathā nārāyaṇaṃ harim /
analyzed: namasyāmaḥ naram devam tathā nārāyaṇam harim

original: namo narāya namyāya namo nārāyaṇāya ca // RKV_192.57 //
analyzed: namaḥ narāya namyāya namaḥ nārāyaṇāya ca

original: śaṃ karotu naro 'smākaṃ śaṃ nārāyaṇa dehi naḥ // RKV_192.58 //
analyzed: śam karotu naraḥ smākam śam nārāyaṇa dehi naḥ

na vayam gīta nṛtyena na aṅga ceṣṭā ādi bhāṣitaiḥ

original: lubdhā vai viṣayair manye viṣayā dāruṇātmakāḥ // RKV_192.62 //
analyzed: lubdhāḥ vai viṣayaiḥ manye viṣayāḥ dāruṇa ātmakāḥ

original: tadā nṛtyādayo bhāvāḥ kathaṃ lobhapradāyinaḥ // RKV_192.63 //
analyzed: tadā nṛtya ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ katham lobha pradāyinaḥ

original: te siddhāḥ sma na vai sādhyā bhavatīnāṃ smarasya ca /
analyzed: te siddhāḥ sma na vai sādhyāḥ bhavatīnām smarasya ca

original: mādhavasya ca śākro 'pi svāsthyaṃ yātvaviśaṅkitāḥ // RKV_192.64 //
analyzed: mādhavasya ca svāsthyam yātu a viśaṅkitāḥ
yaḥ sau paraḥ ca paramaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: paramātmā samastasya sthāvarasya carasya ca // RKV_192.65 //
analyzed: paramātmā samastasya sthāvarasya carasya ca
utpatti hetuḥ ete ca yasmin sarvam pralīyate

jagat bodhāya dehinām
tat sarva bhūtam sarva īśam sarvatra samadarśinam

original: vasante mayi cendre ca bhavatīṣu tathā smare /
analyzed: vasante mayi ca indre ca bhavatīṣu tathā smare

original: yadā sa eva bhūtātmā tadā dveṣādayaḥ katham // RKV_192.69 //

manuṣya pakṣi go rūpa gaja siṃha jalecarān

original: yacca kiṃcidadṛśyaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ vā tridaśāṅganāḥ /

original: jāyamānaḥ kathaṃ viṣṇumātmānaṃ paramaṃ ca yat /

original: rāgadveṣau tathā lobhaṃ kaḥ kuryād amarāṅganāḥ // RKV_192.75 //

original: nipātya taṃ pṛthagbhūte kuto rāgādiko guṇaḥ // RKV_192.76 //
analyzed: nipātya tam pṛthak bhūte kutas rāga ādikaḥ guṇaḥ

original: jagadvai hyetad akhilaṃ tadā bhedaḥ kimātmakaḥ // RKV_192.79 //

original: tathāpi nāgnito bhinnās tathaitad brahmaṇo jagat // RKV_192.81 //
analyzed: tathā api na agnitaḥ bhinnāḥ tathā etat brahmaṇaḥ jagat

original: bhavatībhiśca yat kṣobham asmākaṃ sa puraṃdaraḥ /
analyzed: bhavatībhiḥ ca yat kṣobham asmākam sa puraṃdaraḥ

original: bhavantyaḥ sa ca devendro lokāśca sasurāsurāḥ /
analyzed: bhavantyaḥ sa ca devendraḥ lokāḥ ca sa sura asurāḥ

original: darśitā darśayiṣyāmi tathā caivākhilaṃ jagat // RKV_192.84 //

original: yūyaṃ ca mā smayaṃ yāta santi rūpānvitāḥ striyaḥ // RKV_192.85 //

original: urvaśī nāma kalyāṇī bhaviṣyati varāpsarāḥ // RKV_192.88 //

original: etajjñātvā na santāpastvayā kāryo hi māṃ prati /

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe narmadāmāhātmye śrīpatyutpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvinavatyuttaraśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe narmadāmāhātmye śrīpatyutpattivarṇanam nāma dvinavati uttara śatatamaḥ

rku adhyāya

analyzed: proktaḥ sa sarvaḥ vijñātaḥ māhātmyam viditam ca te
yat tu etat bhavatā proktam prasannena antarātmanā

analyzed: paśu ādi vargeṣu na saḥ sti kaścid yaḥ na aṃśa bhūtaḥ tava devadeva

original: samudrarūpaṃ tava dhairyavatsu tejaḥ svarūpeṣu ravistathāgniḥ // RKV_193.20 //
analyzed: samudra rūpam tava dhairyavatsu tejaḥ sva rūpeṣu raviḥ tathā agniḥ

original: rasasvarūpeṇa jalasthito 'si gandhasvarūpaṃ bhavato dharitryām // RKV_193.22 //
analyzed: rasa sva rūpeṇa jala sthitaḥ si gandha sva rūpam bhavataḥ dharitryām
dṛśya sva rūpaḥ ca hutāśanaḥ tvam sparśa sva rūpam bhavataḥ samīre

original: śabdādikaṃ te nabhasi svarūpaṃ mantavyarūpo manasi prabho tvam // RKV_193.23 //
analyzed: śabda ādikam te nabhasi sva rūpam mantavya rūpaḥ manasi prabho tvam

original: bodhasvarūpaśca matau tvamekaḥ sarvatra sarveśvara sarvabhūta /
analyzed: bodha sva rūpaḥ ca matau tvam ekaḥ sarvatra sarva īśvara sarva bhūta

analyzed: paśyāmi te nābhi saroja madhye brahmāṇam īśam ca haram bhṛkuṭyām

original: ghrāṇo 'nilo netragatau ravīndu jihvā ca te nātha sarasvatīyam // RKV_193.25 //
analyzed: ghrāṇaḥ nilaḥ netra gatau ravi indu jihvā ca te nātha sarasvatī iyam

original: pādau dharitrī jaṭharaṃ samastāṃl lokān hṛṣīkeśa vilokayāmaḥ /
analyzed: pādau dharitrī jaṭharam samastān lokān hṛṣīkeśa vilokayāmaḥ

original: puṃstve prajānāṃ patiroṣṭhayugme pratiṣṭhitāste kratavaḥ samastāḥ /
analyzed: puṃstve prajānām patiḥ oṣṭha yugme pratiṣṭhitāḥ te kratavaḥ samastāḥ

original: sarve vayaṃ te daśaneṣu deva daṃṣṭrāsu devā hyabhavaṃśca dantāḥ // RKV_193.27 //
analyzed: sarve vayam te daśaneṣu deva daṃṣṭrāsu devāḥ hi abhavan ca dantāḥ

original: romāṇyaśeṣās tava devasaṅghā vidyādharā nātha tavāṅghrirekhāḥ /
analyzed: romāṇi aśeṣāḥ tava deva saṅghāḥ vidyādharāḥ nātha tava aṅghri rekhāḥ

analyzed: sa aṅgāḥ samastāḥ tava deva vedāḥ samāsthitāḥ sandhiṣu bāhu bhūtāḥ

original: varāhabhūtaṃ dharaṇīdharaste nṛsiṃharūpaṃ ca sadā karālam /
analyzed: varāha bhūtam dharaṇīdharaḥ te nṛsiṃha rūpam ca sadā karālam

original: paśyāma te vājiśirastathoccaistrivikrame yacca tadāprameyam // RKV_193.29 //
analyzed: paśyāma te vājiśiraḥ tathā uccais trivikrame yat ca tadā aprameyam

original: amī samudrāstava deva dehe maurvālayaḥ śailadharās tathāmī /
analyzed: amī samudrāḥ tava deva dehe maurva ālayaḥ śaila dharāḥ tathā amī

original: imāśca gaṅgāpramukhāḥ sravantyo dvīpāṇyaśeṣāṇi vanādideśāḥ // RKV_193.30 //
analyzed: imāḥ ca gaṅgā pramukhāḥ sravantyaḥ dvīpāṇi aśeṣāṇi vana ādi deśāḥ
stuvanti ca ime munayaḥ tava īśa dehe sthitāḥ tvad mahimānam agryam

original: tvāmīśitāraṃ jagatāmanantaṃ yajanti yajñaiḥ kila yajñino 'mī // RKV_193.31 //
analyzed: tvām īśitāram jagatām anantam yajanti yajñaiḥ kila yajñinaḥ

original: tvattohi saumyaṃ jagatīha kiṃcit tvatto na raudraṃ ca samastamūrte /
analyzed: tvattaḥ hi saumyam jagatī iha kiṃcid tvattaḥ na raudram ca samasta mūrte

original: tvatto na śītaṃ ca na keśavoṣṇaṃ sarvasvarūpātiśayī tvameva // RKV_193.32 //
analyzed: tvattaḥ na śītam ca na keśava uṣṇam sarva sva rūpa atiśayī tvam eva
prasīda sarveśvara sarvabhūta sanātana ātma parameśvara īśa

original: kiṃ vāparāddhaṃ tava devadeva yanmāyayā no hṛdayaṃ tavāpi /
analyzed: kim vā aparāddham tava devadeva yad māyayā naḥ hṛdayam tava api

original: māyābhiśaṅkipraṇatārtihantar mano hi no vihvalatāmupaiti // RKV_193.34 //
analyzed: māyā abhiśaṅki praṇata ārti hantar manaḥ hi naḥ vihvala tām upaiti

original: na te 'parāddhaṃ yadi te 'parāddham asmābhir unmārgavivartinībhiḥ /

original: patanti narake ghore raurave pāpamohitāḥ // RKV_209.9 //
analyzed: patanti narake ghore raurave pāpa mohitāḥ

original: ye kṣāntadāntāḥ śrutipūrṇakarṇā jitendriyāḥ prāṇivadhān nivṛttāḥ /
analyzed: ye kṣānta dāntāḥ śruti pūrṇa karṇāḥ jita indriyāḥ prāṇi vadhāt nivṛttāḥ
pratigrahe saṃkucita agra hastāḥ te brāhmaṇāḥ tārayitum samarthāḥ
evam guṇa gaṇa ākīrṇaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ narmadā taṭe
vasate brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdham śila uñcha vṛtti jīvanaḥ
tādṛśam brāhmaṇam jñātvā devadevaḥ maheśvaraḥ
dvija rūpa dharaḥ bhūtvā tasya āśramam agāt svayam
dṛṣṭvā tam brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdham uccarantam pada kramam

original: abhivādayate vipraṃ svāgatena ca pūjitaḥ // RKV_209.13 //
analyzed: abhivādayate vipram svāgatena ca pūjitaḥ
provāca tam muhūrtena brāhmaṇaḥ vismaya anvitaḥ

original: kimatha tadbaṭo brūhi kiṃ karomi tavepsitam // RKV_209.14 //
analyzed: kim atha tat baṭo brūhi kim karomi tava īpsitam
baṭuḥ uvāca
vidyā arthinam anuprāptam viddhi mām dvijasattama

original: dadāsi yadi me vidyāṃ tataḥ sthāsyāmi te gṛhe // RKV_209.15 //
analyzed: dadāsi yadi me vidyām tatas sthāsyāmi te gṛhe
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: sarveṣāmeva viprāṇāṃ baṭo tvaṃ gotra uttame /
analyzed: sarveṣām eva viprāṇām baṭo tvam gotre uttame

original: dānānāṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ kathaṃ vidyā ca dīyate // RKV_209.16 //
analyzed: dānānām paramam dānam katham vidyā ca dīyate
guru śuśrūṣayā vidyā puṣkalena dhanena vā

original: athavā vidyayā vidyā bhavatīha phalapradā // RKV_209.17 //
analyzed: athavā vidyayā vidyā bhavati iha phala pradā
baṭuḥ uvāca
yathā anye bālakāḥ snātāḥ śuśrūṣanti hi aharniśam

original: tathāhaṃ baṭubhiḥ sārdhaṃ śuśrūṣāmi na saṃśayaḥ // RKV_209.18 //
analyzed: tathā aham baṭubhiḥ sārdham śuśrūṣāmi na saṃśayaḥ

original: tatheti coktvā viprendraḥ pāṭhayaṃstaṃ dine dine /
analyzed: tathā iti ca uktvā vipra indraḥ pāṭhayan tam dine dine

original: vartate saha śiṣyaiḥ sa śiloñchānupahārayan // RKV_209.19 //
analyzed: vartate saha śiṣyaiḥ sa śila uñchān upahārayan
tatas katipaya ahobhiḥ proktaḥ baṭubhiḥ īśvaraḥ

original: pacanādyaṃ baṭo karma kuru kramata āgatam // RKV_209.20 //
analyzed: pacana ādyam baṭo karma kuru kramatas āgatam
tathā iti ca uktaḥ deveśaḥ bhāragrāmam upāgataḥ

original: dhyātvā vanaspatīḥ sarvā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // RKV_209.21 //
analyzed: dhyātvā vanaspatīḥ sarvāḥ idam vacanam abravīt
yāvat āgacchate vipraḥ baṭubhiḥ saha mandiram
adarśanābhiḥ kartavyam tāvat annam su saṃskṛtam

original: evamuktvā tu tāḥ sarvā viśvarūpo maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: evam uktvā tu tāḥ sarvāḥ viśvarūpaḥ maheśvaraḥ
krīḍana artham gataḥ tatra baṭu veṣa dharaḥ pṛthak
dṛṣṭvā samāgatam tatra baṭu veṣa dharam pṛthak

original: dhik tvāṃ ca paruṣaṃ vākyam ūcus te girisannidhau // RKV_209.24 //
analyzed: dhik tvām ca paruṣam vākyam ūcuḥ te giri sannidhau

original: kṣutkṣāmakaṃṭhāḥ sarve ca gatvā tu kila mandiram /
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāma kaṃṭhāḥ sarve ca gatvā tu kila mandiram

original: tvayā siddhena cānnena tṛptiṃ yāsyāmahe vayam // RKV_209.25 //
analyzed: tvayā siddhena ca annena tṛptim yāsyāmahe vayam

original: tadvṛthā cintitaṃ sava tvayāgatya kṛtaṃ dvija /
analyzed: tat vṛthā cintitam sava tvayā āgatya kṛtam dvija
mithyāpratijñena satā duranuṣṭhitam adya te
baṭuḥ uvāca
santāpam anutāpam vā bhojana artham dvijarṣabhāḥ

original: mā kurudhvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ siddhe 'gre gṛhameṣyathā // RKV_209.27 //
analyzed: mā kurudhvam yathānyāyam siddhe gre gṛham eṣyathāḥ
baṭuḥ uvāca

original: dinaśeṣeṇa cāsmākaṃ pañcatāṃ ca dine dine /
analyzed: dina śeṣeṇa ca asmākam pañcatām ca dine dine

original: niṣpattiṃ yāti vā neti tad asiddham aśeṣataḥ // RKV_209.28 //
analyzed: niṣpattim yāti vā nā iti tat asiddham aśeṣatas
asiddham siddham asmākam yat tvayā samudāhṛtam

original: dṛṣṭvānṛtaṃ gatās tatra tvāṃ baddhāmbhasi nikṣipe // RKV_209.29 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā anṛtam gatāḥ tatra tvām baddha ambhasi nikṣipe
baṭuḥ uvāca
bho bhoḥ śṛṇudhva sarve sa upādhyāyāḥ dvijottamāḥ

original: pratijñāṃ mama durdharṣāṃ yāṃ śrutvā vismayo bhavet // RKV_209.30 //
analyzed: pratijñām mama durdharṣām yām śrutvā vismayaḥ bhavet

original: yadi siddhamidaṃ sarvamannaṃ syād āśrame guroḥ /
analyzed: yadi siddham idam sarvam annam syāt āśrame guroḥ

original: yūyaṃ baddhvā mayā sarve kṣeptavyā narmadāmbhasi // RKV_209.31 //
analyzed: yūyam baddhvā mayā sarve kṣeptavyāḥ narmadā ambhasi
athavā annam na siddham syāt bhavadbhiḥ dṛḍha bandhanaiḥ

original: gurostu paśyato baddhvā kṣeptavyo 'haṃ narmadāhrade // RKV_209.32 //
analyzed: guroḥ tu paśyataḥ baddhvā kṣeptavyaḥ ham narmadā hrade

original: tatheti kṛtvā te sarve samayaṃ gurusannidhau /
analyzed: tathā iti kṛtvā te sarve samayam guru sannidhau

original: snātvā jāpyavidhānena bhūtagrāmaṃ tato yayuḥ // RKV_209.33 //
analyzed: snātvā jāpya vidhānena bhūta grāmam tatas yayuḥ
dṛṣṭvā te vismayam jagmuḥ vistṛte bhakṣya bhojane

original: ṣaḍrasena nṛpaśreṣṭha bhuktvā hutvā pṛthakpṛthak // RKV_209.34 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ rasena nṛpa śreṣṭha bhuktvā hutvā pṛthak pṛthak
tatas provāca vacanam hṛṣṭa puṣṭaḥ dvijottamaḥ

original: varado 'smi varaṃ vatsa vṛṇu yattava rocate // RKV_209.35 //
analyzed: vara daḥ smi varam vatsa vṛṇu yat tava rocate

original: sāṅgopāṅgās tu te vedāḥ śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca /
analyzed: sa aṅga upāṅgāḥ tu te vedāḥ śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca

original: pratibhāsyanti te vipra madīyo 'stu varastvayam // RKV_209.36 //
analyzed: pratibhāsyanti te vipra madīyaḥ stu varaḥ tu ayam

original: praṇamya baṭubhiḥ sārdhaṃ sa cikrīḍa yathāsukham /
analyzed: praṇamya baṭubhiḥ sārdham sa cikrīḍa yathāsukham

original: dvitīye tu tataḥ prāpte divase narmadājale // RKV_209.37 //
analyzed: dvitīye tu tatas prāpte divase narmadā jale
krīḍana artham gatāḥ sarve sa upādhyāyāḥ yudhiṣṭhira

original: tataḥ smṛtvā paṇaṃ sarve bhāṣayitvā vidhānataḥ // RKV_209.38 //
analyzed: tatas smṛtvā paṇam sarve bhāṣayitvā vidhānataḥ
upādhyāyam athā uvāca natvā devaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: jale prakṣepayāmyadya niṣpratijñān baṭūn prabho // RKV_209.39 //
analyzed: jale prakṣepayāmi adya niṣpratijñān baṭūn prabho

original: taddevasya vacaḥ śrutvā naṣṭāste baṭavo nṛpa /
analyzed: tat devasya vacaḥ śrutvā naṣṭāḥ te baṭavaḥ nṛpa

original: gurostu paśyato rājandhāvamānā diśo daśa // RKV_209.40 //
analyzed: guroḥ tu paśyataḥ rājan dhāvamānāḥ diśaḥ daśa
vāyu vegena devena luñjitāḥ te samantataḥ

original: bhāraṃ baddhvā tu sarveṣāṃ baṭūnāṃ ca nareśvara // RKV_209.41 //
analyzed: bhāram baddhvā tu sarveṣām baṭūnām ca nareśvara
śāpa anugrahakaḥ kṣipat toye yathā gṛhe
tatas viṣādam agamat dṛṣṭvā tān narmadā jale
guruṇā baṭuḥ uktaḥ kim etat sāhasam kṛtam
eteṣām mātṛ pitaraḥ bālakānām gṛhe ṅganāḥ

original: yadi pṛcchanti te bālān kva gatān kathayāmyaham /
analyzed: yadi pṛcchanti te bālān kva gatān kathayāmi aham

original: evaṃ sthite mahābhāga yadi kaścinmariṣyati // RKV_209.44 //
analyzed: evam sthite mahābhāga yadi kaścid mariṣyati
tadā svakīya jīvena tvam yojayitum arhasi

original: mṛteṣu teṣu vipreṣu na jīve niścayo mṛtaḥ // RKV_209.45 //
analyzed: mṛteṣu teṣu vipreṣu na jīve niścayaḥ mṛtaḥ

original: brahmahatyāśca te bahvyo bhaviṣyanti mṛte mayi /
analyzed: brahmahatyāḥ ca te bahvyaḥ bhaviṣyanti mṛte mayi
dvija bandhana mātreṇa narakaḥ bhavati dhruvam

original: maraṇādyāṃ gatiṃ yāsi na tāṃ vedmi dvijādhama /
analyzed: maraṇa ādyām gatim yāsi na tām vedmi dvija adhama

original: evamuktaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā devadevo maheśvaraḥ // RKV_209.47 //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ smitam kṛtvā devadevaḥ maheśvaraḥ
bhārabhūteśvare tīrthe ujjahāra jalāt dvijān

original: muktvā bhāraṃ tu devena chādayitvā tu tāndvijān // RKV_209.48 //
analyzed: muktvā bhāram tu devena chādayitvā tu tān dvijān
liṅgam pratiṣṭhitam tatra bhāra bhūtā iti viśrutam

original: mṛtāṃs tān vai dvijān dṛṣṭvā brahmahatyā nirākṛtā // RKV_209.49 //
analyzed: mṛtān tān vai dvijān dṛṣṭvā brahmahatyā nirākṛtā

original: gatāni pañca vai dṛṣṭvā brahmahatyāśatāni vai /
analyzed: gatāni pañca vai dṛṣṭvā brahmahatyā śatāni vai

original: tataḥ sa vismayāviṣṭo dṛṣṭvā tānbālakān guruḥ // RKV_209.50 //
analyzed: tatas sa vismaya āviṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭvā tān bālakān guruḥ

original: jñātvā taṃ devadeveśaṃ praṇāmam akarod dvijaḥ // RKV_209.51 //
analyzed: jñātvā tam devadeveśam praṇāmam akarot dvijaḥ
ajñānena mayā sava yat uktam parameśvara

original: apriyaṃ yatkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣantavyaṃ tanmama prabho // RKV_209.52 //
analyzed: apriyam yat kṛtam sarvam kṣantavyam tat mama prabho
devaḥ uvāca
bhagavan guruḥ bhavān devaḥ bhavān mama pitāmahaḥ
vedagarbha namaḥ teḥ tu na asti kaścid vyatikramaḥ

original: janitā copanetā ca yastu vidyāṃ prayacchati /
analyzed: janitā ca upanetā ca yaḥ tu vidyām prayacchati

original: annadātā bhayatrātā pañcaite pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ // RKV_209.54 //
analyzed: anna dātā bhaya trātā pañca ete pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
evam uktvā jagannāthaḥ viṣṇuśarmāṇam ānataḥ

original: tatra tīrthe jagāmāśu kailāsaṃ dharaṇīdharam // RKV_209.55 //
analyzed: tatra tīrthe jagāma āśu kailāsam dharaṇīdharam
tadā prabhṛti tat tīrtham bhārabhūtī iti viśrutam
vikhyātam sarva lokeṣu mahāpātaka nāśanam
tatra tīrthe punar vṛttam itihāsam bravīmi te
sarva pāpa haram divyam ekāgraḥ tvam śṛṇuṣva tat
purā kṛta yugasya ādau vaiśyaḥ kaścid mahāmanāḥ
sukeśaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ tasya putraḥ ti dhārmikaḥ
somaśarmā iti vikhyātaḥ mṛtaḥ pṛthula locanaḥ

original: sa sakhāyaṃ vaṇikputraṃ kaṃcic cakre daridriṇam // RKV_209.59 //
analyzed: sa sakhāyam vaṇij putram kaṃcid cakre daridriṇam
sudevam iti khyātam sarva karmasu kovidam

original: ekadā tu samaṃ tena vyavahāramacintayat // RKV_209.60 //
analyzed: ekadā tu samam tena vyavahāram acintayat
