original: bhāṇḍaṃ bahu samādāya madīye dravyasādhane // RKV_209.61 //
analyzed: bhāṇḍam bahu samādāya madīye dravya sādhane
param tīram gamiṣyāvaḥ utkarṣaḥ tu āvayoḥ samaḥ

original: iti tau mantrayitvā tu mantravat samabhīpsitam // RKV_209.62 //
analyzed: iti tau mantrayitvā tu mantravat samabhīpsitam
sarvam prayāṇakam gṛhya hi ārūḍhau lavaṇa udadhim

original: tau gatvā tu paraṃ bhāṇḍaṃ vikrīya puratastadā // RKV_209.63 //
analyzed: tau gatvā tu param bhāṇḍam vikrīya puratas tadā

original: prāptau bahu suvarṇaṃ ca ratnāni vividhāni ca /
analyzed: prāptau bahu suvarṇam ca ratnāni vividhāni ca

original: nāvaṃ tāṃ saṃgatāṃ kṛtvā paścāt tāvārurohatuḥ // RKV_209.64 //
analyzed: nāvam tām saṃgatām kṛtvā paścāt tau ārurohatuḥ
nāvam antar jale dṛṣṭvā niśīthe svarṇa saṃbhṛtām
dṛṣṭvā tu somaśarmāṇam utsaṅge kṛta mastakam
śayānam ati viśvastam sahadevaḥ vyacintayat

original: eṣa nidrāvaśaṃ yāto mayi prāṇānnidhāya vai // RKV_209.66 //
analyzed: eṣa nidrā vaśam yātaḥ mayi prāṇān nidhāya vai
asya adhīnam idam sarvam dravya ratnam aśeṣatas

original: utkarṣārddhaṃ tu me dadyāttatra gatveti vā na vā // RKV_209.67 //
analyzed: utkarṣa arddham tu me dadyāt tatra gatvā iti vā na vā
iti niścitya manasā pāpaḥ tam lavaṇa udadhau
cikṣepa somaśarmāṇam pāpa dhyātena cetasā

original: uttīrya taraṇāt tasmād gatvā saṃgṛhya taddhanam /
analyzed: uttīrya taraṇāt tasmāt gatvā saṃgṛhya tat dhanam
tatas katipaya ahobhiḥ saṃyuktaḥ kāladharmaṇā
gataḥ yama puram ghoram gṛhītaḥ yama kiṃkaraiḥ

original: sa nītastena mārgeṇa yatra saṃtapate raviḥ // RKV_209.70 //
analyzed: sa nītaḥ tena mārgeṇa yatra saṃtapate raviḥ
kṛtvā dvādaśadhā ātmānam samprāpte pralaye yathā

original: sutīkṣṇāḥ kaṇṭakā yatra yatra śvānaḥ sudāruṇāḥ // RKV_209.71 //
analyzed: su tīkṣṇāḥ kaṇṭakāḥ yatra yatra śvānaḥ su dāruṇāḥ
tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭrāḥ mahā vyālāḥ vyāghrāḥ yatra mahā vṛkāḥ

original: sutaptā vālukā yatra kṣudhā tṛṣṇā tamo mahat // RKV_209.72 //
analyzed: su taptā vālukā yatra kṣudhā tṛṣṇā tamaḥ mahat

original: pānīyasya kathā nāsti na chāyā nāśramaḥ kvacit /
analyzed: pānīyasya kathā nā asti na chāyā na āśramaḥ kvacid
annam pānīya sahitam yāvat tat dīyate viṣam
chāyām saṃprārthamānānām bhṛśam jvalati pāvakaḥ

original: tair dahyamānā bahuśo vilapanti muhurmuhuḥ // RKV_209.74 //
analyzed: taiḥ dahyamānāḥ bahuśas vilapanti muhur muhur

original: hā bhrātarmātaḥ putreti patanti pathi mūrchitāḥ /
analyzed: hā bhrātar mātar putra iti patanti pathi mūrchitāḥ

original: itthaṃbhūtena mārgeṇa sa gīto yamakiṃkaraiḥ // RKV_209.75 //
analyzed: itthaṃbhūtena mārgeṇa sa gītaḥ yama kiṃkaraiḥ
yatra tiṣṭhati deveśaḥ prajā saṃyamanaḥ yamaḥ
te dvāra deśe tam muktvā ācakṣuḥ yama kiṃkarāḥ
baddhvā tam gala pāśena hi āsīnam mitra ghātinam
avadhāraya deveśa budhyasva yat anantaram
yamaḥ uvāca

original: na tu pūrvaṃ mukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mayā viśvāsaghātinām /
analyzed: na tu pūrvam mukham dṛṣṭam mayā viśvāsa ghātinām

original: ye mitradrohiṇaḥ pāpās teṣāṃ kiṃ śāsanaṃ bhavet // RKV_209.78 //
analyzed: ye mitra drohiṇaḥ pāpāḥ teṣām kim śāsanam bhavet
ṛṣayaḥ tra vicāra artham niyuktāḥ nipuṇāḥ sthitāḥ

original: te yatra bruvate tatra kṣipadhvaṃ mā vicāryatām // RKV_209.79 //
analyzed: te yatra bruvate tatra kṣipadhvam mā vicāryatām
iti uktāḥ te tam ādāya kiṃkarāḥ śīghra gāminaḥ

original: munīśāṃs tatra tānūcus taṃ nivedya yamājñayā // RKV_209.80 //
analyzed: muni īśān tatra tān ūcuḥ tam nivedya yama ājñayā

original: dvijā anena mitraṃ svaṃ prasuptaṃ niśi ghātitam /
analyzed: dvijāḥ anena mitram svam prasuptam niśi ghātitam

original: viśvastaṃ dhanalobhena ko daṇḍo 'sya bhaviṣyati // RKV_209.81 //
analyzed: viśvastam dhana lobhena kaḥ bhaviṣyati
munayaḥ ūcuḥ
a dṛṣṭa pūrvam asmābhiḥ vadanam mitra ghātinām

original: kṛtvā paṭāntare hyenaṃ śṛṇvantu gatimasya tām // RKV_209.82 //
analyzed: kṛtvā paṭa antare hi enam śṛṇvantu gatim asya tām
te śāstrāṇi vicārya atha ṛṣayaḥ ca parasparam
āhūya yama dūtān tān ūcuḥ brāhmaṇa puṃgavāḥ
ālokitāni śāstrāṇi vedāḥ sa aṅgāḥ smṛtīḥ api

original: purāṇāni ca mīmāṃsā dṛṣṭamasmābhiratra ca // RKV_209.84 //
analyzed: purāṇāni ca mīmāṃsā dṛṣṭam asmābhiḥ atra ca

original: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca steye gurvaṅganāgame /
analyzed: brahma ghne ca surāpe ca steye guru aṅganā āgame

original: niṣkṛtirvihitā śāstre kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // RKV_209.85 //
analyzed: niṣkṛtiḥ vihitā śāstre kṛtaghne na asti niṣkṛtiḥ
ye strī ghnāḥ ca guru ghnāḥ ca ye bāla brahma ghātinaḥ

original: vihitā niṣkṛtiḥ śāstre kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // RKV_209.86 //
analyzed: vihitā niṣkṛtiḥ śāstre kṛtaghne na asti niṣkṛtiḥ
vāpī kūpa taḍāgānām bhettāraḥ ye ca pāpinaḥ

original: udyānavāṭikānāṃ ca chettāro ye ca durjanāḥ // RKV_209.87 //
analyzed: udyāna vāṭikānām ca chettāraḥ ye ca durjanāḥ
dāva agni dāhakāḥ ye ca satatam ye suhiṃsakāḥ

original: nyāsāpahāriṇo ye ca garadāḥ svāmivañcakāḥ // RKV_209.88 //
analyzed: nyāsa apahāriṇaḥ ye ca garadāḥ svāmi vañcakāḥ
mātā pitṛ gurūṇām ca tyāginaḥ doṣa dāyinaḥ
sva bhartṛ vañcana parā yā strī garbha praghātinī

original: vivekarahitā yā strī yāsnātā bhojane ratā /
analyzed: viveka rahitā yā strī yā a snātā bhojane ratā
dvi kāla bhojana ratāḥ tathā vaiṣṇavavāsare

original: tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ gatirdṛṣṭā na tu viśvāsaghātinām /
analyzed: tāsām strīṇām gatiḥ dṛṣṭā na tu viśvāsa ghātinām
viśvāsa ghātinām puṃsām mitra droha kṛtām tathā

original: teṣāṃ gatirna vedeṣu purāṇeṣu ca kā kathā /
analyzed: teṣām gatiḥ na vedeṣu purāṇeṣu ca kā kathā

original: iti sthiteṣu pāpeṣu gatireṣāṃ na vidyate // RKV_209.92 //
analyzed: iti sthiteṣu pāpeṣu gatiḥ eṣām na vidyate

original: nānyā gatirmitrahanane viśvastaghne ca naḥ śrutam /
analyzed: nā anyā gatiḥ mitra hanane viśvasta ghne ca naḥ śrutam

original: ito nītvā yamadūtā enaṃ viśvastaghātinam // RKV_209.93 //
analyzed: itas nītvā yamadūtāḥ enam viśvasta ghātinam
kalpa koṭi śatam sāgram paryāyeṇa pṛthak pṛthak

original: narakeṣu ca sarveṣu triṃśatkoṭiṣu saṃkhyayā // RKV_209.94 //
analyzed: narakeṣu ca sarveṣu triṃśat koṭiṣu saṃkhyayā

original: kṣipyatām eṣa mitraghno vicāro mā vidhīyatām /
analyzed: kṣipyatām eṣa mitra ghnaḥ vicāraḥ mā vidhīyatām

original: iti te vacanaṃ śrutvā kiṃkarās taṃ nigṛhya ca // RKV_209.95 //
analyzed: iti te vacanam śrutvā kiṃkarāḥ tam nigṛhya ca

original: yatra te narakā ghorāstatra kṣeptuṃ gatāstataḥ /
analyzed: yatra te narakāḥ ghorāḥ tatra kṣeptum gatāḥ tatas

original: te tamādāya hi narake ghore rauravasaṃjñite // RKV_209.96 //
analyzed: te tam ādāya hi narake ghore raurava saṃjñite
cikṣipuḥ tatra pāpiṣṭham kṣipte rāvaḥ bhavat mahān
naraka sthita bhūteṣu moktavyaḥ na eṣa pāpa kṛt

original: asya saṃsparśanād eva pīḍā śataguṇā bhavet /
analyzed: asya saṃsparśanāt eva pīḍā śataguṇā bhavet
yathā vyathā asi kāṣṭhaiḥ ca samiddhaiḥ dahana ātmakaiḥ
bhavati sparśanāt tasya kim etena kṛta amalam

original: yathā durjanasaṃsargāt sujano yāti lāghavam // RKV_209.99 //
analyzed: yathā durjana saṃsargāt su janaḥ yāti lāghavam
sannidhānāt tathā asya āśu kṣate kṣāra avasecanam
prasādaḥ kriyatām āśu nīyatām narake nyatas

original: evamuktās tatas tais tu gatāste tvaśuciṃ prati /
analyzed: evam uktāḥ tatas taiḥ tu gatāḥ te tu aśucim prati

original: tatra te nārakāḥ santi pūrvavatte 'pi cukruśuḥ // RKV_209.101 //
analyzed: tatra te nārakāḥ santi pūrvavat te cukruśuḥ
evam te kiṃkarāḥ sarve paryaṭan naraka maṇḍale

original: narake 'pi sthitis tasya nāsti pāpasya durmateḥ // RKV_209.102 //
analyzed: narake sthitiḥ tasya na asti pāpasya durmateḥ

original: yadā tadā tu te sarve taṃ gṛhya yamasannidhau /
analyzed: yadā tadā tu te sarve tam gṛhya yama sannidhau
gatvā nivedya tat sarvam yat uktam nārakaiḥ naraiḥ

original: narake na sthitiryasya tasya kiṃ kriyatāṃ vada // RKV_209.103 //
analyzed: narake na sthitiḥ yasya tasya kim kriyatām vada
yamaḥ uvāca

original: pāpiṣṭha eṣa vai yātu yoniṃ tiryaṅniṣevitām /
analyzed: pāpiṣṭhaḥ eṣa vai yātu yonim tiryak niṣevitām
kālam munibhiḥ uddiṣṭaḥ tiryagyonim praveśyatām
evam ukte tu vacane prajā saṃyamanena ca

original: sa gataḥ kṛmitāṃ pāpo viṣṭhāsu ca pṛthakpṛthak // RKV_209.105 //
analyzed: sa gataḥ kṛmi tām pāpaḥ viṣṭhāsu ca pṛthak pṛthak
daṃśa maśakān pipīlika samudbhavān
yūkā matkuṇaka āḍhyān ca gatvā pakṣi tvam āgataḥ

original: sthāvaratvaṃ gataḥ paścāt pāṣāṇatvaṃ tataḥ param /
analyzed: sthāvara tvam gataḥ paścāt pāṣāṇa tvam tatas param
sarīsṛpa an ajagara varāha mṛga hastinaḥ
vṛka śvāna khara uṣṭrān ca sūkarīm grāma jātikām

original: yonim āśvatarīṃ prāpya tathā mahiṣasambhavām // RKV_209.108 //
analyzed: yonim āśvatarīm prāpya tathā mahiṣa sambhavām

original: etāścānyāśca bahvīrvai prāpa yonīḥ krameṇa vai /
analyzed: etāḥ ca anyāḥ ca bahvīḥ vai prāpa yonīḥ krameṇa vai
sa tāḥ yonīḥ anuprāpya dhuryaḥ bhūt bhāra vāhakaḥ
sa gṛhe pārthiva īśasya dhārmikasya yaśasvinaḥ

original: sa dṛṣṭvā kārttikīṃ prāptāmekadā nṛpasattamaḥ // RKV_209.110 //
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā kārttikīm prāptām ekadā nṛpa sattamaḥ
purohitam samāhūya brāhmaṇān ca tathā bahūn

original: na gṛhe kārttikīṃ kuryād etan me bahuśaḥ śrutam // RKV_209.111 //
analyzed: na gṛhe kārttikīm kuryāt etat me bahuśas śrutam

original: sametāḥ kutra yāsyāma iti brūta dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: sametāḥ kutra yāsyāmaḥ iti brūta dvijottamāḥ

original: yo gṛhe kārttikīṃ kuryāt snānadānādivarjitaḥ // RKV_209.112 //
analyzed: yaḥ gṛhe kārttikīm kuryāt snāna dāna ādi varjitaḥ
saṃvatsara kṛtāt puṇyāt sa bahis bhavati śrutiḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena tīrtham sarva guṇa anvitam

original: sahitāstatra gacchāmaḥ snātuṃ dātuṃ ca śaktitaḥ /
analyzed: sahitāḥ tatra gacchāmaḥ snātum dātum ca śaktitaḥ

original: evamukte tu vacane pārthivena dvijottamāḥ // RKV_209.114 //
analyzed: evam ukte tu vacane pārthivena dvijottamāḥ

original: ūcuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ nṛpatheṣṭha revāyā uttare taṭe /
analyzed: ūcuḥ śreṣṭham nṛpatheṣṭha revāyāḥ uttare taṭe
bhāreśvara iti vikhyātam mukti tīrtham nṛpa uttama
tatra yāmaḥ vayam sarve sarva pāpa kṣaya āvaham

original: evamuktaḥ sa nṛpatirgṛhītvā pracuraṃ vasu // RKV_209.116 //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa nṛpatiḥ gṛhītvā pracuram vasu

original: śakaṭaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ kṛtvā tatra yuktaḥ sa dhūrvahaḥ /
analyzed: śakaṭam saṃbhṛtam kṛtvā tatra yuktaḥ sa dhūrvahaḥ

original: yaḥ kṛtvā mitrahananaṃ goyoniṃ samupāgataḥ // RKV_209.117 //
analyzed: yaḥ kṛtvā mitra hananam go yonim samupāgataḥ
ittham sa narmadā tīre samprāptaḥ tīrtham uttamam
gatvā caturdaśī dine hi upavāsa kṛtakṣaṇaḥ
gatvā sa narmadā tīre nāma rudra iti anusmaran
śuci pradeśāt ca mṛdam mantreṇa anena gṛhyatām
uddhṛtā asi varāheṇa rudreṇa śata bāhunā
aham api uddhariṣyāmi prajayā bandhanena ca

original: sa evaṃ tāṃ mṛdaṃ nītvā muktvā tīre tathottare /
analyzed: saḥ evam tām mṛdam nītvā muktvā tīre tathā uttare
dadarśa bhāskaram paścāt mantreṇa anena ca ālabhet
aśva krānte ratha krānte viṣṇu krānte vasuṃdhare

original: mṛttike hara me pāpaṃ janmakoṭiśatārjitam // RKV_209.122 //
analyzed: mṛttike hara me pāpam janma koṭi śata arjitam
tatas evam vigāhya apaḥ mantram etam udīrayet

original: tvaṃ narmade puṇyajale tavāmbhaḥ śaṅkarodbhavam // RKV_209.123 //
analyzed: tvam narmade puṇya jale tava ambhaḥ śaṅkara udbhavam

original: snānaṃ prakurvato me 'dya pāpaṃ haratu cārjitam /
analyzed: snānam prakurvataḥ me pāpam haratu ca arjitam

original: sa snātvānena vidhinā saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ // RKV_209.124 //
analyzed: sa snātvā anena vidhinā saṃtarpya pitṛ devatāḥ
yayau devālayam paścāt upahāraiḥ samanvitaḥ

original: bhaktyā saṃcintya sānnidhye śaṅkaraṃ lokaśaṅkaram // RKV_209.125 //
analyzed: bhaktyā saṃcintya sānnidhye śaṅkaram loka śaṅkaram
purāṇa ukta vidhānena pūjām samupacakrame
pūjā catuṣṭayam devi śivarātryām nigadyate
saṃsnāpya prathame yāme pañcagavyena śaṅkaram

original: ghṛtena pūraṇaṃ paścātkṛtaṃ nṛpavareṇa tu // RKV_209.127 //
analyzed: ghṛtena pūraṇam paścātkṛtam nṛpa vareṇa tu
dhūpa dīpa naivedya ādyam saṃkalpya ca yathāvidhi
argheṇa anena deveśam mantreṇa anena śaṅkaram
namaḥ te devadeveśa śambho parama kāraṇa
gṛhāṇa argham imam deva saṃsāra agham apākuru
vitta anurūpataḥ dattam suvarṇam mantra kalpitam

original: agnirhi devāḥ sarve suvarṇaṃ ca hutāśanāt // RKV_209.130 //
analyzed: agniḥ hi devāḥ sarve suvarṇam ca hutāśanāt
atas suvarṇa dānena prītāḥ syuḥ sarva devatāḥ

original: tadarghaṃ sarvadā dātuḥ prīto bhavatu śaṅkaraḥ // RKV_209.131 //
analyzed: tad argham sarvadā dātuḥ prītaḥ bhavatu śaṅkaraḥ

original: anena vidhinā tena pūjitaḥ prathame śivaḥ /
analyzed: anena vidhinā tena pūjitaḥ prathame śivaḥ

original: yāme dvitīye tu punaḥ pūrvoktavidhinā caret // RKV_209.132 //
analyzed: yāme dvitīye tu punar pūrva ukta vidhinā caret
snāpayāmāsa dugdhena gavyena tripurāntakam

original: taṃdulaiḥ pūraṇaṃ paścātkṛtaṃ liṅgasya śūlinaḥ // RKV_209.133 //
analyzed: taṃdulaiḥ pūraṇam paścātkṛtam liṅgasya śūlinaḥ

original: kṛtvā vidhānaṃ pūrvoktaṃ dattaṃ vastrayugaṃ sitam /
analyzed: kṛtvā vidhānam pūrva uktam dattam vastra yugam sitam
śveta vastra yugam yasmāt śaṅkarasya ati vallabham
prītaḥ bhavati vai śambhuḥ dattena śveta vāsasā

original: yāmaṃ tṛtīyaṃ samprāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatisattamaḥ // RKV_209.135 //
analyzed: yāmam tṛtīyam samprāptam dṛṣṭvā nṛpati sattamaḥ

original: devaṃ saṃsnāpya madhunā pūraṇaṃ cakrivāṃs tilaiḥ /
analyzed: devam saṃsnāpya madhunā pūraṇam cakrivān tilaiḥ
tila droṇa pradānam ca kuryāt mantram udīrayan
tilāḥ śvetāḥ tilāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ sarva pāpa harāḥ tilāḥ
tila droṇa pradānena nu saṃsāraḥ chidyatām mama
anena vidhinā rājā yāminī yāma pūjanam
ativāhya vinodena brahmaghoṣeṇa jāgaram
cakāra pūjanam śambhoḥ bahu puṇya prasādhakam

original: ye jāgare trinetrasya śivarātryāṃ śivasthitāḥ // RKV_209.139 //
analyzed: ye jāgare trinetrasya śiva rātryām śiva sthitāḥ

original: te yāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ pārtha na tāṃ gacchanti yajvinaḥ /
analyzed: te yām gatim gatāḥ pārtha na tām gacchanti yajvinaḥ

original: pāpāni yāni kāni syuḥ koṭijanmārjitānyapi // RKV_209.140 //
analyzed: pāpāni yāni kāni syuḥ koṭi janma arjitāni api
hara keśavayoḥ snānti jāgare yānti saṃkṣayam

original: yāvanto nimiṣā nṛṇāṃ bhavanti niśi jāgratām // RKV_209.141 //
analyzed: yāvantaḥ nimiṣāḥ nṛṇām bhavanti niśi jāgratām
nimiṣe nimiṣe rājan aśvamedha phalam dhruvam
upavāsa parāṇām ca devāyatana vāsinām
śṛṇvatām dharmam ākhyānam dhyāyatām hara keśavau

original: na tāṃ bahusuvarṇena kratunā gatimāpnuyuḥ // RKV_209.143 //
analyzed: na tām bahu suvarṇena kratunā gatim āpnuyuḥ
śivarātriḥ tithiḥ puṇyā kārttikī ca viśeṣataḥ

original: revāyā uttaraṃ kūlaṃ tīraṃ bhāreśvareti ca // RKV_209.144 //
analyzed: revāyāḥ uttaram kūlam tīram bhāreśvara iti ca

original: jāgṛtaś cātiduḥkhena kathaṃ pāpaṃ na hāsyati /
analyzed: jāgṛtaḥ ca ati duḥkhena katham pāpam na hāsyati

original: itthaṃsa jāgaraṃ kṛtvā śivarātryāṃ nareśvaraḥ // RKV_209.145 //
analyzed: ittham sa jāgaram kṛtvā śiva rātryām nareśvaraḥ
prabhāte vimale gatvā narmadā tīram uttamam

original: snāpitās tena te sarve vāhanāni gajādayaḥ // RKV_209.146 //
analyzed: snāpitāḥ tena te sarve vāhanāni gaja ādayaḥ

original: yaistu vāhairgatas tīrthaṃ snāto 'haṃ snāpayāmi tān /
analyzed: yaiḥ tu vāhaiḥ gataḥ tīrtham snātaḥ ham snāpayāmi tān

original: tatra madhyasthitaḥ snātas tiryaktvānnirgato vaṇik // RKV_209.147 //
analyzed: tatra madhya sthitaḥ snātaḥ tiryaktvāt nirgataḥ vaṇij
dānam dadau tān uddiśya kiṃcid śakti anurūpataḥ
tena vāha kṛtāt doṣāt muktaḥ bhavati mānavaḥ

original: anyathāsau kṛto lābhaḥ kṛto vrajati tān prati /
analyzed: anyathā asau kṛtaḥ lābhaḥ kṛtaḥ vrajati tān prati

original: saṃsnāpya taṃ tato rājā svayaṃ snātvā vidhānataḥ // RKV_209.149 //
analyzed: saṃsnāpya tam tatas rājā svayam snātvā vidhānataḥ
saṃtarpya pitṛ devān ca kṛtvā śrāddham yathāvidhi
kṛtvā piṇḍān pitṛbhyaḥ ca vṛṣam utsṛjya lakṣaṇam
gatvā devālayam paścāt devam tīrtha udakena ca

original: saṃsnāpya pañcagavyena tataḥ pañcāmṛtena ca // RKV_209.151 //
analyzed: saṃsnāpya pañcagavyena tatas pañcāmṛtena ca
sarva oṣadhi jalena eva tatas śuddha udakena ca

original: candanena sugandhena samālabhya ca śaṅkaram // RKV_209.152 //
analyzed: candanena sugandhena samālabhya ca śaṅkaram
kuṅkumaiḥ ca sa karpūraiḥ gandhaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ tathā
puṣpa oghaiḥ ca su gandha āḍhyaiḥ caturtham liṅga pūraṇam
kṛtam nṛpa vareṇa atra kurvatā pūrvakam vidhim

original: godānaṃ ca kṛtaṃ paścād vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // RKV_209.154 //
analyzed: godānam ca kṛtam paścāt vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā
dhenuke rudra rūpā asi rudreṇa parinirmitā

original: asminnagādhe saṃsāre patantaṃ māṃ samuddhara // RKV_209.155 //
analyzed: asmin agādhe saṃsāre patantam mām samuddhara

original: dhenuṃ svalaṃkṛtāṃ dadyād anena vidhinā tataḥ /
analyzed: dhenum su alaṃkṛtām dadyāt anena vidhinā tatas

original: kṣamāpya devadeveśaṃ brāhmaṇān bhojayed bahūn // RKV_209.156 //
analyzed: kṣamāpya devadeveśam brāhmaṇān bhojayet bahūn

original: ṣaḍvidhair bhojanair bhakṣyair vāsobhis tān samarcayet /
analyzed: ṣaḍvidhaiḥ bhojanaiḥ bhakṣyaiḥ vāsobhiḥ tān samarcayet
dakṣiṇābhiḥ vicitrābhiḥ pūjayitvā kṣamāpayet
sa svayam bubhuje paścāt parivāra samanvitaḥ
tām eva rajanīm tatra nyavasat jagatīpatiḥ
tasya tatra uṣitasya evam niśīthe nareśvara
ākāśe saḥ ti śuśrāva divya vāṇī samīritam
vāc uvāca

original: rājansamaṃ tato loke phalaṃ bhavati sāmpratam /
analyzed: rājan samam tatas loke phalam bhavati sāmpratam
saṃsāra sāgare hi atra patitānām durātmanām
yadi saṃnidhi mātreṇa phalam tatra ucyate katham
yadi śaṃtanu vaṃśasya tatra unmāda karam bhavet
yaḥ eṣa tvad gṛhe voḍhā hi ati bhāra dhuraṃdharaḥ
anena mitra hananam pāpam viśvāsa ghātanam
kṛtam janma sahasrāṇām atīte parijanmani

original: gatena pāpmanātmānaṃ narakeṣu ca saṃsthitiḥ // RKV_209.163 //
analyzed: gatena pāpmanā ātmānam narakeṣu ca saṃsthitiḥ
tatas yoni sahasreṣu gatiḥ tiryakṣu ca eva hi
go yonim samanuprāptaḥ tvad gṛhe sa su durmatiḥ
snāpitaḥ ca tvayā tīrthe hi asmin parva samāgame

original: dṛṣṭvā pūjāṃ tvayā kḷptāṃ kṛtā jāgaraṇakriyā // RKV_209.165 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pūjām tvayā kḷptām kṛtā jāgaraṇa kriyā

original: tena niṣkalmaṣo jāto muktvā dehaṃ tavāgrataḥ /
analyzed: tena niṣkalmaṣaḥ jātaḥ muktvā deham tava agratas

original: svargaṃ prati vimānasthaḥ so'dya rājangamiṣyati // RKV_209.166 //
analyzed: svargam prati vimāna sthaḥ saḥ udya rājan gamiṣyati
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
evam ukte nipatitaḥ dhuryaḥ prāṇaiḥ vyayujyata
vimāna varam ārūḍhaḥ tad kṣaṇāt samadṛśyata

original: sa taṃ praṇamya rājendram uvāca prahasanniva // RKV_209.168 //
analyzed: sa tam praṇamya rāja indram uvāca prahasan iva
vṛṣaḥ uvāca
bho bho nṛpa vara śreṣṭha tīrtha māhātmyam uttamam
yatra ca asmadvidhaḥ tīrthe mucyate pātakaiḥ naraḥ

original: mayā jñātamaśeṣeṇa matsamo nāsti pātakī // RKV_209.169 //
analyzed: mayā jñātam aśeṣeṇa mad samaḥ nā asti pātakī

original: ataḥ paraṃ kiṃ tu kuryāṃ paraṃ tīrthānukīrtanam /
analyzed: atas param kim tu kuryām param tīrtha anukīrtanam
bhavān mātā bhavan bhrātā bhavān ca eva pitāmahaḥ
kṣantavyam praṇataḥ smi adya yasmin tīrthe hi mādṛśāḥ

original: gatimīdṛgvidhāṃ yānti na jāne tava kā gatiḥ // RKV_209.171 //
analyzed: gatim īdṛgvidhām yānti na jāne tava kā gatiḥ
samārādhya maheśānam sampūjya ca yathāvidhi

original: kā gatistava saṃbhāṣyā dehyanujñāṃ mama prabho // RKV_209.172 //
analyzed: kā gatiḥ tava saṃbhāṣyā dehi anujñām mama prabho

original: tvarayanti ca māṃ hyete divisthāḥ praṇayādgaṇāḥ /

analyzed: na bhavet punarāvṛttiḥ rudra lokāt kadācana

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śrīkapālatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma caturdaśottaradviśatatamo  #

analyzed: mṛtānām tatra rāja indra mokṣa prāptiḥ na saṃśayaḥ

analyzed: tatra snātvā naraḥ rājan rudrasya anucaraḥ bhavet

anivartikā gatiḥ tasya rudra lokāt asaṃśayam

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe aṣāḍhītīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe aṣāḍhītīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma ṣoḍaśa uttara dviśatatamaḥ

original: tatra snātvā vidhānena mucyate brahmahatyayā // RKV_217.2 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā vidhānena mucyate brahma hatyayā

original: tatra tīrthe tu yo bhaktyā prāṇatyāgaparo bhavet /

analyzed: anivartikā gatiḥ tasya rudra lokāt asaṃśayam

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe eraṇḍītīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe eraṇḍītīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma saptadaśa uttara dviśatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: jamadagniriti khyātaṃ yatra siddho janārdanaḥ // RKV_218.1 //
analyzed: jamadagniḥ iti khyātam yatra siddhaḥ janārdanaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca
katham siddhaḥ dvijaśreṣṭha vāsudevaḥ jagadguruḥ
mānuṣam rūpam āsthāya lokānām hita kāmyayā
etat sarvam yathānyāyam devadevasya cakriṇaḥ

original: caritaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyamānaṃ tvayānagha // RKV_218.3 //
analyzed: caritam śrotum icchāmi kathyamānam tvayā anagha
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
āsīt pūrvam mahā rāja haihaya adhipatiḥ mahān

original: kārtavīrya iti khyāto rājā bāhusahasravān // RKV_218.4 //
analyzed: kārtavīryaḥ iti khyātaḥ rājā bāhu sahasravān
hasti aśva ratha sampannaḥ sarva śastrabhṛtām varaḥ
māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ śrīmān rājā hi akṣauhiṇī patiḥ
sa kadācid mṛgān hantum nirjagāma mahā balaḥ
bahubhiḥ divasaiḥ prāptaḥ bhṛgukaccham anuttamam

original: jamadagnir mahātejā yatra tiṣṭhati tāpasaḥ // RKV_218.7 //
analyzed: jamadagniḥ mahā tejāḥ yatra tiṣṭhati tāpasaḥ
tasya putraḥ bhavat rāmaḥ sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
sarva kṣatra guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ brahma vid brāhmaṇa uttamaḥ
toṣayan parayā bhaktyā pitarā parama artha vat

original: taṃ tadā cārjunaṃ dṛṣṭvā jamadagniḥ pratāpavān /
analyzed: tam tadā ca arjunam dṛṣṭvā jamadagniḥ pratāpavān

original: carantaṃ mṛgayāṃ gatvā hyātithyena nyamantrayat // RKV_218.10 //
analyzed: carantam mṛgayām gatvā hi ātithyena nyamantrayat
tathā iti ca uktvā sa nṛpaḥ sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ
jagāma ca āśramam puṇyam ṛṣeḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: tatkṣaṇād eva sampannaṃ śriyā paramayā vṛtam /
analyzed: tad kṣaṇāt eva sampannam śriyā paramayā vṛtam

original: vismayaṃ paramaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā rājā jagāma ha // RKV_218.12 //
analyzed: vismayam paramam tatra dṛṣṭvā rājā jagāma ha
gata mātraḥ tu siddhena paramānnena bhojitaḥ
sa bhṛtya balavān rājā brāhmaṇena yadṛcchayā

original: kimetad iti papraccha kāraṇaṃ śaktimeva ca // RKV_218.13 //
analyzed: kim etat iti papraccha kāraṇam śaktim eva ca

original: kāmadhenoḥ prabhāvaṃ taṃ jñātvā prāha tato dvijam /
analyzed: kāmadhenoḥ prabhāvam tam jñātvā prāha tatas dvijam

original: dakṣiṇāṃ dehi me vipra kalmaṣāṃ dhenumuttamām // RKV_218.14 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇām dehi me vipra kalmaṣām dhenum uttamām
śatam śata sahasrāṇām ayutam niyutam param

original: bhūṣitānāṃ ca dhenūnāṃ dadāmi tava cārbudam // RKV_218.15 //
analyzed: bhūṣitānām ca dhenūnām dadāmi tava ca arbudam
jamadagniḥ uvāca
ayutaiḥ prayutaiḥ na aham śata koṭibhiḥ uttamām

original: kāmadhenumimāṃ tāta na dadmi pratigamyatām // RKV_218.16 //
analyzed: kāmadhenum imām tāta na dadmi pratigamyatām

original: evamuktaḥ sa rājendras tena vipreṇa bhārata /
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa rāja indraḥ tena vipreṇa bhārata
krodha saṃrakta nayanaḥ idam vacanam abravīt
yasya īdṛśaḥ kāmacāraḥ mayi api dvija pāṃsana

original: ahaṃ te paśyatastasmānnayāmi surabhiṃ gṛhāt // RKV_218.18 //
analyzed: aham te paśyataḥ tasmāt nayāmi surabhim gṛhāt
dvijaḥ uvāca

original: kaḥ krīḍati saroṣeṇa nirbhayo hi mahāhinā /
analyzed: kaḥ krīḍati sa roṣeṇa nirbhayaḥ hi mahā ahinā

original: mṛtyudṛṣṭotareṇāpi mama dhenuṃ nayeta yaḥ // RKV_218.19 //
analyzed: mama dhenum nayeta yaḥ
evam uktvā mahā daṇḍam brahmadaṇḍam iva aparam
gṛhītvā parama kruddhaḥ jamadagniḥ uvāca ha
yasya asti śaktiḥ tejaḥ vā kṣatriyasya kula adhamaḥ

original: dhenuṃ nayatu me sadyaḥ kṣīṇāyuḥ saparicchadaḥ // RKV_218.21 //
analyzed: dhenum nayatu me sadyas kṣīṇa āyuḥ sa paricchadaḥ

original: etacchrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ haihayaḥ śataśo vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: etat śrutvā vacaḥ krūram haihayaḥ śataśas vṛtaḥ
dhāvamānaḥ kṣiti tale brahmadaṇḍa hataḥ patat
huṃkṛtena tatas dhenvāḥ khaḍga pāśa asi pāṇayaḥ
nirgacchantaḥ pradṛśyante kalmaṣāyāḥ sahasraśas
nāsā puṭa agrāt roma agrāt kirātāḥ māgadhāḥ gudāt
randhra antareṣu ca utpannāḥ sahasraśas
evam anyaḥ haihayaḥ ṭaṅkaṇān dahan

original: vināśaṃ saha vipreṇa gatā hyarjunatejasā // RKV_218.25 //
analyzed: vināśam saha vipreṇa gatāḥ hi arjuna tejasā

original: kārtavīryo jayaṃ labdhvā saṃkhye hatvā dvijottamam /
analyzed: kārtavīryaḥ jayam labdhvā saṃkhye hatvā dvijottamam

original: jagāma svāṃ purīṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtāntavaśamohitaḥ // RKV_218.26 //
analyzed: jagāma svām purīm hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtānta vaśa mohitaḥ
tatas tvarā anvitaḥ prāptaḥ paścāt rāmaḥ gate ripau
ākrandamānām jananīm dadarśa pituḥ antike
rāmaḥ uvāca
kena idam ātma nāśāya hi ajñānāt sāhasam kṛtam

original: mama tātaṃ jighāṃsuryo draṣṭuṃ mṛtyumihecchati // RKV_218.28 //
analyzed: mama tātam jighāṃsuḥ yaḥ draṣṭum mṛtyum iha icchati
tatas sā rāma vākyena gata sattvā iva vihvalā

original: udaraṃ karayugmena tāḍayantī hyuvāca tam // RKV_218.29 //
analyzed: udaram kara yugmena tāḍayantī hi uvāca tam

original: ihāgatya pitā tena nihato bāhuśālinā // RKV_218.30 //
analyzed: iha āgatya pitā tena nihataḥ bāhu śālinā

original: taṃ paśya nihataṃ tātaṃ gatāsuṃ gatacetasam /
analyzed: tam paśya nihatam tātam gatāsum gata cetasam

original: etacchrutvā sa vacanaṃ jananīm abhivādya tām /
analyzed: etat śrutvā sa vacanam jananīm abhivādya tām

original: pratijñām akarod yāṃ tāṃ śṛṇuṣva ca narādhipa // RKV_218.32 //
analyzed: pratijñām akarot yām tām śṛṇuṣva ca narādhipa

original: snātvā ca teṣām asṛjā tarpayiṣyāmi te patim // RKV_218.33 //
analyzed: snātvā ca teṣām asṛjā tarpayiṣyāmi te patim

original: chittvā pāsyāmi rudhiramiti satyaṃ śṛṇuṣva me // RKV_218.34 //
analyzed: chittvā pāsyāmi rudhiram iti satyam śṛṇuṣva me
evam pratijñām kṛtvā asau jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān

original: krodhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ saṃskṛtya pitaraṃ tataḥ // RKV_218.35 //
analyzed: krodhena mahatā āviṣṭaḥ saṃskṛtya pitaram tatas

original: chittvā bāhuvanaṃ tasya hatvā taṃ kṣatriyādhamam // RKV_218.36 //
analyzed: chittvā bāhu vanam tasya hatvā tam kṣatriya adhamam
jagāma kṣatriya antāya pṛthivīm avalokayan
sapta dvīpa arṇava yutām sa śaila vana kānanām
pūrvatas paścimām āśām dakṣiṇa uttaratas kurūn
samantapañcake pañca cakāra rudhira hradān
sa teṣu rudhira ambhaḥ tu hradeṣu krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: pitḥn saṃtarpayāmāsa rudhireṇeti naḥ śrutam // RKV_218.39 //
analyzed: pitṝn saṃtarpayāmāsa rudhireṇa iti naḥ śrutam
atha ṛcīka ādayaḥ upetya pitaraḥ brāhmaṇa ṛṣabham

original: taṃ kṣamasveti jagadus tataḥ sa virarāma ha // RKV_218.40 //
analyzed: tam kṣamasva iti jagaduḥ tatas sa virarāma ha

original: teṣāṃ samīpe yo deśo hradānāṃ rudhirāmbhasām /
analyzed: teṣām samīpe yaḥ deśaḥ hradānām rudhira ambhasām

original: samaṃ tapaṃ cakram iti puṇyaṃ tatparikīrtitam // RKV_218.41 //
analyzed: samam tapam cakram iti puṇyam tat parikīrtitam

original: rāmaḥ paramadharmātmā yadidaṃ rudhiraṃ mayā // RKV_218.42 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ parama dharma ātmā yat idam rudhiram mayā
kṣiptam pañcasu tīrtheṣu tat bhūyāt tīrtham uttamam

original: tathetyuktvā tu te sarve pitaro 'dṛśyatāṃ gatāḥ // RKV_218.43 //
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā tu te sarve pitaraḥ dṛśya tām gatāḥ
evam rāmasya saṃsargaḥ devamārge yudhiṣṭhira
sarva pāpa kṣaya karaḥ darśanāt sparśanāt nṛṇām
reṇukā pratyaya arthāya adya api pitṛ devatāḥ
dṛśyante devamārga sthāḥ sarva pāpa kṣayaṃkarāḥ
tatra tīrthe tu rāja indra narmadā udadhi saṅgame

original: sthānaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena mucyante pātakairnarāḥ // RKV_218.46 //
analyzed: sthānam kṛtvā vidhānena mucyante pātakaiḥ narāḥ
kuśa agreṇa api kaunteya na spṛṣṭavyaḥ mahā udadhiḥ

original: anena tatra mantreṇa snātavyaṃ nṛpasattama // RKV_218.47 //
analyzed: anena tatra mantreṇa snātavyam nṛpa sattama
namaḥ te viṣṇu rūpāya namaḥ tubhyam apām pate
sānnidhyam kuru deveśa sāgare lavaṇāmbhasi
iti sparśana mantraḥ

original: agniśca tejo mṛḍayā ca dehe reto 'tha viṣṇuramṛtasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ ca tejaḥ mṛḍayā ca dehe viṣṇuḥ amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: etad bruvan pāṇḍava satyavākyaṃ tato 'vagāheta patiṃ nadīnām // RKV_218.49 //
analyzed: etat bruvan pāṇḍava satya vākyam tatas vagāheta patim nadīnām
pañcaratna samāyuktam phala puṣpa akṣataiḥ yutam
mantreṇa anena rāja indra dadyāt argham mahā udadheḥ
sarva ratna nidhānaḥ tvam sarva ratna ākara ākaraḥ
sarva amara pradhāna īśa gṛhāṇa argham namaḥ stu te
iti argha mantraḥ
ā janma janitāt pāpāt mām uddhara mahodadhe
yāhi arcitaḥ ratnanidhe parvatān pārvaṇa uttama
iti visarjana mantraḥ
kaḥ paraḥ sāgarāt devāt svarga dvāra vipāṭana
tatra sāgara paryantam mahā tīrtham anuttamam
jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa tatra devaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: yatra devāḥ sagandharvā munayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ // RKV_218.54 //
analyzed: yatra devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ munayaḥ siddha cāraṇāḥ
upāsate virūpākṣam jamadagnim anuttamam

original: reṇukāṃ caiva ye devīṃ paśyanti bhuvi mānavāḥ // RKV_218.55 //
analyzed: reṇukām ca eva ye devīm paśyanti bhuvi mānavāḥ
priya vāse śive loke vasanti kālam īpsitam
tatra snātvā naraḥ rājan tarpayan pitṛ devatāḥ
tārayet narakāt ghorāt kulānām śatam uttaram

original: snātvā dattvātra sahitāḥ śrutvā vai bhaktipūrvakam // RKV_218.57 //
analyzed: snātvā dattvā atra sahitāḥ śrutvā vai bhakti pūrvakam

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe jāmadagnyatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśādhikadviśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe jāmadagnyatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanam nāma aṣṭādaśa adhika dviśatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
narmadā dakṣiṇe kūle tīrtham koṭīśvaram param

original: yatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet // RKV_219.1 //
analyzed: yatra snānam ca dānam ca sarvam koṭi guṇam bhavet

original: tatra devāḥ sagandharvā ṛṣayo ye tathāmalāḥ /
analyzed: tatra devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ye tathā amalāḥ

original: koṭitīrthe parāṃ siddhiṃ samprāptā bhuvi durlabhām // RKV_219.2 //
analyzed: koṭitīrthe parām siddhim samprāptāḥ bhuvi durlabhām
sthāpitaḥ ca mahādevaḥ tatra koṭīśvaraḥ nṛpa

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ siddhiṃ prāpnotyanuttamām // RKV_219.3 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā devadeveśam siddhim prāpnoti anuttamām

original: tatra tīrthe tu yatkiṃcicchubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
analyzed: tatra tīrthe tu yat kiṃcid śubham vā yadi vā aśubham

original: kriyate tannṛpaśreṣṭha sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet // RKV_219.4 //
analyzed: kriyate tat nṛpa śreṣṭha sarvam koṭi guṇam bhavet
tatra dakṣiṇa mārga sthāḥ ye kecid muni sattamāḥ

original: siddhā mṛtāḥ padaṃ yānti pitṛlokaṃ dhruvaṃ hi te // RKV_219.5 //
analyzed: siddhāḥ mṛtāḥ padam yānti pitṛ lokam dhruvam hi te
uttaram narmadā kūlam ye śreṣṭhāḥ muni puṃgavāḥ

original: devalokaṃ gatāḥ pūrvamiti śāstrasya niścayaḥ // RKV_219.6 //

analyzed: vāgīśvaram nāma tīrtham puṇyaḥ vai vāgu saṅgamaḥ
sahasrāvartakam tatra tīrtham saugandhikam tathā
saṅgamaḥ ca sarasvatyāḥ īśānam tīrtham uttamam
devatā traya tīrtham ca śūlakhātam tatas param

original: brahmodaṃ śāṅkaraṃ saumyaṃ sārasvatamataḥ param // RKV_230.40 //
analyzed: brahma udam śāṅkaram saumyam sārasvatam atas param

original: āgneyam aditīśaṃ ca vārāhaṃ tīrthamuttamam // RKV_230.41 //
analyzed: āgneyam aditi īśam ca vārāham tīrtham uttamam

original: brahmāvartaṃ ca pattreśaṃ vāhnaṃ sauraṃ ca kīrtyate /

vimaleśvara tīrtham ca puṣkariṇyāḥ ca saṅgamaḥ

svargatim dīrghatapasaḥ bhānumatyāḥ tathā iṅgitam

original: mātṛtīrthaṃ ca muṇḍeśaṃ cauraṃ kāmeśvaraṃ tathā /

original: tīrthaṃ dharmeśvaraṃ nāma luṅkeśvaram ataḥ param // RKV_230.54 //

caṇḍādityam param tīrtham caṇḍikātīrtham uttamam
yamahāsāhvayam tīrtham tathā gaṅgeśvaram śubham

original: vyāseśvaraṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tatra siddheśvaraṃ tathā // RKV_230.63 //
analyzed: vyāseśvaram param tīrtham tatra siddheśvaram tathā

saubhāgyasundarī tīrtham dhanadeśvaram uttamam

original: bhogeśvaraṃ ca kedāraṃ niṣkalaṅkamataḥ param // RKV_230.68 //
analyzed: bhogeśvaram ca kedāram niṣkalaṅkam atas param

original: koṭavīsaṅgamaḥ puṇyaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ ca tatra vai // RKV_230.69 //

original: varuṇeśaṃ yameśaṃ ca rāmeśaṃ karkaṭeśvaram // RKV_230.76 //

jayavārāhartīrtham ca tīrtham asmāhaka āhvayam

original: punaḥ siddheśvaraṃ nāmatīrthaṃ ca varuṇeśvaram // RKV_230.79 //

original: mārkaṇḍeśaṃ ca nāgeśam udambaryāśca saṅgamaḥ // RKV_230.84 //

evam uddeśataḥ proktaḥ revā tīrtha kramaḥ mayā

original: yathā pārthāya saṃkṣepān mārkaṇḍo munirabravīt // RKV_231.32 //
analyzed: yathā pārthāya saṃkṣepāt mārkaṇḍaḥ muniḥ abravīt
avāntarāṇi tīrthāni teṣu guptāni anekaśas
yatra yāvat pramāṇāni tāni ākarṇayata anaghāḥ
oṅkāra tīrtha paritas parvatāt amarakaṇṭāt
krośa dvaye sarva dikṣu sārdha koṭī trayī matā
tīrthānām saṃkhyayā gupta prakaṭānām dvijottamāḥ

original: koṭirekā tu tīrthānāṃ kapilāsaṅgame pṛthak // RKV_231.35 //
analyzed: koṭiḥ ekā tu tīrthānām kapilā saṅgame pṛthak
aśoka vanikāyāḥ ca tīrtham lakṣam pratiṣṭhitam
śatamam gāragartāyāḥ saṅgame muni sattamāḥ
tīrthānām ayutam tadvat kubjāyāḥ saṅgame sthitam
śatam hiraṇyagarbhāyāḥ saṅgame samavasthitam
tīrthānām aṣṭaṣaṣṭiḥ ca viśokā saṅgame sthitā

original: tathā sahasraṃ tīrthānāṃ saṃsthitaṃ vāgusaṅgame // RKV_231.38 //
analyzed: tathā sahasram tīrthānām saṃsthitam vāgu saṅgame
śatam sarasvatī saṅge śuklatīrthe śata dvayam
sahasram viṣṇutīrtheṣu mahiṣmatyām atha ayutam

original: śūlabhede ca tīrthānāṃ sāgraṃ lakṣaṃ sthitaṃ dvijāḥ /
analyzed: śūlabhede ca tīrthānām sāgram lakṣam sthitam dvijāḥ

original: devagrāme sahasraṃ ca tīrthānāṃ munirabravīt // RKV_231.40 //
analyzed: devagrāme sahasram ca tīrthānām muniḥ abravīt

original: luṅkeśvare ca tīrthānāṃ sāgrā saptaśatī sthitā /
analyzed: luṅkeśvare ca tīrthānām sāgrā saptaśatī sthitā
tīrthāni aṣṭottaraśatam maṇinadyāḥ ca saṅgame

original: vaidyanāthe ca tīrthānāṃ śatamaṣṭādhikaṃ viduḥ // RKV_231.41 //
analyzed: vaidyanāthe ca tīrthānām śatam aṣṭa adhikam viduḥ
evam tāvat pramāṇāni tīrthe kumbheśvare dvijāḥ

original: sāgraṃ lakṣaṃ ca tīrthānāṃ sthitaṃ revorasaṅgame // RKV_231.42 //
analyzed: sāgram lakṣam ca tīrthānām sthitam
tatas ca api adhikāni syuḥ iti mārkaṇḍa bhāṣitam
aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi vyāsa dvīpa āśritāni ca
saṅgame ca karañjāyāḥ sthitam aṣṭa uttara ayutam
eraṇḍīsaṅgame tadvat tīrthāni aṣṭa adhikam śatam
dhūtapāpe ca tīrthānām ṣaṣṭiḥ aṣṭa adhikā sthitā

original: skandatīrthe śataṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthānāṃ muniruktavān // RKV_231.45 //
analyzed: skandatīrthe śatam puṇyam tīrthānām muniḥ uktavān
ca tīrthānām ṣaṣṭiḥ aṣṭa adhikā sthitā

original: sārdhakoṭī ca tīrthānāṃ sthitā vai korilāpure // RKV_231.46 //
analyzed: sārdha koṭī ca tīrthānām sthitā vai korilāpure
rāmakeśavatīrthe ca sahasram sāgram uktavān

original: asmāhake sahasraṃ ca tīrthāni nivasanti hi // RKV_231.47 //
analyzed: asmāhake sahasram ca tīrthāni nivasanti hi
lakṣa aṣṭakam sahasre dve śuklatīrthe dvijottamāḥ

original: tīrthāni kathayāmāsa purā pārthāya bhārgavaḥ // RKV_231.48 //
analyzed: tīrthāni kathayāmāsa purā pārthāya bhārgavaḥ
śatam aṣṭa adhikam prāha pratyekam saṅgameṣu ca
nadīnām avaśiṣṭānām kāverīsaṅgamam vinā

original: kāveryāḥ saṅgame viprāḥ sthitā pañcaśatī tathā /
analyzed: kāveryāḥ saṅgame viprāḥ sthitā pañcaśatī tathā

original: tīrthānāṃ parvasu tathā viśeṣo muninoditaḥ // RKV_231.50 //
analyzed: tīrthānām parvasu tathā viśeṣaḥ muninā uditaḥ
mokṣatīrtham hi sat prāhuḥ purāṇapuruṣa āśritam

original: bhṛgoḥ kṣetre ca tīrthānāṃ koṭirekā samāśritā // RKV_231.51 //
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ kṣetre ca tīrthānām koṭiḥ ekā samāśritā

original: sādhikānāmṛṣiśreṣṭhā vaktuṃ śakto hi ko bhavet /
analyzed: sādhikānām ṛṣi śreṣṭhāḥ vaktum śaktaḥ hi kaḥ bhavet
sarva amara āśrayam proktam sarva tīrtha āśrayam tathā
triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātam pūjitam siddhi sādhanam

original: bhārabhūtyāṃ ca tīrthānāṃ sthitamaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // RKV_231.53 //
analyzed: bhārabhūtyām ca tīrthānām sthitam aṣṭa uttaram śatam
akrūreśvaratīrthe ca sa ardham tīrtha śatam sthitam
vimaleśvara tīrthe tu revā sāgara saṅgame
daśa ayutāni tīrthānām sa adhikāni abravīt muniḥ

original: // iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe tīrthasaṃkhyāparigaṇanavarṇanaṃ nāmaikatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo  #
analyzed: iti śrī skānde mahāpurāṇe ekāśīti sāhasryām saṃhitāyām pañcame āvantya khaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe tīrthasaṃkhyāparigaṇanavarṇanam nāma ekatriṃśat adhika dviśatatamaḥ
dhyāyaḥ
rku adhyāya
sūtaḥ uvāca
iti vaḥ kathitam viprāḥ revā māhātmyam uttamam

original: yathopadiṣṭaṃ pārthāya mārkaṇḍeyena vai purā // RKV_232.1 //
analyzed: yathā upadiṣṭam pārthāya mārkaṇḍeyena vai purā

original: prādhānyena mayā khyātā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yathākramam // RKV_232.2 //
analyzed: prādhānyena mayā khyātāḥ yathāsaṅkhyam yathākramam
etat pavitram atulam hi etat pāpa haram param
narmadā caritam puṇyam māhātmyam muni bhāṣitam
sapta kalpa anugaḥ vipraḥ narmadāyām muni īśvarāḥ
mṛkaṇḍa tanayaḥ dhīmān parama artha vid uttamaḥ

original: saṃsevya sarvatīrthāni nadīḥ sarvāśca vai purā /

ajarām amarām devīm daitya dhvaṃsa karīm parām
tasyām ābadhya sat prema jātaḥ saḥ pi ajara amaraḥ
ṣaṣṭi tīrtha sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭi koṭyaḥ ca sattamāḥ
vyavasthitāni revāyāḥ tīra yugme pade pade

original: na tulāṃ yānti revāyāstāśca manye munīśvarāḥ // RKV_232.9 //
analyzed: na tulām yānti revāyāḥ tāḥ ca manye muni īśvarāḥ

yat maheśa mukhāt śrutvā vāyuḥ āha ṛṣīn prati
tadvat mṛkaṇḍa tanayaḥ pi anubhūya akhilām nadīm

original: satīrthāṃ padaśaḥ prāha pāṇḍuputrāya pāvanīm // RKV_232.11 //
analyzed: sa tīrthām padaśas prāha pāṇḍu putrāya pāvanīm

original: narmadācaritaṃ puṇyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu durlabham // RKV_232.12 //
analyzed: narmadā caritam puṇyam triṣu lokeṣu durlabham

original: kimanyaiḥ saritāṃ toyaiḥ sevitais tu sahasraśaḥ /

analyzed: yadi saṃsevyate toyam revāyāḥ pāpa nāśanam
yathā yathā bhajet martyaḥ yat yat icchati tīrtha gaḥ
tat tat āpnoti niyatam śraddhayā aśraddhayā api ca

original: idaṃ brahma nirākāraṃ kaivalyaṃ narmadājalam // RKV_232.16 //
analyzed: idam brahma nirākāram kaivalyam narmadā jalam

original: yāvanna smaryate revā sevāhevā kalau naraiḥ // RKV_232.17 //
analyzed: yāvat na smaryate revā sevā hevā kalau naraiḥ

original: narairvā prāpyate yāvadbhuvi bhargabhavā dhunī // RKV_232.20 //

analyzed: vasanti yāmya tīre ye lokam te yānti vaiṣṇavam

original: śṛṇoti yaḥ kīrtayate mucyate sarvapātakaḥ // RKV_232.24 //
analyzed: śṛṇoti yaḥ kīrtayate mucyate sarva pātakaḥ

original: śrutvā sakṛcca revāyāścaritaṃ tatphalaṃ labhet // RKV_232.26 //
analyzed: śrutvā sakṛt ca revāyāḥ caritam tat phalam labhet

original: sakṛcchrutvā ca māhātmyaṃ revāyās tatphalaṃ labhet // RKV_232.27 //
analyzed: sakṛt śrutvā ca māhātmyam revāyāḥ tat phalam labhet

original: deśe vā maṇḍale vāpi nagare grāmamadhyataḥ // RKV_232.28 //
analyzed: deśe vā maṇḍale vā api nagare grāma madhyatas

original: gṛhe vā tiṣṭhate yasya likhitaṃ sārvavārṇikam /
analyzed: gṛhe vā tiṣṭhate yasya likhitam

original: sa brahmā sa śivaḥ sākṣātsa ca devo janārdanaḥ // RKV_232.29 //
analyzed: sa brahmā sa śivaḥ sākṣāt sa ca devaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: gurūṇāṃ ca guruḥ śāstraṃ paramaṃ siddhikāraṇam // RKV_232.30 //
analyzed: gurūṇām ca guruḥ śāstram paramam siddhi kāraṇam

analyzed: dhana āḍhyaḥ jāyate vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ vai dharma bhāj bhavet

analyzed: te śrutvā ca pāpebhyaḥ mucyante na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: pūjayanti ca tacchāstraṃ nārmadaṃ vastrabhūṣaṇaiḥ // RKV_232.38 //
analyzed: pūjayanti ca tat śāstram nārmadam vastra bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: puṣpaiḥ phalaiś candanādyair bhojanair vividhair api /

original: iha loke pare caiva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /

original: narmadācaritaṃ śrutvā tatpuṇyaṃ sakalaṃ labhet // RKV_232.44 //
analyzed: narmadā caritam śrutvā tat puṇyam sakalam labhet

original: gṛhe 'pi paṭhyate yasya caturvarṇasya sattamāḥ // RKV_232.47 //
analyzed: gṛhe pi paṭhyate yasya catur varṇasya sattamāḥ

analyzed: dhanyam tasya gṛham manye gṛhastham ca api tad kulam

analyzed: bhūṣaṇam sarva śāstrāṇām yaḥ dadāti dvijanmane
